He Dân lehkhabua chuang tel lo, natna chi hrang hrang
, in Pathian thu in zawm loh chuan vâna arsi zâtin tam mah ula, dam chhuak in awm pheuh pheuh lek ang.
chuan thil ṭha tihsak che u leh tihpunsak che u a châk ṭhîn; chutiang bawkin tihchhiata tihhlum che u a châk dâwn a ni. In luah tûr ram aṭang hian a la chhuak dâwn a che u.
Khawiah mah râlmuang taka awm hle hle theihna hmun in nei lo vang.
Thih hlau rêng rêngin in awm ang a, a chhun a zânin thlabâr takin in awm ang a, in dam khawchhuak dâwn nge dâwn lo pawh in hre lo vang.
In thil hlauh leh in mita hlauhawm in hmuhte avâng chuan zîngah, ‘Tlai ni tawh se,’ in ti ang a, zânah chuan, ‘Khua vâr tawh mai se,’ in ti ang.

chuan Aigupta ramah lawngin a tawlh thla ang che u; in chhuk leh tawh lo vang, ka ti na a; mahse, in chhuk ang a, in hmêlmate lei tûrin bawihpa emaw, bawihnu atân emaw in inzuar ang a; mahse, tu man an lei duh lo vang che u.”
Mosia chuan Israel mi zawng zawng chu pung khâwm tûrin a hrilh a, an hnênah, “In mit ngeiin Aigupta lal Farawa leh a ṭhuihruaite leh an ram chhûnga
Hri hlauhawm pui pui te, thil mak tak takte leh thil ropui tak tak a tihte kha in hmu a.
Vawiin thlengin in thil hmuhte kha a ngaihna in hre lo va, a awmzia tak in la hre hek lo.
Kum sawmli chhûng
Chaw pângngai ei tûr nei lovin, uain leh zu in tûr pawh in nei lo va; mahse,
He hmun in lo thlen khân Hesbon lal Sihona leh Basan lal Oga chuan min lo bei a, kan hneh a;
an ram pawh kan neihsak a; Reubena thlah te, Gada thlah te leh Manasea thlah zatve te chu an chanpualah kan pe a.
Chuvângin, he thuthlung thute hi zâwm ula, in thil tih apianga in hmuingîl theih nân ti rawh u.
“Vawiin hian
in hmeichhia te, in fa te, in zînga awm ve hnam dang te, thing phura tuichawisaktu che u te nên in vaiin in ding a nih hi.
Vawiin hian
tichuan, Abrahama te, Isaka te, Jakoba te hnêna thu a tiam angin a mite atân a tinghet ang che u a, in Pathian a ni bawk ang.
“Nangni nên chauh he thuthlung hi a siam a ni lo.
Vawiina heta dingte tân mai ni lovin kan thlah lo la piang tûrte tân pawh he thuthlung hi a siam a ni.
“Aigupta rama kan awm laia kan nun dân kha in hria e, kan lo chhuah kawnga hnam dang lo awmte khawsak dân te in hria,
thingtum te, lungtum te, tangkarua leh rangkachaka siam milem tenawm tak tak te an bia a,
mipa pawh, hmeichhia pawh, chhûngkua emaw, hnam pum emaw pawhin,

“Vawiina thu urhsûn tak tak kan ngaihthlâk hi kan zînga ngaithla vetu tu mahin, ‘Luhlul taka mahni duh ang anga awm pawh a pawi lo a nih chu,’ ti rilru suh se; chumi avâng chuan mi sual emaw, mi ṭha emaw in boral vek mai ang.
Chutiang mi chu
Dân bu thuthlung ziaknaa ânchhe dawn tûr chuang zawng zawng chhiatna chu a chungah a thlentîr ang.
“Rei fe hnuah chuan, in thlahte leh hnam dangte, ram hla tak taka awmte chuan in rama chhiatna leh tuarna;
in lote chu ram ṭiau, kât leh chi tamna ram a ni ang a, eng mah phun theih a ni lo vang, hnim takngial pawh a ṭo thei lo vang. In ram chu Sodom leh Gomora te, Adma leh Zeboim te,
Khawvêla mi zawng zawngin, ‘
Hetiang hian an chhâng ang: ‘An thlahtute Pathian chuan Aigupta ram ata a hruai chhuah lai khân thuthlung a siampui a,
tûn hmaa an biak ngai loh hnam dang pathian,
chuvângin,
chuan a thinur êm avângin a hnawt chhuak a, hnam dang ramah an awm ta daih a ni,’ an ti ang.
kan Pathian hian thurûk ṭhenkhat chu a puang lo; amaherawhchu, a Dân chu a rawn puang a, kan thlahte nên chu chu kan zâwm tûr a ni.
“Malsâwmna dawn nge in duh ânchhia, in thlan tûr ka siamsak che u a ni.
In thlahte nên
in Pathian chuan in chungah ngil a nei leh ang a, hnam hrang hrang zînga a tihdarhna che u ram aṭangin a rawn hruai kîr leh ang che u a, a tihmuingîl leh ang che u.
Khawvêl ram hla berah kal daih mah ula,
tichuan, in pi leh pute awmna ṭhin ram chu in nei leh ang a, in thlahtute ai khân in tam zâwk ang a, in neinung zâwk bawk ang.
in Pathian chuan in thlahte nên thu awih theihna thinlung a pe ang che u a; tichuan, ani chu tihtakzetin in hmangaih ang a, chu ramah chuan in awm reng thei dâwn nia.
Hêng ânchhia zawng zawng hi in hmêlma, nangmahni hawtu leh tiduhdahtute hi a dawntîr ang a;
a thu in awih tawh ang a, vawiina a thupêk ka hrilh zawng zawng che u hi in zâwm tawh bawk ang.

chuan in thiltih apiangah a tihmuingîl ang che u a, fate in ngah ang a, in ran vulhte nasa takin a pung ang; in lote chu a hlâwk êm êm ang. In pi leh pute tihhmuingîl a châk ang bawk khân nangni pawh tihhmuingîl che u a châk ang.
A thu erawh chu in zâwm thlap tûr a ni a, a Dân bu-a chuang thuruat leh thupêk zawng zawng chu in awih vek tûr a ni a, tihtak meuhvin a lam in hawi bawk tûr a ni.
“Vawiina thu ka pêk che u hi in tân zawm har lutuk a ni lo va, hriat phâk loh tûr a ni hek lo.
‘A thu kan hriat a kan zawm tûrin tu nge vânah han lâwn ang a min rawn lâksak ang?’ tih tûrin vâna awm daih a ni lo.
‘Kan hriata kan zawm tûrin tu nge tuifinriat râlah kal ang a min rawn lâksak ang?’ tih tûra tuifinriat râl daiha awm a ni hek lo.
Thu chu hetah, i bula hi a awm reng alâwm, i hriat fo tawh, sawi pawh i sawi fo ṭhin kha a ni a, zâwm mai rawh.
“Vawiin hian eng nge in thlan duh, thil ṭha nge thil ṭha lo, nun nge thih, thlang rawh u.
in Pathian thupêk vawiina ka hrilh che u hi in awih a, ani chu in hmangaih a, a thu in ngaihthlâk a, a dânte in zawm chuan in hmuingîl ang a, hnam ropui tak in ni ang.
A thu in awih lohva, in ngaihthlâk duh lohva, pathian dangte in biak phawt chuan,
chiang takin ka hrilh a che u: in boral ngei ang; Jordan râl, in luah tûr ramah chuan in dam rei lo vang.

Vawiinah hian nunna nge in duh thihna, Pathian malsâwm dawn nge in duh ânchhia, a eng zâwk nge in thlan, hretuah lei leh vân ka sâwm e. Nangmahni leh in thlahte in dam zêl theih nân nunna thlang rawh u.
in Pathian chu hmangaih ula, a thu awih ula, amah chu vuan tlat rawh u; tichuan, in thlahtu Abrahama te, Isaka te, Jakoba te hnêna pêk a tiam ramah chuan in thlahte nên in dam rei dâwn nia,” a ti a.
Mosia chuan Israel mite hnênah thu a sawi zêl a,
“Kum za leh sawmhniha upa ka ni ta a, duh duha chhuakvâk thei pawh ka ni ta lo;
in Pathian chuan in hma a hruai zêl dâwn a, chûnga hnam awmte chu a tihboralsak ang che u; in luahlân dâwn a ni;
chuan Amor-ho lal Sihona te, Oga te leh an ram te a tichhia a, an mite a tihhlum vek ang khân anni pawh a tiboral ve ang.
chuan anni chu a pe ang che u, thu ka pêk che u ang tak hian in tiboral tûr a ni.
Intipaukhauh ula, ṭang sauh sauh rawh u; hlau suh ula, zâm hek suh u; anni chu huphurh hek suh u; amah
Josua chu Mosian a ko va, Israel mi zawng zawng hriatah, “Intipaukhauh la, ṭang nasa rawh, an pate hnêna pêk
Amah ngei,
Mosia chuan he Pathian Dân hi lehkhabu-ah a ziak a, Levia chi, Thuthlung Bâwm zâwntu puithiamte chu a pe a, Israel upate pawh a pe a,
Mosia chuan an hnênah, “Kum sarihna tâwp, leiba ngaihdamna hun ruat apiangah Bâwkte kût laiin,
Israel-ho chu
Mipui khâwm ula,
Chutiang chuan
chu Inbiakna bûkah chuan chhûm dingin a lo lang a, bûk kawngkaah chuan chhûm chu a ding luah a.

chuan Mosia hnênah, “Ngai teh, i pi leh pu hnênah i mu ve thuai dâwn ta; hêng mite hian i thih hnu chuan min uiresan ang a, thu ka thlunpuite kha an bawhchhia ang a, min kalsan ang a; an va chênna tûra lo awm hnam dangte pathian chu min biaksan ang.
An chungah ka thin a rim ang a, ka kalsan ang a, an chhe vek ang. Thil ṭha lo pui puiin a tlâkbuak ang a; kei an Pathianin ka awmpui tawh loh avângin hêng thil hi an tuar a ni tih an hria ang.
Thil ṭha lo tak an ti a, Pathian dang an biak tâk avângin an lakah ka hmêl ka thup daih dâwn a ni.
“Chuvângin, he hla hi ziak chhuak la, Israel mite chu zirtîr rawh; an chunga ka lungnih lohzia an hriatna tûr a ni ang.

An thlahtute hnêna pêk ka tiam, khawizu leh hnutetuia luang ram chu ka hruai thleng ngei ang. Amaherawhchu, duh tâwk tâwk ei tûr an neia an thau mûm tul hunah chuan, pathian dangte lam an hawiin chibai an bûk ang a; min hmusitin ka thuthlungte chu an bawhchhia ang.

Thil râpthlâk tak takin a tlâkbuak hnuah pawh he hla hi an fate pawhin an la chham thei zêl ang a, chu chuan an sualzia a hriattîr ang. Pêk ka tiam ka hruai thlen hma pawh hian, an rilru put dân chu ka hre reng alâwm,” a ti a.
Chumi ni ngei chuan Mosia chuan hla chu a ziak chhuak a, Israel-te chu a zirtîr ta tlut tlut a.
Mosia chuan Pathian Dân chu lehkhabu-ah kimchang takin a ziak a.
A ziak zawh chuan
“He Dân bu hi la ula,
In tihmawhzia leh in luhlulzia ka hria, kei ka la dam lai ngei pawhin
In upate leh in hruaitute chu lo pung khâwm sela, hêng hi ka lo hrilh ang e; lei leh vân ka thuhretu atân ka koh hi.
Ka thih hnu chuan in che khawlo hle ang a, ka thu zirtîr che u kha in zâwm duh lo vang. Nakin deuhvah phei chuan
Mosia chuan he hla hi a sawi chhuak a, Israel mi zawng zawng chuan an ngaithla ṭhuap a.
“Vânte u, ka thu hi bengkhawn ula, leilung pawh hian ka thu hi ngaithla rawh se.
Ka zirtîrna hi ruah angin a sûr ang a, ka thu hi dai angin a tla ang.
Hlobet chunga ruah si tla,
thlai chawrno nan seng seng ang hian.
Kan Pathian chu chawimawi rawh u.
Engkim ṭha taka titu,
Lungpui a ni,
Dik takin ro a rêl ṭhîn,
Pathian rinawm, khawlohna nei lo,
Thil ṭha leh dik ti ṭhîntu a ni.
Khawlohna a nei em ni? Nei suh e,
A fate a ni demawm chu,
Chhuan bengtla lo leh
tihmawhte chu.
Mi â leh mi chhâwte u,
hetiang hian em ni
A hringtu che u, in pa a ni,
a siam che u a, a tipuitling che u a ni.
Tûn hma kha ngaihtuah chhuak teh u,
Hun liam daih tawhte kha,
Eng thil nge thleng in pate zâwt ula,
Hmânlai lal chanchin in upate sawitîr teh u.
Chungnungberan hnamte ram a sem a,
Mite awmna tûr a ruatsak lai khân,
Pathian fate zâtin
an ramri a khamsak a.
Thlalêra an vâkvai a hmu a,
Ram ṭiau, thlichhe tlehnaah chuan
A hliahkhuh a, a duat hle a,
A mitnautê angin a vêng;
Mupuiin a bu a thai darh a,
A note vilin a thlâwk vut vut a;
A thla zârin a dâwm a dâwm a,
A thlawhpui ṭhîn ang hian.
Hnam dang pathian an tel ve lo.
Tlângramah a chuanchhuahtîr a,
Rama thil ṭote chu an ei a,
Lung kârah khawizu an la a,
Lung hmunah pawh an oliv a rah tiar tuar.
Hnutetui an ngah, an bâwngte leh kêlte nên;
An berâmte lah an thau,
Basan ram berâm leh kêlchal ang,
Buh tui ber leh uain ṭha ber an nei.
Israel-te chu an lo hausa a,
An induh ta hle a,
An thau mûm tûl a,
Siamtu, an Pathian chu an kalsan a,
Chhandamtu, an Lungpui chu an ngainêp.
Milem an bia chu a haw êm êm a,
Thil tenawm an tihte chuan a tithinur.
Pathian ni lo, ramhuai an bia a,
An pate hriat ngai loh leh hlauh ngai loh
An be ta, pathian tharlâm tê tê chu.
Anmahni hringtu Lungpui chu an pawisa lo va,
Anmahni siamtu Pathian chu an kalsan ta.
A fanaute chu a hnâwl ta.
‘Ka bîkbosan ang a,
Engtin nge an awm dâwn ka thlîr teh ang,
Chhuan tihmawh tak leh
Fa sual rin tlâk loh tak an ni.
Pathian ni hlei lo an bia,
Ka thîkthu an chawk tho va,
An milemte chuan min tithinur.
Chî anî-a chhiar tham lohte ka thîktîr ang,
Hnam â takte hmangin ka tithinur bawk ang.
Ka thinur chu mei angin a alh ang a,
Leia thil zawng zawng a kâng ral ang.
Seol pawh a kâng thleng ang a,
Tlâng nghahchhante a kâng ral ang.
Chhiatna tinrêng an chungah ka thlentîr ang a,
Thalin ka kâp ang.
Rilṭâm khawsikin an thi ang a,
Hri râpthlâk tak tak an vei ang.
Ram sakawlhten an seh ang a,
Vaivuta tleng rûl tûr neiten an chu ang.
Tuallaiah khandaih an tawng ang a,
In chhûngah thil râpthlâk tak tak nên,
Nula tlangvâl, ṭhalai an that ang a,
Naupang pawh, tar pawh an zuah lo vang.
Tu ma hriat tawh loh tûrin
Tihmang dêr ka tum hial a.
Mahse, an hmêlmaten uangthuang takin,
‘A mite chu kan sawisa nek,’
an tih ka hlau a ni.
Hnam â tak zawng an lo ni,
Thil rêng an hrethiam lo.
Fing deuh se chu an hrethiam tûr
An awm dân tûr an thlîr thiam ang a.
An Lungpui chuan kalsan lo se,
An Pathian,
Pakhatin sâng têl a ûm dâwn em ni?
Pahnih lekin sîng têl an ngam ang maw?
An hmêlmate pawhin an pathian chu
Israel-te Pathian ai chuan a nêp zâwk tih an hria.
An hmêlmate chu Sodom leh Gomora anga sual,
Grep kha, tûr nei ang hi an ni.
An uain pawh chu rûl tûr ang,
Rûl chuk anga hlauhawm a ni.
Phuba lâk hun remchâng a zawng.
An ke rah chu a tleu hunah,
Phuba ka la ang a, ka thungrûl ang,
An chhiat hun chu a lo hnai ta;
An chunga lo thleng tûr chu an tuar thuai ang.
A chhiahhlawhte chan chauhzia te,
Bawih leh bawih lo te pawh;
Thi bâng tlêmzia a hmuhin a lainat ang a,
A chhan chhuak ang.
A mite chu, ‘In pathian thiltithei,
In rin ṭhinte chu khawiah nge?
In thilhlante chuan in châwm a,
Uain in tûr nên lam in chhawpsak kha?
Lo kal sela, chhan che u rawh se,
Lo tlân sela, hum che u rawh se,’
Keimah chauh hi Pathian chu ka ni.
An awm tak tak lo, pathian dang zawng,
Ka tihlum a, ka tinung a,
Ka hliam a, ka tidam a,
Ka ta min chhuhsak thei tu mah an awm hlei nem.
Pathian nung ka nih hi,
Bân pharin thu ka tiam ṭhîn.
Khandaih ka tât hriam ang a,
Dik takin ro ka rêl ang.
Ka hmêlmate chungah phuba ka la ang a,
Min hawtute chu ka hrem ang.
An thisen chu ka thalah a luang ang a,
Ka khandaih chuan thisen a chhuah ang a,
Hmêlma sam sei tak takte chu a sât hlum ang.
Hnam tinte u,
Anni thattute chu a hrem zêl a,
A hmêlmate chungah phuba a la,
A mite sual a ngaidam ṭhîn.”
Mosia leh Nuna fapa Josua chuan chu hla chu mipui hriatah an sawi a.
Mosian hêng thu hi Israel mite hnêna a sawi zawh chuan,
‘Hêng, thu ka pêk zawng zawng che u hi ngaihtuah ngun ula, hêng dân thute hi zâwm tûrin in fate zirtîr rawh u.
Hêng thu hi thu mai mai a ni lo, nunna thu a ni. Jordan lui kal kâna in va neih tûr ram in thlen hunah chuan zâwm ula, in dam rei ang,’ a ti a.
Chumi ni chuan
“Moab ram, Jeriko ep, Abarim tlânga Nebo tlângchhîpah chuan chho la, an chanpual atân Israel-te ka pêk Kanan ram chu thlîr ang che;
I u Arona Hor tlângah a thi a, a mite hnênah hruai a ni ta ang khân tah chuan i thi ang a, i pi leh pute hnênah i kal ve ang.
Zin thlalêr, Meriba-kades tui hmunah khân, Israel-te zîngah ka thu i bawhchhia a, Israel-te hmaah min chawimawi lo a ni.
Chumi avâng chuan ram chu hla tak aṭang chauhvin i hmu thei ang; Israel mite awmna tûra ka pêk ram chu i rap ve lo vang,” a ti a.
Pathian mi Mosia chuan a thih hmain hetiang malsâwmna hi Israel mite tân a dîlsak a.
Ni angin Edom ramah a chhuak.
Paran tlâng aṭangin a mite a rawn chhun êng a,
Vântirhkoh sâng sâwmin an zui a,
Mei a alh hluah hluah mai, a ding lamah.
A tâte chu a vêng.
A thupêkte an dawng a,
A hniakhnung an zui a,
Mosian Dân thu min pe a,
Jakoba thlahte ro hlu ber chu.
Hnam hruaitute leh
Israel pungkhâwmho chungah chuan a lal.”
Reubena chungchâng hetiangin a sawi:
“Reubena chu thi mang suh se,
Tlêm hle tawh mah se.”
Juda chungthu sawiin:
“Aw
A unaute fin leh rawh se,
A hmêlmate beihpui ang che.”
Levia chungthu a sawi a:
“I chhiahhlawh rinawm Levia thlahte chuan,
Urim leh Thumim kawl se, i thu hrilh ṭhîn ang che,
Masa-ah khân i fiah a,
Meriba tuiah in inchhuahchhalh kha.
A nu leh pa, a unaute leh a fate pawh
Hrechang lovin a vuan che a.
I thupêk a awih a,
I thuthlung a vawn tlat kha.
Jakoba thlahte chu i thuruatte an zirtîr ang a,
Israel fate chu i dân an zirtîr ang.
I hmaah rimtui an hâl ang,
I maichâmah hâlral thilhlan an hâl ṭhîn ang.
Aw
A thiltihte lo lâwm ang che.
A hmêlmate chu an tha chhahsak la,
A hawtute chu dingchhuak suh se.”
Benjamin thlahte chungchâng hetiangin a sawi:
A thla hnuaiah a khawsa,
Nilênga a vên, a puak tlat ṭhin a ni.”
Josefa thlahte chungchâng hetiangin a sawi:
‘An ram chu
Lei chhûngril aṭanga tui nên.
An theirahte chuan ni hmu ṭha sela,
A hun takah hmin tiar tuar rawh se,
An tlâng chhuanawm tak tak leh mualte chu
Thei tui tak takin khat rawh se.
An ramah chuan thil ṭha khat sela,
Hnimbuka thusawitu khân malsâwm rawh se,
A malsâwmna chu Josefa lu-ah rawn vûr sela,
A unaute kaihruaitu a ni asin.
Josefa zawng, bâwngchal anga chak a ni,
Sele ki ang ki ṭha a nei,
A kîte chu Manasea thlah sâng rual
Efraim thlah sîng rual an ni.
Hnam dang a si ang a,
Kâwlkil thlengin a vawrh darh ang.”
Zebulun leh Isakar chungchâng hetiangin a sawi:
“Tuifinriata sumdâwng, Zebulun chu hmuingîl rawh se,
Isakar pawh in lamah a chan ṭha rawh se.
An tlângrama awm tûrin hnam dang an sâwm a,
Tah chuan inthawina dikin an inthawi ang.
Tuifinriat hausakna an chaw a,
A kam ṭiauva thil ṭha an khâwm.”
Gada chungchâng hetiangin a sawi:
“Gad ram tizautu chu fak rawh u;
Bân seh chhûma, lu vun hîk tûra
Sakeibaknei biru ang hi a ni.
Ram ṭha ber an thlang a,
Israel hruaitute an pun khâwm khân
Hotu chanvo an chantîr a,
Dana thlah chungchâng hetiangin a sawi:
“Dana chu sakeibakneituai;
Basan ram aṭangin a lo zuang chhuak a ni.”
Naftali chungchâng hetiangin a sawi:
“Naftali chuan
malsâwmna a dawng a,
Hnianghnârin duhsakna a dawng;
A ram chuan dîl aṭangin chhim lam a thleng.”
Asera chungchâng hetiangin a sawi:
“Fa dangte aiin Asera chu a nihlawh e,
A unaute duhsakna dawng sela,
A ke chu hriakah chiah rawh se.
Thîr leh dârin an khua chu an kalh ang a,
Him takin chêng reng rawh se.”
“Israel-te u, in Pathian ang hi pathian dang an awm lo,
Ṭanpui tûr che u-in ropui taka chhûm chunga chuangin
Vân khi a fang zung zung.
Chatuan Pathian chu in vêngtu a ni,
A bân chak chuan a hum ṭhîn che u a,
In hmaah hmêlma a hnawt chhuak a,
‘Tiral vek rawh u,’ a ti.
Jakoba thlah Israel-te chu muang takin an awm ta a,
Buh leh uain tamna ramah an awm der der,
Vân daifîm châwm len te chu an ring.
Aw Israel, i va nihlawh kher êm!
Nang ang rêng tu mah an awm lo,
I himna tûr leh hnehtu i nih theih nân
I hmêlmaten khawngaih an dîl ang che;
Nangin i lo rapbet ang.”
Mosia chu Moab phai, Jeriko khaw ep aṭang chuan Nebo tlângchhîp, Pisga an tihah chuan a lâwn chho va.
Naftalia te, Manasea te, leh Efraima te ram chu Mediteranean tuipui thlengin a thlîr a.
Judai ram chhim lam ram, Zoar aṭanga Tûm khawpui Jeriko khaw thlengin a thlîrtîr bawk a.
Beth-peor khaw dep, Moab phaiah chuan a phûm a, tûn thlengin tu man a thlân awmna chu an hre lo.
A thih chuan Mosia chu kum za leh sawmhnih a upa a ni a, a mit pawh a la thim lo, a la chak hle a ni.
Moab phaiah chuan Israel-te chuan ni sawmthum an sûn a.
Nuna fapa Josua chu Mosian a aiawhtua a ruat a nih avângin a fing êm êm a, Israel-te chuan Josua thu chu an zâwm a, Mosian
Israel zîngah Mosia ang zâwlnei an awm ngai lo;
Aigupta lal leh a ṭhuihruaite mit hmuhah leh an ram chhûngah te Mosia hmanga thil mak leh chhinchhiahna ropui a tih ang ti tûrin zâwlnei dang tu mah a hmang ngai lo.
Israel-te hmuha thil ropui leh hlauhawm, Mosia tih ang ti ve zâwlnei dang an awm hek lo.
“Ka chhiahhlawh Mosia chu a thi ta a, Israel mi zawng zawng hi Jordan lui kânpui rawh, ka pêk tûr rama kal tûrin inpuahchah rawh u.
Mosia hnêna ka hrilh tawh ang khân in kephaha in rah apiang, nangni, ka mite hi ka pe ang che u.
Chhim lam thlalêr aṭanga hmâr lam Lebanon tlâng chhak lam Eufretis luipui aṭanga khawthlang lam Hit mite ram, Mediteranean tuipui thlengin in ram a ni ang.
Josua, i dam chhûngin, tu man an chelh lo vang che. Mosia hnêna ka awm ang khân i hnênah pawh ka awm reng ang a, ka awmpui reng ang chia, ka thlahthlam tawp lo vang che.
Huai takin ṭan la rawh; tichuan, an thlahtute hnêna pêk ka tiam tawh ram chu i luahpui dâwn nia.
Huai takin ṭan la vak phawt mai rawh; Mosian ka dân a hrilh che kha zâwm vek la, pakhat tê mah ngaihthah suh; tichuan, kawng engkimah i hmuingîl ang.
Eng lai mahin ka dân bu chhûnga thu ziakte chu chhiar theihnghilh suh, i zawm vek theih nân a chhûn a zânin sawi ṭhîn ang che; tichuan, kawng engkimah i tluang ngei ang.
Huai takin ṭang rawh ka tih che kha hre reng rawh, hlau suh la, zâm hek suh; kei,
Josua chuan Israel-ho hruaitute hnênah,
“Riahhmunah kal vek ula, mite hnênah, ‘Ni thum chhûngin,
Reuben-ho te, Gad-ho te leh Manase-ho zâtve te hnênah Josua chuan,
in nupui te, in fanau te, in ran vulh te chu he laiah hian an lo awm ang a, in zînga râlthuam kengte hi chuan lui in lo kai hmasa ang a, in unau Israel-te hi in pui tûr a ni.
in Pathianin a pêk tûr che u ram, Jordan lui khawthlang lam chu an luah fel a, Israel hnamten an awmna tûr ṭheuhva him taka an awm hunah chauh in kîr thei ang a, Jordan chhak lam ram,
Josua chu an chhâng a, “Min hrilh apiang kan ti ang e, kal rawh u i tihna apiangah kan kal zêl ang.
Mosia thu kan awih ṭhîn ang khân i thu pawh kan awih ang;
I thu kalha, i thupêk zâwm duh lo chu tihlum mai ang che. Huai takin ṭan la sauh sauh phawt mai teh,” an ti a.

Nuna fapa Josua chuan Sitim ruam aṭang chuan enthlatu tûr mi pahnih a tîr a, “Ram chu a rûkin va en thlithlai teh u, Jeriko khua phei chu en chiang zual ang che u,” a ti a. Khua an va thlen chuan riah tumin nawhchizuar Rahabi in an pan a.
Jeriko lal chuan, Israel-te tirh enthlatute chu chumi zân chuan an lo thleng tih a lo hriatin
Rahabi hnênah, “I ina lo thlengte kha ram en thlithlai tûra lo kal an ni, han hruai rawh,” ti tûrin mi a tîr a.
Chu nu chuan mikhual pahnihte chu a hruai a, a thukru a, “Mi pahnih chu an lo thleng ngei mai a, khawi lam mi nge an nih ka hre hauh lo.
Khaw thim dâwn ṭêp, kulh kawngka khâr hma chiah khân an chhuak leh ta a nih kha: khawi lamah nge an kal dâwn ka hre miah lo; ûm thuai ula, in la ûm pha hman ang,” a ti a.
Chu mite chu in chungah a hruai a, ziza kuang a pho zîngah chuan a thukru a ni.
Lal mi tirhte chu Israel-te ûm tûr chuan an tlân chhuak a, kulh kawngkapui chu an khâr leh a, Jordan lui thlengin an ûm a.
An mut hmain Rahabi chu in chungah a chho va.
An hnênah, “
Hêng lai mite hi hlau lo che u tu mah an awm lo, an zâm zo ta. Aigupta ram in chhuahsan a,
Chûng chu kan hriatin kan zâm chhia a, nangmahni hlauvin mu leh mal pawh kan nei tawh lo; in Pathian,
Ka tih ṭhat che u ang bawkin kan chhûnga min ti ṭha ve tûrin in Pathian hming chhâlin thu tiam ula, chumi hriatna tûr chuan chhinchhiahna min pe ang che u.
Ka pa te, ka nu te, ka nuṭate leh ka laizâwn te, an chhûngkuain zuah ang che u, min that lo tûrin thu tiam rawh u,” a ti a.
Chûng mite chuan, “Min hum chuan kan hum ngei ang che; kan lo kal dân hi tu mah i hrilh loh chuan, ram hi
Khaw kulh bang ringa in nei a ni a, tukverh aṭang chuan anni chu hruizênin a thlâk thla a.
“Tlâng lamah in kal loh chuan ûmtuten an hmu mai ang che u, ni thum biru ula, a rawn ûmtu che u an lo kîr hunah in duh duhnaah in kal dâwn nia,” a ti a.
Mite chuan, “I tih ang chuan thu kan tiam ang a, hetianga i tih ve loh erawh chuan a mawh kan phur lo vang.
He ram kan lo thlen hunah he la sen hi min thlâkna tukverhah ṭâwn bet ang che. I pa te, i nu te, i nuṭate leh i pa chhûngte i inah hian ko khâwm la;
khawlaiah tu mah chhuak suh se; chhuak an awm chuan an thisen mawh chu anmahniin an phur ang.
Kan thu hi tu mah i hrilh tûr a ni lo, i hrilh vaih chuan keini pawhin thu min tiamtîr ang hian kan ti bîk lo vang,” an ti a.
Ani chuan, “In thu ang chuan ni rawh se,” a ti a. A kaltîr a, an chhuak ta a. La sen chu tukverhah chuan a ṭâwn bet a.
Tlâng lamah chuan an kal a, ni thum an biru a. Ûmtute chuan an rawn zawng haw zêl a; mahse, an hmu lo.
Chu mite pahnih chu tlâng lam ata an lo chhuak a, lui an kân a, Josua hnên an lo thleng a, an thil tawh zawng zawng chu an hrilh a.
Josua hnênah, “
A tûkah Josua hovin Israel-te chu zîng takah an tho va, Sitim zâwl aṭang chuan lui bulah an insawn a, lui an kân hmain an riak a.
Chumi tûk tûk lehah chuan hotute chuan bûk chu an fang a,
In kalna ngai lohva kal tûr in ni a, an hnung in zui zêl dâwn nia; amaherawhchu, Thuthlung Bâwm hnaih lutuk suh ang che u, tawng sânghnih vêl in inkârah tla rawh se,” an ti a.
Josua chuan mipui hnênah, “Inthian thianghlim rawh u, naktûk hian
Josua chuan puithiamho hnênah, “Thuthlung Bâwm chu zâwn ula, kal hmasa rawh u le,” a ti a.
Puithiamte chu Jordan lui kamah tui daia ding tûrin hrilh rawh,” a ti a.
Josua chuan Israel mite hnênah, “Lo kal ula,
Josua chuan, “Pathian nung chu in zîngah a awm tih leh Kanan mite leh Jebus mite chu in hmaah a hnawt chhuak ngei dâwn tih hetiang hian in hria ang.
Jordan luiah in hma hruaiin khawvêl zawng zawng
Mi sâwm leh pahnih, Israel hnam tina mi pakhat ṭheuh thlang chhuak ula,
khawvêl zawng zawng
Mipui chu Jordan kai tum chuan an puan in aṭang chuan an chhuak a; Thuthlung Bâwm zâwntu puithiamte chu an kal hmasa a.
Chutih lai chu buh seng hun, Jordan lui len lai a ni a, a kuang a liam hial a. Thuthlung Bâwm zâwntuten Jordan lui an han dai chuan,

chhak lam aṭanga tui lo luang chu a chat a, a hnâr lamah Zarethan bul Adam khawpui thlengin a tling khâwm a. Araba lam Tuipui Thi a luang lût ṭhîn chu a kang chat ta vek a; Jeriko khaw bul maiah mipui chuan lui chu an kal kai ta a.
Israel mite chu an zavaiin lei chârah Jordan lui chu an kal kai a; Thuthlung Bâwm zâwntute chu li laiah chuan leichârah mipui kai zawh hma chu an ding a.
Hnam puma Jordan lui an kai zawh vek hnu chuan
“Israel hnam tin zînga in thlan chhuah mi sâwm leh pahnihte khân,
Jordan luia puithiamte dinna aṭangin lung sâwm leh pahnih, pakhat ṭheuhvin, pu chhuak sela, zânina in riahna tûrah dah teh se,” a ti a.
Josua chuan hnam tin aṭanga Israel miten an thlan chhuah mi sâwm leh pahnihte chu a ko va,
an hnênah, “
chûng lung chu
Josua thu ang chuan Israel-te chuan an ti a, Jordan lui ata lung sâwm leh pahnih, Josua hnêna
Josua chuan Thuthlung Bâwm zâwntute dinnaah tak, Jordan luiah chuan, lung a dahtîr bawk a, tûn thlengin chûng chu a la awm a ni.
Bâwm zâwntu puithiamte chu luiah chuan an ding a, mipui chu an kal kai sawk sawk a.
An kai vek hnu chuan
Reuben-ho te, Gad-ho te leh Manase-ho zâtve te chuan hriamhrei kengin, Mosia hnêna thupêk ang khân, mipui hma an hruai a.
hmaa indo peih reng mi sîngli laiin Jeriko bul zâwl an va thleng ta a.
Chumi ni chuan Israel zawng zawng hmuhah
“Thuthlung Bâwm zâwntu puithiamte kha Jordan lui ata lo chhuak rawh se,” a ti a.
Josuan puithiamho hnênah, “Jordan lui ata kha lo chhuak rawh u le,” a ti a.
Thuthlung Bâwm zâwntute Jordan lui ata an lo chhuaha, lui kam lei an rah veleh Jordan tui chu a luang leh ta dûl dûl a, a hma ang khân a kuang a liam hial a.
Jordan lui chu thla khatna ni sâwm ni-in an kal kai a ni. Jeriko chhak lam ramri bul Gilgal-ah bûk an khuar a.
Jordan lui aṭanga an lung lâk chu Josua chuan Gilgal-ah chuan a phun a.
Israel mite hnênah chuan, “Nakin hnuah in faten an pate hnênah, ‘hêng lung hi engtihna nge?’ tia an zawh che u hunah,
‘He laiah hian Israel-ten leichârah lui an kal kai a ni,’ in ti dâwn nia.
Tuipui Sen kân hmaa tuipui tui a tichat ang bawk khân
Hêng avâng hian khawvêla hnam tinin

Jordan lui thlang lama awm, Amor lal zawng zawng leh Mediteranean kama Kanan lal awm zawng zawngin Israel-ten Jordan an kân chhûng zawng lui tui chu a tihchahsak tih an lo hriat chuan an zâm chhe zo ta a.
Chutih lai chuan
Josua chuan meilung hriam a siam a, Israel-te chu Gibeat-haaralot-ah an serh a tantîr a.
Aigupta ram aṭanga râlkai chin lo chhuak zawng zawng chu thlalêrah an thi vek tawh a,
an chhuah tirh khân serh an tan vek a ni; an lo kal chhûnga piangte erawh chu an serh la tan loh a ni.
Israel mite chu thlalêrah kum sawmli an vâkvai a, Aigupta ram ata an chhuah aṭanga râlkai tawh chin chu an thi hman vek a ni.
An aiah, an fate a tipuitling a, chûng mite chu a ni Josuan serh a tansakte chu; kawngah an serh an la tan lo a ni.
Mi zawng zawng serh an tan hnu chuan an dam hma chu bûkah an awm a.
Gilgal-ah chuan Israel-ten bûk an khuar a, Jeriko phaizâwlah chuan chumi thla, ni sâwm leh pali ni chuan Kalhlên kût an hmang a.
Kalhlên kût zawh tûkah chuan, chu rama thar barli chhangphut, dawidim telh loh chhang leh chhangpêr an ei ve ta a.
Chu ram buh an ei tûk aṭang chuan mana pawh a tla ta lo va. Israel-te chuan mana ei tûr an nei ta lo va, chumi kum aṭang chuan Kanan ram buhbâl thar an ring ta a.
Jeriko bul lawka a awm laiin Josua chuan a han en a, mi pakhat, khandaih keng hi a hmaah a lo ding reng a, a han hnaih a, “Kan sipai nge i nih a, hmêlma sipai?” a ti a.
“A khawia mah ka ni lo,
Israel-te luh theih loh tûrin Jeriko kulh chu a inkhâr tlat a; tu mah an chhuak thei lo va, an lût thei hek lo.
chuan Josua hnênah, “Jeriko khua chu an lal leh a sipai huaite nên ka pe tawh a che.
Khua chu hual la, ni tin vawi khat, râlkai chin chuan kal hual ṭhîn rawh se; chutiangin ni ruk in ti ang a,
a ni sarih ni chuan puithiam pasarihin berâmpa ki tawtawrâwt kengin Thuthlung Bâwm zâwntute hma an hruai ang a, berâm ki chu an hâm ang a, vawi sarih in kal hual tûr a ni.

Tawtawrâwt chu fân ruaiin an hâm ang a, chu chu in hriat veleh theihtâwp chhuahin mi zawng zawng au dur dur ula; kulh chu a chim rup mai ang; mahni hma zâwn ṭheuhvah in tlân lût mai thei ang,” a ti a.
Nuna fapa Josua chuan puithiamho chu a ko va, “
Mipui hnênah, “Kal ula, khua chu kal hual rawh u,
Josuan mipui hnêna thu a sawi zawh chuan, a tih ang chuan an ti a; tawtawrâwt keng puithiam pasarih chuan tawtawrâwt chu an hâm a;
Tawtawrâwt hâmho puithiam hmaah râlthuam keng an kal a, Thuthlung Bâwm hnungah râlthuam kengten hnung an dâl a. Tawtawrâwt chu chhum lo chat lovin an hâm a.
Josua chuan mipui hnênah, “Au rawh u’ ka tih hunah theihtâwpin in au dâwn nia, chumi hma chuan au tûr a ni lo,” a ti a.
A tûkah Josua chu zîng takah a tho va, puithiamho chuan bâwm chu an zâwn leh a.
Râlthuam kengin hma an hruai a, puithiam pasarih, tawtawrâwt kengin an zui a, tawtawrâwt chu chhum lo chat lovin an hâm a; Thuthlung Bâwm zâwntute chu râlthuam kengin an rawn chhawm a.
A ni hnihnaah pawh khua chu vawi khat an kal hual a, bûk lamah an haw leh a. Chutiang hlîr chuan ni ruk an ti a.
A ni sarih ni erawh chuan kâwl ênah an tho va, an tih dân pângngaiin khua chu an kal hual leh a; chumi ni erawh chuan vawi sarih an kal hual a.
An kal hual vawi sarihnaah chuan Josuan, “Au rawh u le,
a khaw pum leh a chhûnga awm zawng zawng te hi tihchhiat tûra
Serh hran tlat tawh chu in awt palh ang e, pakhat tê pawh in la tûr a ni lo, in lâk chuan Israel-ho bûkah chhiatna râpthlâk tak in tithleng ang.
Tangkarua te, rangkachak te, dâr te leh thîr te erawh chu
Tichuan, puithiamte chuan tawtawrâwt chu fân ruaiin an han hâm a, miten chu chu an hriatin an au chiam a, kulh bang chu a chim ta a; mahni hma zâwn zâwnah an lût ta sung sung a, khua chu an la ta a.
Khua chu an tichhe vek a, a chhûnga awm a hmei a pa, a pui a pang, bâwng te, berâm te, sabengtung te nên khandaihin an sât hlum vek a.
Ram enthlatute hnênah, Josua chuan, “Nawhchizuar inah kal ula, kha nu kha a neih zawng zawng nên va hruai chhuak rawh u,” a ti a.
Enthlatu tlangvâl, a ina thlengte khân Rahabi chu a pa te, a nuṭa te leh a laichîn hnai a awmpui te chu a neih zawng zawng nên an hruai chhuak a, Israel riahhmunah chuan an hruai a.
Khua leh a chhûnga awm zawng zawng chu an hâl vek a; tangkarua te, rangkachak te, darbêl te, thîr te erawh chu
Jeriko enthla tûra Josua mi tirhte a lo hum avângin nawhchizuar Rahabi chu a pa chhûngte nên, a neih zawng zawng nên Josua chuan a zuah a, Israel zîngah tûn thlengin an la tel ta reng a ni.
Chûng zawh chuan Josuan mipui chu a vau ta a:
“Jeriko khaw din leh tumtu chuan
A lungphûm rem lehtu chuan a fa tîr chân sela,
A kulh kawngka siamtu chuan a fa tlum chân rawh se,” a ti a.
Israel-te chuan thil serh hran tlat chu an pawisa lo va; Juda thlah Zera fa, Karmia fapa Akana chuan thil serh tlat ṭhenkhat chu a lo la a, Israel-te chungah
Bethel chhak lam Beth-aven bula awm Ai khua en thlithlai tûrin Josua chuan Jeriko aṭangin mi a tîr a. Anni chu an chho va, Ai chu an han en thlithlai a.
An lo haw a, Josua hnênah, “Mi zawng zawng chho teh suh se, mi sânghnih sângthum vêl chauh chho sela, Ai chu han bei rawh se, an tlêm khawp mai; mi zawng zawng tihhah a ṭûl lo,” an ti a.
Mi sângthum vêl chuan an han bei a, Ai khaw mite hmaah chuan an tlânchhe ta a.
Ai khaw mite chuan kulh aṭangin Sebarim thleng rawkin an ûm a, an tlân chhuk chu mi sawmthum leh paruk lai an that a. Israel-ho rilru chu a hnual a, an zâm ta hle a.
Josua leh Israel upate chuan an puan an pawtthlêr a,
Josua chuan, “A va pawî em,
Aw
Kanan mite leh hêng rama awmten an hriatin min hual ang a, min that vek ang a, a mite pawh a hum zo lo an ti ngei ang che le,” a ti a.
Israel-ten thil sual an ti alâwm. Ka thuthlung zâwm tûra ka tih chu an bawhchhia a, thil serh hran tlat aṭangin lâk an nei, an ru a, an zêp a, an thawmhnaw zîngah an thukru lehnghâl a.
Chuvâng alâwm Israel-te hian an hmêlmate an ngam lohva, an tlânchhiat ni; ânchhia an dawng a ni. Lâk loh tûr in lâk kha in tihboral hma chu in hnênah ka awm lo vang.

Tho la, mipuite chu thian fai la, an hnênah, naktûkah chuan inthian fai tûrin hrilh rawh. Israel-te Pathian chuan, ‘Israel-te u, in zîngah ânchhia a awm a ni, chu chu in zîng ata in then fai hma chuan in hmêlmate in ngam lo vang,’ a ti e, tiin hrilh rawh.
Tichuan, zîngah a hnam hnamin lo kal sela,
Thil serh tlat latu man chhuah chu hâl tûr a ni, a neih zawng zawng nên,
Josua chu zîng takah a tho va, a hnam hnamin Israel-ho chu an lo kal a, Juda thlahte chu man an ni ta a.
Juda thlah zîngah Zer chi man an ni leh a, Zer-ho zîng aṭang chuan Zabdia chhûng man an ni leh a.
Chu mi chhûngte zîng aṭang chuan Karmia fapa Akana, Zabdia tupa chu man a ni ta a.
Josua chuan Akana hnênah, “Ka fapa, Israel-te Pathian,
Akana chuan Josua chu a chhâng a, “Israel-te Pathian,

Kan thil man zîngah Babulon puan mawi tak, tangkarua sekel za bûk vêl leh sekel sawmnga vêl bûk rangkachak nên ka hmu a, ka awt êm a, ka la ta mai a ni. Ka puanin chhuatah ka phûm a, a hnuaihnung berah tangkarua chu ka dah kha,” a ti a.
Josua chuan mi a tîr a, puan inah chuan an kal a, a lo thukru ngei rêng a, a hnuai berah tangkarua chu a lo awm a.
Puan in ata chu an la a, Josua leh Israel-te hmaah chuan an rawn la a,
Josua leh Israel-te chuan Zera fapa Akana chu puan te, tangkarua te, rangkachakte leh a nupui fanau te, a bâwng te, a sabengtung te, a berâm te leh a neih zawng zawng nên Akor ruamah an hruai a.
Josua chuan, “Min timangang hle mai a,
A chungah chuan lung an vawm vûm thûr a,

An khua leh an lal chu Jeriko khua leh an lal i sawisak ang khân sawisa ang che; tûn ṭum hi chuan an berâm leh an rante chu mahni tân in lâksak dâwn nia. Khaw hnung lam aṭangin bei thut ang che u,” a ti a.
Ai khua bei tûr chuan Josua leh a hote chu an insiam a. Josua chuan mi fel deuh deuh sîngthum a thlang chhuak a, zânah a kal chhohtîr a.
“Khua chu a hnung lamah châng ru ula, khua aṭanga hla lovah biru ang che u, inring reng ang che u.
Ka mite nên khua chu a hma lamah kan rawn bei ang a, min bei tûrin an lo chhuak ang a; a hma angin kan tlânchhe der ang a;
khua aṭanga hla fe thleng min ûm hnuah, a hma ang khân kan tlânchhe tak tak emaw an ti ang.
In bihrûkna ata in lo chhuak ang a, khua chu la ang che u. In Pathian,
Khua in lâk hnu chuan
Josua chuan anni chu a kaltîr a, Ai khaw thlang lam Bethel nêna an inkârah chuan an hual ru a, zânah Josua ho chu puan inah an riak a.
Josua chu zîngah a tho va, a mite chu a ko khâwm a, Israel upate nên Ai khua chu an pan ta a.
Khaw kawtchhuah, hmâr lam tlângah a hote chuan ṭanhmun an khuar a, Ai khua nêna an inkârah chuan ruam a awm.
Ai khawthlang lam, Bethel nêna an inkârah a rûka châng tûr mi sângnga a dah a.
A sipai bupui chu hmâr lam aṭanga Ai khua bei tûr chuan an inrâlring a, khaw thlang lama lo châng tâwk an awm bawk a. Chumi zân chuan Josua chu ruamah chuan a kal a.

Ai khaw lal chuan a lo hmu a, a mite nên zîngah an tho va; Israel-ho nêna an inbeihna Araba ruamah khân Israel-ho bei tûr chuan an chhuk leh ta a, an hnung lam aṭangin khawpui bei tûr biru an awm tih an hre lo.
Josua leh Israel-te chu hlau âwm takin thlalêr lam panin an tlânchhe der a,
Ai khuaa mite chu ûm tûrin an inpun khâwm a, Josua chu an ûm a, khua chu an chhuahsan ta vek a.
Ai khaw mi zawng zawngin Israel-te chu an ûm a, khaw vêngtu pakhat mah an awm lo, khua chu a inhawng huai mai.
Josuan a fei ken chuan Ai khua chu a tin a. Chutia a han tin vêleh chângtute kha an bihrûkna ata an lo zuang chhuak a, khuaah an lût a, an la ta mai a; khua chu an hâl ta hluah hluah a.
Ai khaw mite chu an han lehhawi a, an khaw kâng khu ngun ngun chu an hmu a, thlalêr pana tlânho khân an rawn bei lêt bawk a, tlânna tûr lam rêng an hre ta lo va.
Josua leh Israel-te chuan châng rutute khân khua chu an la a, an hâl khu ngun ngun ta tih an hmuh chuan an lêt leh a, Ai mite chu an that ṭan ta a.
Khaw latute khân an rawn ûm bawk a, Israel-te chuan an kârcheh a, tu mah dam emaw, tlân chhuak emaw awm miah lovin an that a.
Ai khaw lal erawh chu a nungin an man a, Josua hnênah an rawn hruai a.
Ai khaw mi, Israel ûmtute kha, thlalêrah an lo that vek a, an sah hlum zawh chuan Ai khuaah Israel mi zawng zawng chu an kal a, chuta mi zawng zawng chu khandaihin an that vek a.
Ai khaw mi, chumi nia an thah chu a hmei a pain mi sîngkhat leh sânghnih an tling.
Ai khaw mi an thah zawh fai phiar hma chu Josua chuan a fei kha a lek reng a.
Josua hnêna
Tin, Josua chuan Ai khua chu a hâl chim vek a, tûn thlengin a ram a, bawlhhlawh vûm mai a ni ta.

Ai khaw lal chu a khai hlum a, tlai thlengin thingah a khai a, ni a tlâk chuan Josua thu angin a ruang chu an la thla a, khaw kulh kawngka sîrah chuan an paih a, lung an vawm hnan thûr a, tûn thlengin chûng chu a la awm.
Josua chuan Israel-te Pathian,
chhiahhlawh Mosian Israel-te hnêna thu a pêk, Mosia Dân bu-a ziak angin lung chher loh, thîra chher lohvin maichâm an siam a,
Israel-ho hmuh lai ngeiin Josua chuan Mosia dân chu lungah chuan a ziak chhuak a.

Israel-ho chu an upa te, hruaitu te, rorêltu te leh an zînga hnam dang awm vê te nên puithiam Levia-ho zâwn, Thuthlung Bâwm hawiin, lehlam lehlamah chuan an ding a. A zâtve chuan Gerizim tlâng an hmachhawn a, a zâtve chuan Ebal tlâng chu an hmachhawn a. Israel mipuite mal an sâwmsak dâwnin hetianga din ṭhin tûr tih Mosia thupêk ang khân an ding a.
An din fel chuan Dân bu-a thu zawng zawng, malsâwmna thu te, ânchhe dawn tûr thu te chu Josuan a chhiar chhuak a.
Israel mipui hmaah, hmeichhia te, naupangte leh an zînga kal ve hnam dang mite hmaah Mosia thupêk zawng zawng chu chhiar hmaih a nei hauh lo.

Jordan thlang lam tlângrama awm te, tlâng bulṭhut rama awmte leh Mediteranean tuipui kama Lebanon tlâng thlenga awm Hit-ho lal te, Amor lal te, Kanan lal te, Periz lal te, Hiv-ho lal te, Jebus lal te chuan Israel-ho chakzia an lo hria a.
An inko khâwm a, Josua leh Israel-te chu lo beih rawn zai an rêl a.
Gibeon khuaa awm Hiv mite chuan Jeriko leh Ai khua Josuan a sawisak dân an hriat chuan,
finrâwl an thawh ve ta a. Palai ni âwm tak tak an insiam a, ip hlui tak hi sabengtung an phurhtîr a, an uain savun ip, hlui peh ver vurte chu bel ṭup a ni a,
pheikhawk hlui, bel ṭiam ṭuam an bun a, kawr hlui tak tak an ha a. An chhang kente chu a khirin a hmuar uar a.
Israel-te riahhmun Gilgal-ah chuan Josua an rawn pan a, a hnênah, “Ram hla tak aṭangin kan lo kal a, inremna thu i thlung ang u,” an ti a.
Israel mite chuan, “He lai hnaia mite in nih chuan thu kan thlunpui thei lo vang che u,” an ti a.
Josua hnênah, “I chhiahhlawh kan nih hi,” an ti a. Josua chuan, “Tute nge in nih? Khawi lam aṭanga lo kal nge in nih?” a ti a.
Anni chuan, “I chhiahhlawhte hi ram hla tak aṭanga lo kal kan ni. In Pathian,
Jordan râla Amor lal Sihona, Hesbon lal chungah te, Basan lal Astarot khua Oga chunga a thil tih te kan lo hria a.
Kan upate leh kan ram mite chuan, ‘Zan riak chaw keng ula, anni chu va hmu ula, in chhiahhlawh kan ni a, thu min thlunpui rawh u, va ti ang che u,’ min ti a.
Kan chhang kente hi kan lo chhuah tûk chuan a la lum thar thar a; tûnah zawng a khirin a hmuar tawh hi.
Kan savun ip tharte pawh a peh zo tawh a, kan thawmhnaw te, kan pheikhawkte pawh kan lo kal thui êm tawh avângin a hniar veng vung tawh a nih hi,” an ti a.
Israel mite chuan an chhang chu an lo eisak a.
Josua chuan ṭhiana inhmang tûrin thu a thlunpui a, tihhlum loh a tiam a, Israel pungkhâwmho hruaitute pawh chuan an tiam a.
Thu an tiam hnu ni thum lekah chuan chûng mite chu an ṭhenawm, an bul lawka awmte an ni tih an hre ta a.
Tichuan, Israel-hote chu ân insawn a, ni thum an kal a; chung mite awmna khua Gibeon te, Kafira te, Kiriat-jearim te chu an va thleng a.
Chûng mite chu Israel mite chuan an khawih thiang lo, Israel-te Pathian,
Hruaitute chuan pungkhâwmho hnênah, “Israel-te Pathian,
Kan thutiam avângin an nun kan zuah tûr a ni: chutilo chu, Pathian kut kan tuar ang.
Zuah ila, kan thing phurtuah leh tui chawitu-ah an ṭang dâwn nia,” an ti a.
Gibeon mite chu Josuan a ko va, “Kan bul hnai maia awm si, ram hla tak aṭanga lo kal kan ni tiin engtizia nge min bum le?
Hetianga in tih avângin Pathian ânchhia in dawng ta, Pathian ina tuah tûr thing phurtu leh tui chawitu atân chhiahhlawh in ni reng dâwn a ni,” a ti a.
Josua chu an chhâng a, “
In kutah kan awm hi, ṭha in tih ang chuan min ti ang chu,” an ti a.
Josua chuan hetiang hian a ti ta a: anni chu a hum a, Israel-ten an thah a khap a,
bawihah a siam thung a. Israel mipuite leh

Chutih lai chuan Jerusalem khaw lal chu Adoni-zedeka a ni a. Josuan Ai khua a lâk a, a tihchhiat vek thu te, Jeriko leh an lal a sawisak ang khân Ai khua leh an lal a sawisa tih thu te a lo hria a; Gibeon mite pawhin Israel-te nên inremna an nei a, an zîngah an tel ve ta tih te an lo hre bawk a.
Chuvângin, Jerusalem mite chuan an hlau hle a; Gibeon khua phei chu lal nei khaw dang tluk bawka tam an ni a. Ai khua ai pawhin an tam, indo pawh an thiam hle a ni.
Jerusalem lal Adoni-zedeka chuan Hebron lal Hohama te, Jarmut khaw lal Pirama te, Lakis lal Jafia te, Eglon lal Debira te chu thu a chah a.
“Lo kal ula, Gibeon-ho hi i bei teh ang, Josua leh Israel-te nên inremna an lo siam reng alâwm,” a ti a.
Amor-ho lal panga, Jerusalem lal te, Hebron lal te, Jarmut lal te, Lakis lal te, Eglon lal te chu an ṭang rual a, Gibeon khua chu an hual a, an bei ta a.
Gibeon mite chuan Gilgal-ah Josua hnênah zualko an tlântîr a, “I chhiahhlawhte hi thlahthlam teh suh, lo chho vat la, min han pui rawh,” an ti a.
Tichuan, Josua chu Gilgal aṭang chuan indo mi, mi huaisen rualte chu hruaiin a chho ta a.
Gilgal aṭang chuan zankhuain Gibeon thlengin an kal a. Amor mite chu an bei ta thut a.
Amor mite chuan Israel-te an hmuh chuan
Kalkawnga an tlân laiin
“Chungtûrni, ding reng rawh,
Gibeon chungah
Chhawrthlapui, nang pawh
Aijalon ruamah ding ve rawh,” a ti a.
Ni chu a ding a, thla chu a che bawk lo.
An hmêlmate an sawisak nek hma chu.
‘Jasar lehkhabu’ an tihah chu thu chu ziak a ni. Vânlaizâwlah ni chu a ding a, ni khat hu lai a ding.
Chutiang khawpa mihring thu mai
Chûng hnu chuan Josua leh a hote chu an riahhmun Gilgal-ah an kîr leh ta a.
Amor lal panga kha an tlânchhia a, Makeda pûkah an biru a.
Josua hnênah, “Lal pangate kha kan hmu ta, Makeda pûkah an biru a ni,” an rawn ti a.
Josua chuan, “Pûk kawngka chu lung lian pui puiin chhîn ula, mi ṭhenkhat vêng tûrin dah rawh u.
Nangni erawh chuan hmêlmate chu tlân khalh ula, an khaw kulha an tlân lût tûr dang tlat rawh u,
Josua leh Israel-te chuan an hmêlmate chu an that chiam a, an that fai a ni deuh mai, an thah bâng tlêm chu an khaw kulhahte an tlân lût a.
Josua bûk khuarna Makeda-ah chuan a hote chu râlmuang takin an lo kal a; Israel-ho chu hnialkalh ngam rêng an awm lo.
Josua chuan, “Pûk kawngka kha hawng ula, lal pangate kha han hruai chhuak teh u,” a ti a.
Jerusalem lal te, Hebron lal te, Jarmut lal te, Lakis lal te leh Eglon lal te chu pûk ata an rawn hruai chhuak a.

Hêng lal pangate hi a hnêna an rawn hruai chuan Israel mite chu a ko khâwm a, a sipai hruai hotute hnênah chuan, “Lo kal ula, hêng lal pangate hi an nghâwngah rap rawh u,” a ti a. An lo kal a, an nghâwngah an rap a.
Josua chuan, “Hlau mah ta che u, zâm pawh zâm suh u, huai takin ṭang sauh sauh rawh u.
Chumi hnu chuan lalte chu Josua chuan a that a, thing pangaah a khai a; tlai thlengin an ruang chu a inkhai a.
Ni a tlâk dâwnah an ruang chu a lâk thlâktîr a, an bihrûkna pûkah chuan a paihtîr a, pûk kawngka chu lung lian pui puiin an chhîn a, tûn thlengin a la awm.
Chumi ni chuan Makeda khua chu Josua chuan a bei a, a la a, an lal pawh a man a, khuaa mi zawng zawng chu Jeriko lal a thah ang khân a that a.
Josua chu Makeda aṭang chuan Israel-hote nên Libna-ah an kal a, khua chu an bei a.
chuan chu khua leh an lal chu Israel-te kutah a pe a; khuaa mi zawng zawng chu an sât hlum a, tu mah nungdamin an chhuah lo. An lal pawh Jeriko lal an thah angin an that a.
Libna khua aṭang chuan Josua leh Israel-te chu Lakis khuaah an kal a, an hual a, an bei a.
Israel-te kutah Lakis khua chu
Gezer khaw lal Horama chu Libna khua pui tûrin a lo chho va, Josua chuan ani chu a sipaite nên a lo hneh a, pakhat mah hmaih lovin a lo that a.
Josua leh Israel-te chu Libna aṭang chuan Eglon khuaah an kal a, an hual a, an bei a.
Chumi ni vêk chuan an la a, chumi ni chuan mi awm zawng zawng an sât hlum phiar a, Lakis an sawisak ang bawk khân an sawisa a.
Josua leh Israel-te chu Eglon aṭang chuan Hebron khuaah an chho va, an bei a.

Khua chu an la a, chuta awm zawng zawng chu an lal nên lam an sât hlum a, an chhehvêl khuaa awmte pawh an sât hlum a. Eglon khua an tih ang khân Hebron pawh chu an tichhe vek a, tu mah nungdamin an chhuah lo.
Josua leh Israel-te chu an kir a, Debir khua an bei a.

Khua chu an la a, an lal chu an man a; an chhehvêl khuate pawh an la a. Chûnga awm zawng zawng chu an sât hlum vêk a, Josua chuan Debir khua leh an lal chu Libna khua leh an lal an tih ang khân a ti a.

Josua chuan ram chu a la ta vek a. Tlângram te, khawchhak tlâng pang te, khawthlang tlâng bulṭhut phai te, chhim lam ramte nên lam a la a, an lalte chu a hneh vek a, tu mah a zuah lo. Israel-te Pathian,
Kades-barnea aṭangin Gaza inkâr ram zawng zawng, Gosen ram pawh, Gibeon thlengin Josua chuan a la a.
Chûng rama lal zawng zawng leh an ram chu, Israel-te Pathian,
Josua leh Israel-te chu an riahhmun Gilgal-ah chuan an haw leh ta a.
Hêng thu hi Hazor lal Jabinan a lo hriat chuan Madon khaw lal Jobaba te, Simron khaw lal te, Aksaf khaw lal te,
hmâr lam tlângram lal te, Galili dîl chhim Araba khaw lal te, Mediteranean tuipui kam Dor khaw lal te,
khawchhak lam leh khawthlang lama Kanan lal awm te, Amor-ho lal te, Hit-ho lal te, Periz-ho lal te, tlângrama Jebus-ho lal te, Mizpa ram Hermon tlâng bula Hiv-ho lal te chu a pun khâwm a.
An sipaite nên an lo thawk a, tuipui kama ṭiau zât hiala tam an ni. Sakawr te, sakawr-tawlailîr te pawh an rawn keng ṭeuh va.
Hêng lalte hi an ṭangrual a, Israel-te bei tûrin Merom lui kamah ṭanhmun an khuar a.
Josua leh a hruai ṭhin indo mite chu an thawk chhuak a, Merom luiah chuan an va bei thut a.
chuan Israel-te kutah a pe a, an bei a, an thah zawh vek hma chu Misrefotmaim leh Sidon thleng rawkin an ûm a, chhak lamah Mizpa ruam thlengin an ûm bawk a.
thupêk angin Josua chuan an sakawr tha te chu a chhahsak a, an tawlailîrte chu a hâl a.
Josua chu a kîr a, Hazor khua a la a, an lal chu a sât hlum a, tûn hma chuan hêng lai khuaah Hazor hi khaw lian ber a ni ṭhîn.
Khuaa mi zawng zawng chu a sât hlum vek a, thaw thei tawh phawt chu zuah rêng a nei lo. Hazor khua chu a hâl a.
Josua chuan hêng khua zawng zawng hi a la vek a, an lalte pawh a man a,
Hazor khua, Josua hâl tih loh chu, Israel-te chuan an khaw tihchhiata in la dingte chu an hâl lo.
Hêng khuaa an râllâk sum leh rante chu Israel-te chuan mahni tân ṭheuh an nei a, mihring erawh chu an sât hlum vek a ni; thaw thei tawh phawt chu hmaih rêng an nei lo.
A chhiahhlawh Mosia hnênah
Josuan ram zawng zawng chu a la a, Negeb leh tlângram te, Gosen ram phai te, tlâng bulṭhut phai te, Jordan ruam te, Israel tlângram te, a vêl tlâng bulṭhut phai te chu a la vek a.
A ram lâk chuan chhim lamah Halak tlâng, Seir bul aṭangin hmâr lamah Baalgad, Lebanon ruam Hermon tlâng bul a thleng a. An lalte chu a hneh a, a man a, a that a.
Josua leh hêng lal zawng zawng hi rei tak an indo a ni.
Gibeon khuaa awm Hiv-ho chauh lo chu Israel-te nêna inbe rem khaw pakhat mah an awm lo, a lâkin an la vek a ni.
chuan Israel-te bei tûrin hêngho hi a tiluhlul a ni; Mosia hnêna

Josua chu a kal zêl a, tlângrama Hebron khuaah te, Debir khuaah te, Anab khuaah te, milian Anak an tih la awmte chu a that vek a. Judai leh Israel tlângrama awmte pawh an zavaiin, an khuate nên a tiral vek a.
Israel mite ramah chuan milian rêng an awm tawh lo. Gaza khuaah te, Gath khuaah te, Asdod khuaah te erawh chuan an la awm pheuh pheuh.
Mosia hnêna
Jordan chhak lam Arnon lui aṭanga Hermon tlâng thlengin Jordan luiruam ramte chu Israel-te chuan an hneh a, an neihsak tawh a.

Amor mi, Hesbon lal Sihona leh Basan lal Oga an hneh a. Sihona ram chuan Gilead chanve a huam a ni; Arnon luiruam ko chunga Aroer khua leh Arnon lui kama khua aṭangin Jabok lui a thleng a, chu chu Amon-ho nêna an inrina a ni.
An ram chuan Jordan kam chhak lam, Galili dîl aṭanga chhim lam lui phai zawng zawng, Beth-jesimot, Tuipui Thi chhak lam Pisga thlengin a huam bawk.
Basan lal Oga chu milian, Refaim an tih la dam awmchhun zînga mi a ni, Astarot leh Edrei khuaah a lal a.
A ram chuan Hermon tlâng te, Seleka te leh Basan ram zawng zawng, Gezer leh Maaka ramri thleng a huam a; Gilead ram zâtve leh Hesbon lal Sihona ramri thlengin a huam bawk.
Hêng lal pahnihte hi Mosia hovin Israel-te chuan an hneh a,

Hmâr lama Baal-gad, Lebanon ruama awm leh chhim lam Seir tlâng bula Halak tlâng inkâr ram zawng zawng, Jordan lui khawthlang lama awm leh an lalte chu Josua leh Israel-te chuan an hneh a. Chûng ram chu Josuan Israel hnamte hnênah ram chanpual atân a sem a.

Hei hian hêngte hi a huam: tlângram te, khawthlang lam tlâng bulṭhut te, Jordan luiruam te, a dawt tlâng bulṭhut zâwl te, chumi chhak tlâng te leh Negeb thlalêr te hi. Chûng rama lo awmte chu Hit mi te, Amor mi te, Kanan mi te, Periz mi te, Hiv mi te leh Jebus mi te an ni.
Lal an hneh, an thahte chu hêng hi an ni: Bethel khaw bula Ai khaw lal, Gezer lal;
Jerusalem lal, Hebron lal,
Jarmut lal, Lakis lal;
Eglon lal, Gezer lal;
Debir lal, Geder lal;
Horma lal, Arad lal;
Libna lal, Adulam lal;
Makeda lal, Bethel lal;
Tapua lal, Hefer lal;
Afek lal, Saron lal;
Madon lal, Hazor lal,
Simron-meron lal, Aksai lal;
Taanak lal, Megido lal;
Kades lal, Karmel tlânga Jokneam lal;
Mediteranean tuipui kam Dor lal, Gilgal-a Goim lal;
Tirza lal te hi. An lal thah zawng zawng chu an vaiin sawmthum leh pakhat an ni.
Josua chu a lo upa a, a tar ta hle a;
Filistia leh Gesur-ho awmna ram te,

chhim lam ram Avim-ho awmna te la lâk loh a ni. Aigupta ramri Sihor lui aṭanga hmâr lam Ekron thleng hian Kanan mite rama ngaih a ni. Filistia-ho chu Gaza-ah te, Asdod-ah te, Askelon-ah te, Gath-ah te lalah an ṭhu a ni.
Kanan-ho ram leh Sidon-ho ram Meara chu Amor ramri Afek thlengin la lâk loh a ni.
Gebal mite ram, Lebanon tlâng chhak lam Hermon tlâng bula Hamath kalkawng thleng lâk loh a la ni bawk.

“Lebanon tlâng leh Misrefot-maim inkâr tlângrama awm zawng zawng Sidon mite chu, keiman Israel mite hmaah ka la ûm chhuak ang; thu ka pêk che angin an ram chanpual atân Israel-te chu pe phawt mai rawh.
Khai le, ram hi Israel hnam kua leh Manasea thlah zâtve te hnênah, an ram chanpual atân sem rawh,” a ti a.
Manasea thlah zâtve te nên Reubena thlah leh Gada thlahte chuan Jordan chhak lamah ram chanpual tûr
Arnon luiruam ko chunga khua Aroer leh luidung khua aṭangin tlâng zâwl, Medeba leh Dibon inkâr,
Amor mi, Hesbon khaw lal Sihona ram zawng zawng Amon-ho ramri thlengin a huam a.
Gilead ram huamin Gesur-ho leh Maakat-ho awmna nên, Hermon tlâng leh Basan rama Seleka a thleng a.
Astarot leh Edrei lal Oga ram Basan te a huam a, ani chu Refaim la awmchhunte zînga mi a ni; Mosia khân chûngho chu a hneh a, a ûm chhuak a ni.
Gesur mite leh Maakat mite chu Israel-te chuan an ûm chhuak lo, tûn thlengin Israel-ho zîngah an la awm ve a ni.
Levia thlahte erawh chu ram chanpual an pe ve lo. Israel-te Pathian,
Mosian Reubena thlahte chu a chhûng chhûnga insem tûr ram a pe a nih kha.
An ram chhim lam ri chu Arnon luiruam ko chung Aroer khua leh lui kama khaw awm kha a ni; Medeba tlâng zâwl te,
Hesbon khua leh a chhehvêl khua, tlâng zâwla awm te, Dibon te, Mamoth-baal te, Beth-baal-meon te,
Jahaz leh Kedemot te, Mefaat te;
Kiriathaim te, Sibma te, Zereth-sahar, ruam zâwla awm te;
Beth-peor te, Pisga tlâng pang te, Beth-jesimot te a huam a.

Tlâng zâwl khua zawng zawng leh Amor mi Hesbon lal Sihona ram zawng zawng a huam bawk a. Ani chu Mosian a hneh a, Midian hotu Evia te, Rekema te, Zura te, Hura te leh Reba te pawh a huam tel a; hêngho hi Sihona hnuaia rorêltu an ni.
Israel miten Beora fapa Balaama, aienthiam chu an that bawk.
Khawthlang lama an ramri chu Jordan lui a ni. Reubena thlahte neih atân khîng khawpuite leh an chhehvêl khuate khi an pe a.
Mosia chuan Gada thlahte chu a chhûng chhûnga insem atân an ram chanpual tûr a pe a.
An ram chuan Jahaz leh Gilead khawpui zawng zawng a huam a, Amon-ho ram zâtve, Raba chhak lama awm Aroer a huam thleng a.
Hesbon leh Ramat-mizpa leh Betonim inkâr ram te, Mahanaim aṭanga Lo-debar ri inkâr te a huam bawk a.
Jordan luidungah chuan Beth-haram te, Beth-nimra te, Sukot te, Zafon te leh Hesbon lal Sihona ram ṭhînte a huam tel bawk a. Khawthlang lama an ramri chu Jordan lui, Galili dîl thlengin a ni.
Gada thlahte neih atân khîng khawpuite leh a chhehvêl khuate khi an pe a.
Mosia chuan Manasea thlah zâtve tân a chhûng chhûnga insem atân ram chanpual an neih tûr a pe a.
An ram chuan Mahanaim aṭanga Basan ram, Basan lal Oga ram zawng zawng a huam a, Basan ram Jair bial khaw sawmruk pawh a huam a ni.
Gilead bial zâtve, Astarot te, Edrei te, Oga ram Basan khawpuite chu a pe tel bawk a. Manasea fa Makira thlahte hnênah khîng ramte khi a pe a ni.
Moab phaia an awm lai khân, Jeriko khaw chhak lam ram chu khitiang khian Mosian a sem a.
Mosian Levia thlahte chu ram a ruatsak ve lo. Israel-te Pathian,
Jordan lui thlang lama Kanan ram chu Israel mite hnênah puithiam Eleazara te, Nuna fapa Josua te leh Israel hnam hruaitute chuan hetiang hian an sem a.
thupêk angin hnam kua leh a chanve chan tûrin ṭhum an vâwr a, an sem a.
Jordan chhak lama hnam hnih leh a chanve chu Mosian ram chanpual tûr a pe tawh a; an zîngah Levia chite ram a pe ve lo.
Josefa thlahte kha hnam hnih, Manasea leh Efraim hnamah ṭhen an ni a; mahse, Levia thlahte chu ram chanpual a pe ve lo. Awmna khua erawh chu an bâwngte leh berâm leh kêl tlatna tûr ram nên an pe a.
Mosia hnêna

Gilgal-a an awm laiin Juda thlah zînga mi ṭhenkhat Josua hnênah an lo kal a. An zînga pakhat, Keniz mi, Jefunea fapa Kaleba chuan Josua hnênah, “Kades-barnea kan awm laia Pathian mi Mosia hnêna kan pahniha chungchâng
chhiahhlawh Mosian he ram hi en thlithlai tûra min tirh khân kum sawmli-a upa ka ni a, thil ka hmuh dân ang chiah ka hrilh a nih kha.
Ka kalpui, ka unaute khân, mipui an tilunghnûr a, kei erawh chuan ka Pathian,
Kan Pathian,
Khai le, tûnah khatia Mosia hnêna
Mosian min tirh lai ang mai khân vawiinah pawh ka la chak a ni. Indonaah pawh kala, duh duha chhuakvâk theiin ka la chak a ni.
Chuvângin, kan kalpuite nêna thu kan thlen laia
Josua chuan mal a sâwmsak a, Jefunea fapa Kaleba chu ram chanpual atân Hebron chu a pe ta a.
Tichuan, Israel-te Pathian,
Hebron chu tûn hma chuan Kiriat-arba tih a ni ṭhîn a, chu chu Arba khua tihna a ni. Arba chu Anak-ho zîngah chuan lal ropui ber a ni. Ram chu a râlmuang ta a.
Juda thlahte, a chhûng chhûnga an insem tûr ram chuan chhim tâwpa Edom ram leh Zin thlalêr a thleng a.
Chhim lam ramri chu Tuipui Thi chhim lam kil tâwpah a inṭan a.
Chhim lam panin Akrabim kalkawng a kal a, Zin thlalêrah a lût a, Kades-barnea chhim lamah Hezron thlengin a kal a, Adar-ah a chho va, Karka lamah a inher a,
Azmon-ah a kal zêl a, Aigupta ramri luiah a chhuk a, lui chu zuiin Mediteranean tuipui a zu chhun a. Hei hi Judai ram chhim lam ri chu a ni.
Khawchhak lam ri chu Tuipui Thi a ni, Jordan lui chhuah thlengin a ni.
Hmâr lam ramri chu Jordan lui chhuahah a inṭan a, Beth-hogla-ah a chho va, Beth-araba hmâr lamah a kal a, Bohana lung a chhun a. Bohana hi Reubena fa a ni.
Akor ruam aṭangin Debir khuaah a chho va, hmâr lam panin chumi ram chhim tâwpa Adumin kalkawng hawi zâwnga awm Gilgal a thleng a. En-semes tuikhurah a kal zêl a, En-rogel-ah a kal a.
Jebus-ho khua Jerusalem awmna chhim lam ruam Hinom chu a thleng a. Hinom thlang lam tlângah ri chu a kal zêl a, Refaim ruamah a chhuk a:
Neftoa tuikhurah a kal a, Efron tlânga khuaahte chuan a kal tlang a; Baala khaw lamah a inher a; chu khua chu Kiriat-jearim an ti bawk.
Thlang lam hawiin Baala a kal hual a, Seir tlâng a thleng a, Jearim tlâng hmâr lam pangah a kal a, Beth-semes-ah a chhuk a, Timna a kal pêl a,
Ekron khaw hmâr lam tlâng a zui a, Sikeron lamah a inher a, Baala tlâng pêlin Jamnia khua a thleng a, chuta ṭangin Mediteranean tuipuiah a tâwp a.
Tuipui zau tak chu khawthlang lama a ramri a ni. Chu ramri chhûng chu Juda thlahte awmna tûr chu a ni.
Kaleba chuan Anaka fate pathum Sesaia te, Ahimana te, Talmaia te chu a ûm chhuak a.
Tûn hmaa Kiriat-sefer an tih ṭhin Debir khua chu a han bei zui a.
Kaleba chuan, ‘Kiriat-sefer han beia latu chu ka fanu Aksaii nupuiah ka pe ang,’ a ti a.
Kenaz mi, Kaleba nau, Othniela chuan khua chu a la a, Aksaii chu nupuiah a nei ta a.
A lawi ni chuan a pa hnêna ram dîl tûrin a lo fuih a. A sabengtung ata a chhuk a; Kaleba chuan a hnênah, “Eng nge i duh ang?” a ti a.
“Min khawngaih la, i ram min pêk hi ram ro a ni a, tui awmna min pe tel ta che,” a ti a. Chuanchung leh chuanhnuai tuihna awmna chu a pe ta a.
A chhûng chhûnga an insem tûr Juda thlahte chan chu hêng hi a ni:
A chhim berah Edom ramri bâka an neihte chu hêng hi a ni: Kabzeel, Eder, Jagur,
Kina, Dimona, Adada,
Kedes, Hazor, Itnan,
Zif, Telem, Bealot;
Hazor-hadata, Kiriot-hezron, Hazor an ti bawk,
Amam, Sema, Molada;
Hazar-gada, Hesmon, Beth-pelet;
Hazar-sual, Beer-seba, Biziothia;
Baala, Iim, Ezem;
Eltolad, Kesil, Horma;
Ziklag, Madmana, Sansana,
Lebaot, Silhim, Ain, Rimon leh an chhehvêl khuate nên, a vaiin khawpui chu sawmhnih leh pakua a ni.
Tlâng bulṭhuta awmte chu: Estaol, Zora, Asna,
Zanoa, En-ganim, Tapua, Enam;
Jarmut, Adulam, Soko, Azeka;
Saaraim, Adithaim, Gedera, Gederothaim leh an chhehvêl khuate nên, khawpui chu sâwm leh pali a ni.
Hêng khuate pawh hi a ni: Zenan, Hadasa, Migdalgad,
Dilean, Mizpa, Joktheel,
Lakis, Boskat, Eglon,
Kabon, Lahmam, Kitlis,
Gederot, Beth-dagon, Naama, Makeda leh an chhehvêl khuate nên, khawpui sâwm leh paruk a ni.
Hêng khuate pawh hi a tel: Libna, Ether, Asan,
Ifta, Asna, Nezib,
Keila, Akzib, Maresa leh an chhehvêl khuate nên khawpui pakua a ni.
Ekron pawh a chhehvêl khuate nên a tel.
Asdod bula khawpui leh a chhehvêl khuate, Ekron leh Mediteranean tuipui inkâra khuate pawh a tel.
Asdod leh Gaza, an chhehvêl khuate nên, Aigupta ramri lui nêna an inkâr Mediteranean tuipui kama khaw awmte a tel bawk.
Tlângramah hêng khuate hi a tel bawk: Samir, Jatir, Soko,
Danna, Kiriat-sana, Debir tih a ni bawk;
Anab, Estemo, Anim,
Gosen, Holon, Gilo leh an chhehvêl khuate nên, khawpui sâwm leh pakhat a ni.
Hêng khuate pawh hi a tel: Arab, Duma, Esan,
Janim, Beth-tapua, Afeka,
Humta, Hebron, Zior leh an chhehvêl khuate nên, khawpui pakua a ni.
Hêng khuate pawh hi a tel: Maon, Karmel, Zip, Juta,
Jezreel, Jokdeam, Zanoa,
Kain, Gibea, Timna leh an chhehvêl khuate nên, khawpui sâwm a ni.
Hêng khuate pawh hi a tel: Halhul, Beth-zur, Gedor,
Maarat, Beth-anot, Eltekon leh an chhehvêl khuate nên, khawpui paruk a ni.
Hêng khuate pawh hi a tel: Kiriat-baal, Kiriat-jearim an ti bawk, Raba leh an chhehvêl khuate nên, khawpui pahnih a ni.
Thlalêrah hêng khuate hi a awm: Beth-araba, Midin, Sekaka,
Nibsan, chi khawpui (Ir-hmalak), Engedi leh an chhehvêl khuate nên, khawpui paruk a ni.
Juda thlahte chuan Jebus-ho, Jerusalema awmte chu an hnawt chhuak zo lo. Juda thlahte nên, Jebus-ho chu tûn thlengin an la awm ho ta reng a ni.
Josefa thlahte ram chan chhim lam ri chu Jordan luia Jeriko lui chhuah bulah a inṭan a, Jeriko kal tlangin thlang lam tlâng lamah a chho va, thlalêr kal tlangin Bethel a chhun a.
Luz khaw thlengin Ark-ho awmna Atarot-ah a kal a,
thlang lam hawiin Jaflet-ho awmna ram a kal tlang a, Beth-horon chuanhnuai a chhun a. Gezer kal tlangin Mediteranean tuipui a chhun a ni.
Josefa thlahho, Efraim leh Manasea thlahte chuan hei hi ram chanpual atân an chang a ni.
Efraim thlahte, a chhûng chhûnga an insem tûra an chan hmâr lam ramri chu hetiang hi a ni: Chhak lama awm Atarot-adar leh Beth-horon inkâr a ni.
Hmâr tâwp khua Mikmethat aṭangin khawchhak lam panin ri chu Tanat-silo-ah a kal a, Janoa khuaah te,
Atarot khuaah te, Naara khuaah te a kal a, Jeriko a chhun a, Jordan lui a thleng a.

Khawthlang lamah Mikmethat khua aṭangin Tapua khuaah, Kana luia chhuakin luidung chu a zui a, Mediteranean a zu thleng a. Chumi chhûng ram chu Efraima thlahten a chhûng chhûnga an insem tûra an chan ram chu a ni.
Manasea thlahte chan aṭangin Efraim-ho chu khawpui ṭhenkhat, an chhehvêl khuate nên an pe bawk a.
Gezer khuaa lo awm Kanan mite chu an ûm chhuak lo, tûn thlengin chûng Kanan mite chu Efraim-ho zîngah an la awm, chhiahhlawhah an chhawr a ni.
Josefa fa tîr, Manasea thlahte ram chan chu hei hi a ni: Josefa fapa upa zâwk Manasea fapa Makira, Gileada pa chu, mi huaisen a ni a. Jordan chhak lama Gilead leh Basan ram chu a chanpualah an pe a.

Jordan thlang lamah Manasea fa dangte tân ram an pe bawk a, chûng mite chu: Abiazera, Heleka, Asriela, Sekema, Hefera leh Semida te an ni. Hêngho hi Josefa fapa Manasea fa, mipaho chhûngkaw lute chu an ni.
Hefera fapa Zelofehada chuan fapa nei lovin fanu chauh a nei a. A pu chu Makira, Manasea fa a ni. Zelofehada fanute chu, Mahlaii te, Novaii te, Hoglaii te, Milkaii te, Tirzaii te an ni.
Puithiam Eleazara te, Nuna fapa Josua te leh Israel hnam hotu te hnênah an lo kal a, “
Jordan chhak lama Gilead leh Basan ram telin Manasea thlahte chan sâwm an nei bîk a ni.
Mipa ang bawka an fa hmeichhiaten ram an chan ve tâk avângin Gilead ram chu Manasea thlah dangten an chang ta a ni.
Manasea thlahte ram chan chu Aser-ho ram chan aṭangin Sekem khaw chhak lam Mikmethat khaw inkâr chu a ni. Chhim zâwngin ramri chu a kal a, Entapua-a awmte chu a huam a.
Tapua ram hi Manase-ho chan a ni, a khawpui Tapua erawh hi chu Efraim-ho ta a ni.
Ramri chu Kana luitêah a chhuk a. Luite kam chhim lama khuate chu Efraim-ho ta a ni, Manase-ho ram chhûnga awm ni mah se; ramri chu luite hmâr lam kamah a kal zêl a, Mediteranean tuipuiah a chhuak a.
Chhim lamah Efraim-ho an awm a, hmâr lamah Manase-ho an awm a nih chu; Aser-ho chu hmârthlang lamah an awm a, an ram hmârchhak lamah Isakar-ho an awm a.
Aser-ho leh Isakar-ho chan chhûngah Manase khua Beth-sean leh Ibleam khawpui, an chhehvêl khuate nên a awm. Tuipui kama Dor khua te, Endor te, Taanak te, Megido te leh an chhehvêl khuate pawh a awm.
Hêng khuaa awmte hi Manasea thlahte chuan an ûm chhuak thei lo; chuvângin, Kanan-ho chu an la awm ta zêl a ni.
Israel-ho an lo chak hle hnu pawh khân an hnawt chhuak chuang lo, hna thawk tûr erawh chuan an phût lui ṭhîn.
Josefa thlahte chuan, “
Josua chuan, “In rual viau a, Efraim tlângram hi a zîm deuh a nih chuan Periz leh Refaim-ho awmna ram ngâwte han tu-dar mai rawh u,” a ti a.

Anni chuan, “A tlângram ngawt chu a zîm deuh vang; phaia Kanan-ho lahin thîr-tawlailîr an nei a; Jezreel phaia awmte leh Beth-sean khawpui leh a chhehvêl khuate chuan indo thîr-tawlailîr an nei vek a ni,” an ti a.
Josua chuan Efraim leh Manasea thlahte chu a chhâng a, “In parual hle a, in chak hle bawk alâwm. Chan khat mai ni lo in nei dâwn nia.
Tlângram khi in chan tûr a ni ang. Ngaw hlîr ni mah se, tu-dar ula, a pumin hneh ang che u, Kanan-ho chu an thîr-tawlailîrte nên chak hle mah se, in ûm chhuak mai ang,” a ti a.
Israel mite chu Silo-ah an lo pung khâwm a, Inbiakna bûk kha an zâr a, ram chu an la tawh a.
Israel zîngah hnam sarih an chan tûr sem ve loh an la awm a.
Josua chuan an hnênah, “
Hnam tinin mi pathum thlang chhuak ula, anni chu ram fang chhuak tûrin ka lo tîr ang e; hnam tin chanpual tûr ruat sela, ka hnênah rawn thlen rawh se.
Ram chu hmun sarihah ṭhen sela, Juda leh Josefa thlahte chu an chan ram chhûngah an awm mai ang.
Ram hmun sariha ṭhen dân tûr chu an ziak chhuak ang a, an rawn keng ang a, keiin
Levia chite chu sem ve suh u,
Josua sawi anga ti tûr chuan mite chu an thawk chhuak a, an hnênah, “Ram pum fang chhuak ula, chhinchhiah vek ang che u; chutah in lo haw leh dâwn nia. Keiin
Chûng mite chu an chhuak a, ram chu an fang vek a, khawpui awmte chhinchhiah vekin hmun sarihah an sem a, an ziak chhuak a. Silo khuaa riahhmunah Josua hnênah an ziakna bu chu an rawn hâwn a.
Silo khuaah chuan Josuan
Benjamin thlahte chan tûr, a chhûng chhûnga insem tûr chu ruat hmasak ber a ni a, Juda leh Josefa thlahte inkârah an awm ta a.
An hmâr lam ramri chu Jordan lui aṭangin Jeriko ep tlâng pangah a chho va; khawthlang zâwngin Beth-aven thlalêr a thleng a.
Luz khuaah (Bethel an ti bawk) a kal zêl a, chhim lam zâwngin a kal a, Atarot-adar, Beth-horon tlâng chuanhnuaia khua chu a thleng a.

He tlâng thlang lamah, chhim zâwngin ramri chu a inher a, Kiriat-baal khua, Kiriat-jearim an tih bawk chu a thleng a; he khua hi Juda thlahte chan khawpui a ni. Hei hi khawthlang lama a ramri chu a ni.
Chhim lam ramri chu Kiriat-jearim aṭangin a inṭan a, chhak lam panin Nefto tuikhurah a kal a.
Hinom chhuntu tlângdunga kalin Refaim phai luhnaah a chhuk a, Hinom ruam a pan a, Jebus-ho khaw chhim lamah a kal a, En-rogel a thleng a.
Hmâr lamah a inher a, En-semes a thleng a; Adumin kalkawng epa Gelilot khuaah a kal a, Bohana lungah (Bohana chu Reubena fapa a ni) a kal zêl a.
Jordan dep tlâng hmâr lama kalin ruamah a chhuk a,
Beth-hogla tlângdung hmâr lamah a kal zêl a, Jordan lui chhuah Tuipui Thiah a chhuak a ni.
Hei hi Benjamina thlah chhûng tin ram chan tûr ramri chu a ni.
Benjamina thlah, a chhûng chhûnga an insem tûr khuate chu hêng hi a ni: Jeriko, Beth-hogla, Emek-kezia;
Beth-araba, Zemaraim, Bethel;
Avim, Para, Ofra;
Kefaramoni, Ofni, Geba leh an chhehvêl khuate nên khawpui sâwm leh pahnih a ni.
Gibeon te, Rama te, Beerot te,
Mizpa te, Kafira te, Moza te,
Rekem te, Irpeel te, Tarala te,
Zela te, Haelef te, Jebus te (Jerusalem an ti bawk), Gibea te, Kiriat-jearim te leh an chhehvêl khua te nên, khawpui sâwm leh pali a ni. Hêng hi Benjamin thlah chhûng tin chan tûr khua chu a ni.
Chan hnihna chu Simeona thlahten a chhûng chhûnga an insem tûrin an chang a. An ram chan chu Juda thlahte ram chan chhûnga mi a ni.
Hêng hi a huam: Beer-seba, Seba, Molada;
Hazar-sual, Bala, Ezem;
Eltolad, Bethul, Horma;
Ziklag, Beth-markabot, Hazar-susa;
Beth-lebaot, Saruhen leh an chhehvêl khuate nên, khawpui chu sâwm leh pathum a ni.
Hêng pawh hi a tel: Ain, Rimon, Ether, Asan leh an chhehvêl khuate, khawpui pali a ni.
Hei hian an chhehvêl khua Balat-beer (Rama an tih bawk) chhim lam thlengin a huam a ni. Simeona thlahte chuan he lai ram hi an chanpual atâna an dawn chu a ni.
Juda thlahte hian an mamawh aia zau ram an neih avângin an ram ṭhenkhat chu Simeona thlahte hnêna pêk a ni.
Zebuluna thlahten a chhûng chhûnga insem tûr ram chan thumna chu an chang a, a chhim tâwpah Sarid khua a awm.
Chuta ṭangin thlang lamah Marala a pan a, Dabeset pal tlangin Jokneam chhak lama luiah a chhuak a.
Sarid chhak lamah Kislot-tabor ramri a han chhun a, Daberat pal tlangin ramri chu Jafia-ah a chho va.
Chhuk zâwngin Gath-hefer-ah a kal zêl a, Eth-kazin thlengin Rimon kawnga Nea panin a kual a.
Hmâr lam panin ramri chu Hanathon-ah a kal a, Iftahel ruamah a tâwp a ni.
Kata te, Nahalal te, Simron te, Idala te, Bethlehem te leh an chhehvêl khuate nên khawpui sâwm leh pahnih a huam tel a ni.
Zebulun-ho chan ramah chuan hêng khawpui leh an chhehvêl khuate hi a awm a ni.
Chan lina chu Isakara thlahte chuan a chhûng chhûnga insem tûrin an chang a.
Hêng hi a huam: Jezreel, Kesulot, Sunem;
Haferaim, Sion, Anaharat,
Rabit, Kision, Ebez;
Remet, En-ganim, En-hada, Beth-pazez.
An ramri chuan Tabor tlâng a kal tlang a, Sahazumai leh Beth-semes kal tlangin Jordan a thleng a, khawpui sâwm leh paruk leh an chhehvêl khuate nên a huam a.
Isakara thlahte chuan chhûng tin insem tûrin hêng khawpuite hi, an chhehvêl khuate nên an chang a ni.
Chan ngana chu Asera thlahte chuan a chhûng chhûnga insem tûrin an chang a.
Hêng hi a huam tel: Helkat, Hali, Beten, Aksaf;
Alam Melek, Amad, Misal. Khawthlang lama a ramri chuan Karmel leh Sihor-libnat a pal tlang a,
khawchhak zâwngin a inher a, Beth-dagon pal tlangin Zebulun ram a chhun a, Iftahel ruamah a lût a, hmâr lam panin Beth-emek leh Neiel a pan a, Kabul a thleng a.
Ebron-ah te, Rehob-ah te, Hamon-ahte, Kana-ah te a kal a, Sidon khawpui a chhun a.
Ramri chu a inher a, Rama leh Tura khawpui kulh a chhun a, Hosa-ah a inher a, Mediteranean tuipuiah a tâwp a. Mahalab te, Akzib te,
Uma te, Afek te, Rehob te leh an chhehvêl khuate nên, khawpui sawmhnih leh pahnih a ni.
Hêng khawpui leh an chhehvêl khuate hi Asera thlahte chuan chhûng tin insem atân an ram chan chu a ni.
Chan rukna chu Naftalia thlahte chuan a chhûng chhûnga an insem tûrin an chang a.
Hmâr lam ramri chu Helef-ah a inṭan a, chhak lamah Elon-Bazananim kal tlangin Adami-nekeb-ah a kal a, Jabneel tlawhin Lakum a thleng a, Jordan-ah a tâwp a.
Khawthlang lam panin Aznot-tabor-ah a kal a, Hukok a thleng a, chhim lamah Zebulun hrûlah a kal a, Aser-ho ram a va chhun a. Chhak lamah Jordan, thlang lamah Aser-ho ram a ri a.
Kulh nei khua te: Zidim, Zer, Hamath, Rakat, Kineret;
Adama, Rama, Hazor;
Kedes, Edrei, En-hazor;
Iron, Migdalel, Horem, Bethanat, Beth-semes leh an chhehvêl khuate nên, khawpui sâwm leh pakua a huam tel.
Hêng khawpuite leh an chhehvêl khuate hi Naftali thlahte chuan chhûng tin insem atân an chang.
Chan sarihna chu Dana thlahten a chhûng chhûnga insem atân an chang a.
Hêng hi a huam: Zora, Estaol, Ir-semes;
Saalabin, Aijalon, Ithla;
Elon, Timna, Ekron;
Elteke, Gibethon, Baalat;
Jehud, Bene-berak, Gath-rimon;
Mejarkon, Rakon leh Jopa khaw vêl ramte nên.
Dana thlahte hi hmêlmaten an ram an lâksak a, Lais khuaah an kal a; an bei a, an la a, mite chu an that a; anmahni tân an nei ta a. A khaw hming hi an thlahtu hming chawiin Dan an ti a.
Hêng khawpuite leh an chhehvêl khuate hi Dana thlahte chuan chhûng tin insem tûrin an chang a.
Ram an insem zawh chuan, Israel mite chuan Nuna fapa Josua chu a hranpain ram an pe ve a.
thupêk angin a duhthlan Timnat-sera khua an pe a, Efraim tlângrama awm a ni; khua chu a din ṭha a, a awm ta a.
Puithiam Eleazara te, Nuna fapa Josua te leh Israel hnam hruaitu te chuan hêng ram hrang hrang hi ṭhumvâwrin Silo khuaah chuan Inbiakna bûk kawngkaah an sem fel ta a ni.
“Israel mite hrilh rawh, Mosia ka hrilh ang khân inhumhimna tûr khua ruat rawh u.
Tihpalh emaw, hmuh loh avâng emawa mihring tihlum palhte thisen phuba latu laka an tlân a, an him theih nân.
Chûng khuaah chuan an tlân ang a, khawpui luhnaah an ding ang a, chu khaw upate hnênah chuan an lo tlân chhan an hrilh tûr a ni; anni chuan hmun an lo ngaihtuahsak ang a, an zîngah an awmtîr ang.
Thisen phuba latuin an rawn ûm pawhin an lo hum tûr a ni; an tihpalh a ni a, huat vânga tihlum an ni lo.

Chu khuaah chuan Israel pungkhâwmin a chungthu an rêl fel hma emaw, puithiam lalber ṭang lai a thih hma emaw a awm tûr a ni; chumi zawhah chuan mi that palhtu chu a lo kalna, an khuaah, ama inah ngei a haw leh thei tawh ang.

Hêng khuate hi Israel mite tân leh an zînga awm hnam dangte tân inhumhimna tûra an ruatte chu a ni; Kades khua, Naftali ram tlângram Galili bialah; Sekem khua, Efraim-ho ram tlângramah; Kiriat-arba khua (Hebron an ti bawk), Juda thlahte ram chhûng tlângramah.
Jordan chhak lamah: Bezer khua, Reuben-ho ram tlâng zâwl thlalêr khuaah; Ramot khua, Gad-ho bialah; Golan khua, Manasea-ho ram Basan bialah.

Khîng khi a ni Israel mite leh an zînga hnam dang awmte tâna inhumhimna tûr khua an ruatte chu. Tu pawhin mi tihlum palh sela, hêng khuaah hian an tlân thei ang; an chungthu Israel pung khâwmin an rel fel hma chu thisen phuba latu kutah an thi mai dâwn lo nia.
Levia chi hruaitute chu, puithiam Eleazara te, Nuna fapa Josua te leh Israel hnam hruaitute hnênah,
Kanan ram Silo khuaah chuan an lo kal a, “
Israel mite chuan, an ram chan chhûngah hêng khawpuite hi, a chhehvêl ram âwl, ran tlatna tûr nên,
Levia thlah zîngah Kohata thlahte chu khawpui an sem hmasa ber a. Arona thlah puithiamho chu Juda thlah te, Simeona thlahte leh Benjamina thlahte ram chan aṭangin khawpui sâwm leh pathum an pe a.
Kohata thlahte chu Efraim te, Dan te leh khawthlang lama Manase thlah zâtve ram aṭangin khawpui sâwm an pe a.
Gersona thlahte chu Isakar te, Naftali te, khawthlang lama Manase te chan aṭangin khawpui sâwm leh pathum an pe a.
Meraria thlahte chu Reuben te, Gad te leh Zebulun ram aṭang tein khawpui sâwm leh pahnih an pe a.
Mosia hnênah
Juda leh Manasea thlahte ram aṭangin hêng khawpuite hi
Levia thlah Kohata fa Arona thlahte hnêna an pêk chu a ni a; anni hi khua an sem dawng hmasa ber an ni.
Juda tlângram khawpui Anaka pa, Arba khua, Hebron an tih bawk chu, a chhehvêla ram âwlte nên an pe a.
A khawpui chhehvêla ram leh khuate chu Jefunea fapa Kaleba hnêna pêk a nih tawh kha.
Inhumhimna tûr khuaa ruat Hebron khaw bâkah hêng khawpuite hi puithiam Arona thlahte tân an ruat: Libna,
Jatir, Estemoa,
Holon, Debir,
Ain, Juta, Beth-semes, an chhehvêl ram âwlte nên Juda leh Simeona thlahte ram chan aṭangin khawpui pakua an pe a.
Benjamin ram aṭangin hêng khawpui pali hi an pe bawk: Gibeon, Geba,
Anathot, Almon leh an chhehvêl ram âwlte nên.
A vaiin khaw sâwm leh pathum, an chhehvêl ram âwl, ran tlatna tûr nên puithiam Arona thlahte chu an pe a.
Levia fa Kohata thlah dangte hnênah Efraim-ho ram aṭangin khaw ṭhenkhat an pe bawk.
Khawpui pali an pe; inhumhimna tûra ruat Efraim tlângrama khawpui Sekem te, Gezer te,
Kibzaim te, Beth-horon te leh an chhehvêl ram âwlte nên.
Dan ram aṭangin khaw pali an pe bawk: Elteke te, Gibethon te,
Aijalon te, Gath-rimon te leh an chhehvêl ram âwlte nên.
Thlang lama awm Manasea thlahte ram aṭangin khawpui pahnih an pe: Taanak leh Gath-rimon leh an chhehvêl ram âwlte nên.
Kohata thlah dangte hnênah chuan hêng khaw sâwm leh an chhehvêl ram âwl; ran tlatna tûr te nên an pe a.
Levia chi, pâwl khat, Gersona thlahte chu chhak lam Manasea thlahte rama mi khawpui pahnih an pe a; inhumhimna tûra ruat Basan biala Golan leh Beestera te leh an chhehvêl ram âwl, ran tlatna tûr nên.
Isakara thlahte ram aṭangin khawpui pali - Kision te, Daberat te,
Jarmut te, En-ganim te, an chhehvêl ram âwl, ran tlatna tûr nên an pe a.
Aser-ho ram aṭangin khawpui pali - Misal te, Abdon te,
Helkat te, Rehob te leh an chhehvêl ram awl, ran tlatna tûr nên an pe a.
Naftali-ho ram aṭangin khawpui pathum - inhumhimna tûra ruat Galili rama Kedes te, Hamot-dor te, Kartan te leh an chhehvêl ram âwl ran tlatna tûr nên an pe a.
Gersona thlah chhûngkaw hrang hrang chuan khawpui sâwm leh pathum leh a vêl ram âwl ran tlatna tûr nên an chang.
Levia chi mi dang, Meraria thlahte chu Zebulun-ho ram aṭangin khawpui pali - Jokneam te, Karta te,
Dimna te, Nahalal te leh an chhehvêl ram âwl, ran tlatna tûrte nên an pe a.
Reuben-ho ram aṭangin khawpui pali - Bezer te, Jahaz te,
Kedemot te, Mefaat te leh an chhehvêl ram âwl; ran tlatna tûr nên an pe a.
Gad-ho ram aṭangin khawpui pali - inhumhimna tûra ruat Gilead biala Ramot te, Mahanaim te,
Hesbon te, Jazer te, an chhehvêl ram âwl; ran tlatna tûr te nên an pe a.
Meraria thlahte chu a vaiin khawpui sâwm leh pahnih an pe.
Israel mite ram chhûnga Levia chite khawpui atâna ruat chu khaw sawmli leh pariat a ni, an chhehvêl ram âwl, ran tlatna tûr nên.
An thlahtute hnêna pêk a lo tiam tawh ram chu
chuan a tiam angin ram pum chu a tirâlmuang a; an hmêlmate a hnehtîr zêl ṭhin avângin tu mahin an lo dang zo lo.
Israel-te hnêna thu a tiam tawh phawt chu
Josua chuan Reubena thlah te, Gada thlahte leh Manasea thlah zâtve te chu a ko va,
an hnênah, “
in unaute chu hun rei tak chhûng hâwnsan mai lovin in Pathian,
Tûnah zawng,
chhiahhlawh Mosian dân a pêk che u kha zâwm ngei ula, in Pathian,
Tichuan, Josuan mal a sâwm a, a hawtîr a; in lamah an haw ta a.
Mosia khân Manasea thlah zâtve chu Jordan chhak lamah Basan ram a pe a, a zâtve dang hnênah Josuan Jordan thlang lamah ram a pe bawk a. Josuan a hâwntîr khân mal a sâwm a,
“Berâm leh kêl te, tangka leh rangkachak te, dâr leh thîr te leh thawmhnaw tam tak nên, hausa hnawkin in haw dâwn a, in hmêlmate thil in lâksakte chu in unau dangte sem ve ang che u,” a ti a.
Reubena thlah te, Gada thlah te leh Manasea thlah zâtve te chu Silo khua aṭang chuan an haw ta a. Israel dangte chu Kanan rama Silo khuaah chuan an kalsan a. Mosia hnêna
Reubena thlah te, Gada thlahte leh Manasea thlah zâtve te chuan Jordan thlang lama awm, Kanan rama Galilot chu an thleng a, lui kamah chuan hmuhnawm tham taka ropuiin maichâm an siam a.
Israel mi dangte chu, “Reuben-ho te, Gad-ho te leh Manase-ho te chuan Kanan ram Jordan lui kamah, Israel mite ram lamah chuan maichâm an siam luah mai,” tiin an rawn hrilh a.
Israel pungkhâwmhovin an lo hriatin beih an tum a, Silo-ah an lo kal khâwm a.
Reuben-ho te, Gad-ho te, Manase-ho zâtve te chu Gilead-a an awm laiin Israel mite chuan puithiam Eleazara fapa Finehasa chu,
Israel hnam sâwm hruaitute, khawthlang lam hnam sâwm hruaitu ber pakhat zêl nên an tîr a.
Gilead an lo thleng a, Reuben-ho te, Gad-ho te leh Manase-ho zâtve te hnênah chuan,
“Pungkhâwmho,
Peor hmuna thil sual kan tih kha in la hre reng lâwm ni?
chu engtizia nge in zui duh loh? Vawiina
In ram hi amah biakna tlâk loh khawpa bawlhhlawh a nih chuan
Zera fapa Akana khân thil serh a bawhchhia a, Israel pungkhâwmho chungah thinurna a thleng a, amah mai ni lovin mi dang pawh an thih kha,” an ti a.
Reuben-ho te, Gad-ho te, Manase-ho zâtvete chuan Israel hotute chu an chhâng a,
thu awih lovin hâlral thilhlan te, buhbâl thilhlan te, remna thilhlante kan hlanna tûr keimahni maichâm kan siam a nih hrim chuan
Chutiang a ni lo; nakinah in thlahten kan thlahte hnênah hetiang hian an la ti ang tih kan hlau a ni zâwk:
Tichuan, hâlral thilhlan leh inthawina chi dang hlan nân maichâm hi siam kan ni lo.
In mite leh kan mite, ṭhangthar zêlten,
Chuvângin, chutianga kan thlahte hnêna an tih tâkin ‘Min thlahtute hian

lakah hel kan tum awzâwng lo, amah hawisanin kan thilhlan hâlna, kan buhbâl thilhlan leh inthawinate hlanna tûr maichâm hrang siam kan tum a ni hek lo, kan Pathian maichâm, a Bâwkte kawta mi lo kha chu maichâm hrang kan din dâwn hauh lo,” an ti a.
Puithiam Finehasa leh pungkhâwmho hruaitu, khawthlang lama awm hnam hruaitu sâwmte chuan Reuben-ho te, Gad-ho te, Jordan chhak lam Manase-ho zâtve te thu chu an hriatin an lungawi ta a.
Finehasa, Puithiam Eleazara fapa chuan an hnênah, “
Reubena leh Gada thlahte awmna Gilead aṭang chuan puithiam Eliazara fapa Finehasa leh Israel hotute chu Israel mite awmna Kanan ramah chuan an kîr a, an thu chu an thlen a.
Israel mite chu an lung a awi ta a, Pathian an fak a; Reubena leh Gada thlahte chu an awmna ram aṭanga nuai bo tûra thawh chhuah thu an sawi ta lo va.
Reubena thlah leh Gada thlahte chuan chu maichâm chu “Kan inkârah
Israel mi zawng zawng - upa te, hruaitu te, rorêltu te leh hotu te chu a ko khâwm a, an hnênah, “Ka lo upain ka lo tar ta hle mai a:
Nangmahni avângin hêng lai hnamte chunga in Pathian,
Kan hneh tawhho hnam awmna ram leh kan la hneh lohte awmna ram chu in ram chanpual atân ka sem fel vek tawh che u a ni; khawchhak lamah Jordan lui aṭanga khawthlang lama Mediteranean tuipui thlengin.
in Pathianin in hmaah a tlânchhiattîr zêl ang a, a ûm bo vek ang;
Chuvângin, Mosia dân lehkhabua ziak apiang awih tum tlat ula, ti ngei ang che u, pakhat mah hmaih suh ang che u.
In zînga hnam dang la awmte nên hian inchiahpiah suh u; an pathian lam suh ula, an hming chhâlin chhia chham hek suh u: chibai bûkin an hmaah kûn tawp suh ang che u.
chu vuan tlat zâwk ang che u, tûn thleng pawha in la vuan ang hian.
Hnam tam tak leh chak pui pui in hmaah
“A tiam angin
, in Pathian chu hmangaih ngei ngei ang che u.
In hawisana, in zînga hnam dang lo awmte nên in inchiahpiaha, in inneih pawlh vaih chuan,
, in Pathian chuan hêng hnamte hi in hmaah a hnawh chhuahsak tawh hauh lo vang che u.
“Ngai teh u, tûnah zawng, leilung dân angin ka kal a hun ta. Tu pawhin ngun taka in chhût chuan
, in Pathian chuan thil ṭha a tiam chu a hlen zêl ang ngeiin a pêk che u ram aṭanga in boral vek hma chu thil ṭha lo tih a tiam pawh chu a ti ngei ang.
, in Pathianin zâwm tûra a tih che u, a thuthlung chu in bawhchhiata, pathian dangte in pana, an rawng in bâwl chuan,
Josua chuan Israel hnamte chu Sekem khuaah a ko khâwm a. Israel upa te, an hnam hruaitu te, rorêltu te leh hotu te chu Pathian hmaah an rawn inlan a.
Josua chuan mi zawng zawng hnênah, “
In pu Abrahama chu Eufretis lui piah aṭang chuan Kanan ram pumah ka hruai kual a, fapa Isaka ka pe a, a thlahte ka tipung a.
Isaka chu fapa Jakoba leh Esauva ka pe a, Seir tlângte chu Esauva hnênah a chênna atân ka pe a. Jakoba leh a fate erawh chu Aigupta ramah an chhuk a.
