Jordan lui chhak lam ram, Gilead te, Gad-ho te, Reuben-ho te leh Manase-ho te awmna ram Arnon luiruama Aroer te, an khawpui Gilead leh Basan thlengin a la ta a.
Jehua thiltih dang zawng zawng, a chakzia te, Israel lalte chanchin ziakna bu-ah a chuang vek a ni.
Jehua chu a thi a, Samaria khuaah chuan an phûm ve ta a. A fapa Jehoahaza chu a aiah a lal a.
Kum sawmhnih leh pariat chhûng Samaria khuaah chuan Jehua chu a lal a ni.
Lal Ahazia thih thu a nu Athali chuan a hriat veleh lal chhûngte chu a thahtîr vek a.
Ahazia fapa Joasa chiah a thah hmaih a. Lal Jehorama fanu Jehosebi, Ahazia farnu chuan a thukru a ni. A awmtu nên Tempul pindan pakhatah Athali hmuh loh tûrin a thukru a, thah a ni ve ta lo a ni.
Athali lal chhûng kum ruk chu Jehosebi chuan tempulah a dah a, a rûkin a enkawl a.

A kum sarih kum chuan puithiam lalber Jehoiada chuan lal vêngtu Keret sipai za rual hotute leh lal in vêngtu sipai hotute chu a ko va, a thil tih tum chu a hrilh a, Tempul chhûngah chhia chhamin an remtihpui a, lal Ahazia fapa Joasa chu a hmu a.
Hetiang hian a hrilh a: “Sabat nia hna thawk tûra in lo kal hunah hmun thuma ṭhen hmun khat chuan lal in vêng ula,
hmun thuma ṭhena hmun khat chuan Sur kawngkhâr vêng ula; a dang hmun thuma ṭhena hmun khat chuan vêngtuho hnung kawngkhâr vêng ang che u.
Vêngtu pâwl hnih Sabat nia châwl tûrte chu lal vêng tûrin tempulah an awm tûr a ni.
Lal Joasa hi khandaih phawi sa kengin in vêng tûr a ni, a kalna apiangah zui ang che u. Rawn hnaihtu chu lo that zêl ang che u,” a ti a.
Sipai hotute chuan Jehoiada thu chu an zâwm a, an sipai sabat nia châwl tûrte leh thawk tûrte chu an rawn hruai a.
Tempul chhûnga dah ṭhat lal Davida feite leh phâwte chu sipai hotute a pe a.
Tempul hma lamah khandaih phawi sa kengin lal vêng tûrin a din tlartîr bawk a.

Jehoiada chuan Joasa chu a hruai chhuak a, lallukhum chu a khumtîr a, lal awm dân tûr ziakna dân bu chu a pe a. Joasa chu hriak an thih a, lalah an puang ta a. Mipui chuan kut an beng dur dur a, “Lal chu dam reng rawh se,” an ti a.
Lalnu Athali chuan vêngtuho sipaite leh mipui thâwm chu a hriatin mipui punkhâwmna Tempul lamah chuan hmanhmawh takin a kal a.

Lal thar chu lal din ṭhinna tûra ruat Tempul luhna ban bulah chuan a lo ding a. Sipai hotute leh tawtawrâwtpute chuan an lo din hual a, mipuite chu hlim takin an au dur dur a, tawtawrâwtte an hâm a. Athali mangang chuan a puan a pawtthlêr a, “Min phiar ru a nih hi,” a ti a.
Jehoiada chuan Tempul hung chhûnga Athali thah chu a remti lo va, sipai hotute hnênah, “Sipai intlar kârah hruai chhuak ula, rawn chhan tum apiang lo that zêl ang che u,” a ti a.
Athali chu an man a, lal in lamah an hruai a. Sakawr kawngkhâr an tihah chuan an that ta a.
Puithiam Jehoiada chuan lal Joasa leh mipui chu
Mipuite chu Baal tempulah an kal a, an ṭhiat a, maichâmte chu an tichim a, milimte chu an vaw sawm vek a. Baal puithiam Matana chu a maichâm bulah chuan an that a.
Puithiam Jehoiada chuan Tempul vêng tûr a dah a.

Lal vêngtu Keret sipai za rual hotute, lal in vêngtu sipai hotute nên chuan Tempul aṭangin lal chu lal inah an hruai a, mipuiin an zui a. Vêngtu kawngkhârah Joasa chu a lût a, lalṭhutthlêngah chuan a ṭhu ta a.
Mipui chu an hlim êm êm a, Athali chu lal ina an thah tâk avângin khuaah buaina eng mah a awm lo.
Joasa chu kum sarih mi a nihin Juda lalah a ṭang.
Israel rama Jehua kum sarih a lal kumin Joasa chu Judai ram lalah a ṭang a, Jerusalem khuaah kum sawmli a lal a. A nu chu Beer-seba mi Zibi a ni.
Puithiam Jehoiada khân a kaihhruai ṭhin avângin a dam chhûngin
Mahse, hnam dang pathian biakna hmunsângte chu a tibo lo va, chûngah chuan miten thilhlan an la hlân zêl a ni.

Jehoiada chuan puithiamte chu a ko khâwm a, Tempula thilhlan rualin miten thilpêk an rawn keng ṭhîn, a ṭhen chu thilhlan zînga pêk tel ngei tûra tihte a ni a, a ṭhen erawh chu mahni duh thu-a thilpêk a ni; chûng chu dah ṭha zêl tûrin a hrilh a.
An rawng an bâwlsakten chutianga pawisa an rawn ken chu rawngbâwltu puithiam chuan a lo dawng ang a, Tempul siam ṭhat nân hman tûr a ni.
Kum sawmhnih leh pathum chhûng Joasa a lal tawh hnu pawh chuan Tempul chu siam ṭhat a la ni ta lo va.

Jehoiada leh puithiam dangte chu a ko va, “Engtizia nge Tempul in la siam ṭhat loh? Tûn aṭang chuan in pawisa dawn chu kawl tawh suh u, in dah khâwm ngei tûr a ni; tichuan, Tempul chu siam ṭhat a ni thei ang,” a ti a.
Puithiamte chuan pawisa kawl loh chu an remti a, Tempul tlabal la siam rih loh pawh ṭha an ti a.

Puithiam lalber Jehoiada chuan bâwm a siam a, a chhîn a tiâwng a; maichâm bulah, Tempul luh dâwn ding lamah a dah a. Tempul luhna bula puithiam an dah chuan Pathian hnêna petute thilpêk an rawn ken chu an lo dawng a, bâwmah chuan an thlâk zêl a.
Bâwma tangka a awm tam deuh veleh lal lehkhaziaktu leh puithiam Jehoiada chu an lo kal a, tangka chu an rawh tui a, a bûk zât an chhinchhiah zêl a.
A zât chiah an chhinchhiah hnu chuan Tempul siam ṭhat hna enkawltute kutah an pe a, anni chuan hnathawktu mistirite hlawh an pe ṭhîn.
Lungchher mite leh lungla mite chuan Tempul siam ṭhatna tûr thingte leh lungte an lei a, pawisa hman ṭûlna apiangah pawisa an pe chhuak a.
Thawhlâwm pawisa chu tangkaraw no te, berhbu te, tawtawrâwt te, khâwnvâr enkawlna hmanrua te, tangkarua leh rangkachaka thil hrang hrang siam nân chuan an hmang hauh lo.
Hnathawktute hlawhah leh hmanraw lei nân chauh hman a ni.
Hnathawktute chu an rinawm êm êm a, an pawisa hman dân pawh enpui a ngai lo.
Sual thawina leh bawhchhiat man thilhlan ruala an rawn pêkte erawh chu dah tel ve a ni lo, puithiamho chan a ni.
Chutih hun lai chuan Suria lal Hazaela chuan Gath khua a bei a, a la a. Jerusalem beih zêl a rêl a.
Juda lal Joasa chuan a hmaa lal Jehosafata te, Jehorama te leh Ahazia ten
Lal Joasa thil tih dang zawng zawng chu Juda lalte chanchin ziakna bu-ah a chuang.
Joasa chu a hote pahnihin an phiar a, Beth-milo an tih Silo chhuknaah an that a.
A thattute chu Simeata fapa Jozakara leh Somera fapa Jehozabada an ni. A thi a, Davida khawpuiah lal thlânah an phûm a. A fapa Amazia chu a lo lal ta a.
Ahazia fapa Joasa chu Judai rama kum sawmhnih leh pathum a lal kumin Jehua fapa Jehoahaza chu Israel ramah a lal ṭan a, Samaria khuaah kum sâwm leh pahnih a lal a.
Lal Jeroboama, Nebata fapa ang bawkin
Chuvângin, Israel-te chungah
Jehoahaza chu
chuan Israel-te hnênah chhantu a tîr ṭhîn a. Suria-ho lakah chuan a chhan chhuak a, tûn hma angin thlamuang takin an awm leh ṭhîn.
Nebata fapa Lal Jeroboama chhûngten Israel-te an hruai khawlohna sual kha an la sim chuang lo va, an ti lui zêl a, Aseri lim chu Samaria khuaah chuan a la awm ta reng tho mai.

Jehoahaza chuan sipai tihtham a nei tawh lo, sakawr chungchuang mi sawmnga, tawlailîr sâwm leh kea kal sipai sîngkhat chauh a nei a ni. Suria lalin a thahsak zo va, kea vaivut chîl ang maiin a chîl darhsak a ni.
Jehoahaza thil tih dang zawng zawng, a huaisenzia te chu Israel lalte chanchin ziakna bu-ah a chuang.
A thi a, a fapa Joasa chu a lo lal ta a.
Judai rama Joasa kum sawmthum leh pasarih a lal kumin Joasa chu Israel ramah a lal ṭan a. Samaria khuaah kum sâwm leh paruk a lal a.
Ani pawhin
Joasa thil tih dang, Juda lal Amazia nên an indova a huaisenzia thute chu Israel lalte chanchin ziakna bu-ah a chuang.
Joasa chu a thi a, Samaria khuaah lal thlânah an phûm a. A fapa Jeroboama pahnihna chu a lo lal ta a.
Zâwlnei Elisa chu a thihpui tûr natna tuarin a mu a, a thih dâwn hnaih chuan lal Joasa chuan a va tlawh a; “Ka pa, ka pa, Israel-te chhantu ropui,” tiin a ṭah ta a.
Elisa chuan a hnênah, “Thalngul leh thal ṭhenkhat han la teh,” a ti a. Thalngul leh thal ṭhenkhat chu a rawn la a.
Israel lal hnênah chuan, “Thalngul kha chelh teh,” a ti a, a chelh hnu chuan Elisa chuan lal kut chungah a kut a nghat a, “Khawchhak lam tukverh kha hawng teh,” a ti a, a han hawng a.
“Thal kha kâp teh,” a ti a. A han kâp a, zâwlnei Elisa chuan, “Suria hnehna tûr
Elisa chuan lal hnênah, “Thal dang kha la leh teh,” a ti a, a han lâk chuan, “Lei kha chhun teh,” a ti a, vawi thum a han chhun a, a bâng ta a.
Pathian mi chu a thinur a, “Vawi nga vawi ruk chhun la, Suria-ho chu an ral dêr thlengin i hneh tûr, vawi thum chauh in hneh dâwn a nih hi,” a ti a.
Elisa chu a thi a, an phûm ta a. Kum a lo thar apiangin Moab-hovin Israel ram an rawn rûn ṭhîn a.

Mi pakhat hi a thi a, an phûm dâwn laiin Moab rual khat lo kal an hmu a, Elisa thlânah chuan an vawm lût rawk a, an tlân ta a. Chu mi ruang chuan Elisa ruh a deh veleh a lo nung leh a, a ding thei ta mai a.
Jehoahaza dam chhûng chu Suria lal Hazaela chuan Israel-te chu a tirethei hle a.
Mahse,
Suria lal Hazaela chu a thi a, a fapa Ben-hadada chu a lo lal ta a.
Jehoahaza fapa Joasa chuan Hazaela fapa Ben-hadada kut ata, a pa Jehoahaza khua an lâksakte chu a la kîr leh a, an indonaah vawi thum a hneh a, Israel ram khuate chu a chhuhsak leh ta a ni.
Jehoahaza fapa Joasa chu Israel lal a nih kum hnih kumin Joasa fapa Amazia chu,
kum sawmhnih leh pangaa upa a nihin Judai ram lal a ni ṭan a, Jerusalem-ah kum sawmhnih leh pakua a lal a. A nu chu Jerusalem khaw mi Jehoadini a ni.
hmuha thil ṭha a ti a, a pu lal Davida erawh chu a tluk lo, a pa Joasa tih ang a ti ve zêl mai.
Hnam dang pathian an biakna hmunsângte chu a tichhe lo, mipuite chuan chûngah chuan thilhlan an hlân a, rimtuite an la hâl ta cheu a ni.
Amazia chuan, a lal ngheh veleh, a pa thattute chu a that ve a.
An fate erawh chu a that lo; Mosia Dân bu-a
Amazia chuan ‘Chi ruamah’ Edom mi singkhat a that a, Sela khua a bei a, a la a, a hmingah Joktheel a vuah a, tûn thlengin hmingah a la pu.
Amazia chuan Jehoahaza fapa Joasa, Israel lal hnênah palai a tîr a, “Ti teh, pa leh pa i han inhmachhawn teh ang,” a ti a.

Israel lal Joasa chuan Juda lal Amazia chu thu a thawn a, “Lebanon tlânga sidar thing hnênah Lebanon tlâng lênhlîng chuan, ‘I fanu ka fapa nupuiah min neihtîr rawh,’ a ti a. Ramsa tei mai mai hian lênhlîng chu a pal thlu ta mai a.
‘Edom-ho ka zu hneh e’ i ti a, i inchhuang ta vei hle a ni maw: lungawi takin inah tawm hle hle tawh mai rawh. Nang leh Judai ram chhiatna tûr buaina chawk chhuak teh suh,” a ti a.
Amazia chuan a pawisa lo va, Israel lal Joasa chu a thawk chhuak a, Juda lal Amazia nên chuan Judai ram chhûng Beth-semes khuaah chuan ‘pa leh pa an inhmachhawn’ ta a.
Juda-ho chan chu a chau ta zâwk a, mahni in lamah an tlân haw ta a.
Israel lal Joasa chuan Juda lal Amazia chu Beth-semes-ah chuan a man a. Jerusalem-ah a chho va, kulh bang, Efraim kawngkhâr aṭanga kulh Kawina kawngkhâr thlengin, tawng zali zet chu a tichhia a.
Tempul chhûng leh lal sum in aṭanga tangka leh rangkachak leh bungbêl awm zawng zawng chu a la a, a sal mante nên chuan Samaria khuaah a haw leh ta a.
Joasa thil tih dang, a ropuizia te, Juda lal Amazia nêna an indo thu te Israel-te lal chanchin ziakna bu-ah a chuang.
Joasa chu a thi a, Samaria khuaa lalho thlânah an phûm a. A fapa Jeroboama pahnihna chu a lo lal ta a.
Israel lal Jehoahaza fapa Joasa thih hnuin Amazia chu kum sâwm leh panga a dam a.
Amazia thil tih dangte chu Juda lal chanchin ziakna bu-ah a chuang a ni.
Jerusalem-ah Amazia chu an phiar a, Lakis khuaah a tlân a; mahse, a hmêlmate chuan an ûm a, an that ta tho va.
A ruang chu Jerusalem-ah sakawrin an phur haw a; Davida khawpuiah, lal thlânah an phûm a.
Judai ram mite chuan a fapa kum sâwm leh paruka upa Uzia chu a pa Amazia aiah lalah an siam a.
A pa thih hnu chuan Uzia chuan Elath khua chu Judai ramah a la kîr a, a din ṭha leh ta a.
Joasa fapa Amazia chu Juda lal kum sâwm leh panga a nih kumin Joasa fapa Jeroboama pahnihna chu Israel lal a ni ṭan a, Samaria khuaah kum sawmli leh pakhat a lal a.
hmuha thil sual chu a ti a, an pu Nebata fapa Jeroboama thil sual tih, Israel-te a hruai khawlohna sual chu a bân chuang lo.
Israel ram ni ṭhîn, Hamath kalkhân aṭanga Tuipui Thi inkâr ramte chu a la kîr a. Chu chu, a chhiahhlawh Gathhefer mi, Amitaia fapa zâwlnei kâa
Israel-te tuar hrehawmzia chu
chuan Israel-te chu tihchhiat hlen dêr zawng a tum lo, chhantu atân Jeroboama pahnihna hi a rawn hmang a ni.
Jeroboama thil tih dang zawng zawng, indonaa a huaizia te, Damaska leh Hamath kalkhân Israel rama a lâk kîr thu te, Israel lalte chanchin ziakna bu-ah a chuang.
Jeroboama chu a thi a, Samaria khuaa lalho thlânah chuan an phûm a, a fapa Zekaria chu a lo lal ta a.
Jeroboama pahnihna chu Israel rama kum sawmhnih leh pasarih a lal kumin
Amazia fapa Uzia chu kum sâwm leh paruk a ni a, Juda lalah a ṭang ṭan a, Jerusalem-ah kum sawmnga leh pahnih a lal a. A nu chu Jerusalem mi Jekoli a ni.
A pa Amazia angin
Chuvângin, lal chu
A fapa Jothama chuan lal chhûngkua chu a ho va, Judai ram chu a awpsak a.
Uzia thiltih dangte chu Juda lalte chanchin ziakna bu-ah a chuang.
Uzia chu a thi a, Davida khawpuia lal thlânah an phûm ve a, a fapa Jothama chu a lo lal ta a.
Uzia chu Judai rama kum sawmthum leh pariat a lal kumin Jeroboama fapa Zekaria chu Israel ramah a lal ṭan a. Samaria khuaah thla ruk a lal a.
A hmaa lal dangte ang bawkin
Jabesa fapa Saluma chuan Zekaria chu a phiar a, Ibleam-ah a that a, a aiah a lal ta a.
Zekaria thil tih dangte chu Israel lalte chanchin ziakna bu-ah a chuang.
Jehua hnêna
Uzia chu Juda lal kum sawmthum leh pakua a nih kumin Jabesa fapa Saluma chu Israel lal a ni ṭan a. Samaria khuaah thla khat a lal a.
Gadia fapa Menahema chu Tirza aṭangin Samaria khuaah a lo kal a. Saluma chu a that a, a lo lal ta a.
Saluma thil tih dang zawng zawng chu Israel-te lal chanchin ziakna bu-ah a chuang.
Tirza aṭanga Menahema a lo kal khân Tapua khua chu a hnêna an inpêk duh loh avângin a tichhe vek a, a chhûnga chêngte leh a vêl rama mite chu a that a, hmeichhe rai laite pawh an dul a pîrthlêrsak a.
Uzia chu Juda lal kum sawmthum leh pakua a nih kumin Gadia fapa Menahema chu Israel ramah lal a ni ṭan a, Samaria khuaah kum sâwm a lal a.
hmuha thil sual a ti a, Nebata fapa Jeroboama thil sual tih, Israel-te a hruai khawlohna sual kha a dam chhûng chuan a thlah lo.
Lal Tiglat Pilesera chuan Israel ram a rawn rûn a, Menahema chuan tangkarua kg. sîngthum leh sângli a lo pe a, Israel rama nghet lehzuala lala ṭhu tûrin a puih duh a beisei a ni.
Menahema chuan Israel mi hausate tangka tlang sawmnga zêl a lâksak a, chu chu a pe a ni. Tichuan, Tiglat Pilesera chu an ram lamah a haw leh ta a.
Menahema thiltih dang zawng zawng chu Israel lalte chanchin ziakna bu-ah a chuang.
A thi a, an phûm a, a fapa Pekahia chu a lo lal ta a.
Uzia chu Juda lal kum sawmnga a nih kumin Menahema fapa Pekahia chu Israel ramah lal a ni ṭan a, Samaria khuaah kum hnih a lal a.
hmuha thil sual a ti a, Nebata fapa Jeroboama thil sual tih, Israel-te a hruai khawlohna sual kha a thlah chuang lo.
A sipai hotu pakhat Remalia fapa Peka chuan Gilead khaw mi sawmnga nên an phiar a, Pekahia chu Samaria khaw kulhbîng Argob leh Aria bulah an that a, a aiah a lo lal ta a.
Pekahia thil tih zawng zawng chu Israel lalte chanchin ziakna bu-ah a chuang.
Uzia chu Juda lal kum sawmnga leh pahnih a nih kumin Remalia fapa Peka chu Israel ramah lal a ni ṭan a, Samaria khuaah kum sawmhnih a lal a.
hmuha thil sual a ti a, Nebata fapa Jeroboama thil sual tih, Israel-te a hruai khawlohna sual kha a thlah chuang lo.

Peka lal lai hian Asuria lal Tiglat Pilesera chuan Ijon te, Abel-beth-maaka te, Janoa te, Kades te leh Hazor khua te chu a la a, Gilead ram te, Galili ram te, Naftali ram te a la bawk a, mite chu Asuria ramah salah a hâwn a.
Uzia fapa Jothama chu Judai lal kum sawmhnih a nih kumin Ela fapa Hosea chuan Peka chu a phiar ru a, a bei a, a that a; a aiah a lo lal ta a.
Peka thil tih dangte chu Israel lalte chanchin ziakna bu-ah a chuang.
Remalia fapa Peka chu Israel lal kum hnih a nih kumin Uzia fapa Jothama chu,
kum sawmhnih leh panga a ni a, Juda lal a ni ṭan a, Jerusalem-ah kum sâwm leh paruk a lal a, a nu chu Zadoka fanu Jerusi a ni.
A pa Uzia tih angin
Hnam dang pathian biakna hmunsângte erawh chu a tiral lo; miten thil an hlân a, rimtui an hâl ta cheu a ni. Tempul hmâr lam kawngkhâr hi Jothama siam a ni.
Jothama thil tih dangte chu Juda lalte chanchin ziakna bu-ah a chuang.
A lal lai hian
Jothama chu a thi a, Davida khawpui lalho thlânah an phûm a, a fapa Ahaza chu a lo lal ta a.
Remalia fapa Peka chu Israel lal kum sâwm leh pasarih a nih kumin Jothama fapa Ahaza chu
kum sawmhnih a nihin Judai ramah a lal ṭan a. Jerusalem-ah kum sâwm leh paruk a lal a. A pu Davida angin
Israel lalho tih dân ṭha lo a zâwm ve a ni. Ama fapa ngei pakhat pawh hâlral thilhlan atân a talh a, milem hmaah a hlân a; Israel-te hmaa
Tlâng tinrênga hnam dang pathian biakna hmunsângah te, thingbuk ṭha hlim apiangah te thilhlante a hlân a, rimtuite a hâl ṭhîn.
Suria lal Rezina leh Israel lal Peka chuan Jerusalem an bei a; mahse, an la thei lo.
Hetih lai hian Suria lal Rezina chuan Elath khua a la leh a, Juda-ho va awmte chu a hnawt chhuak a, Edom-ho chu Elath khuaah chuan tûn thlengin an awm ta a ni.
Ahaza chuan Asuria lal Tiglat Pilesera hnênah palai a tîr a, “I chhiahhlawh, i fa ka nih hi, Suria lal leh Israel lalin min bei a, an kut ata min rawn chhan chhuak ta che,” a ti a.
Ahaza chuan
Asuria lal chuan Ahaza ngen angin Damaska khua chu a sipaite nên a bei a, a la a, Rezina chu a that a, mite chu a khawpui Kir-ah salah a hâwn a.
Asuria lal Tiglat Pilesera hmu tûrin Ahaza chu Damaska khuaah a kal a, Damaska khuaa maichâm chu a en a, puithiam Uria a ko va, maichâm an siam dân hmang chu chipchiar takin a entîr a.
Uria chuan Damaska khuaa mi ang chiah maichâm a siam a, Ahaza lo kîr hmain a siam zo va.
Damaska khua aṭanga a lo hâwn chuan Ahaza chuan maichâm siam zawh tawh chu a rawn hmu a.
Lal chuan hâlral thilhlan te, buhbâl thilhlan te a hlân a, uain thilhlan te a bun a, remna thilhlan thisen te chu maichâmah chuan a theh a.
Dâr maichâm,

Uria hnênah, “Ka maichâm hi a lian zâwk a, zîng hâlral thilhlan leh tlai hâlral thilhlan hâl nân hmang la, lal leh mipui puala hâlral leh buhbâl thilhlante pawh hâl ṭhîn la, mipui uain thilhlante chu bun ṭhîn ang che. Hâl ral atân leh thil dang atâna ran hlan thisen chu he maichâmah hian theh ang che. Dâr maichâm erawh chu Pathian ka rawn biak nân khêk tlat ang che,” a ti a.
Uria chuan lal thu ang chuan a ti a.
Lal Ahaza chuan dâr nawrlirh chu a phelh darh a, tui bâwm chu a la thla a. Dâr tuizêm, bâwngpa sâwm leh pahnih chunga inhûng pawh kha a sawn a, lungrem chungah a hûng a.
Asuria lal tlawn lungawi nân Ahaza chuan Tempul aṭangin lalṭhutthlêng hûnna tûr dawhkân pawh chu a la sawn a, Tempula lal luhna tûr bîka siam kawngka pawh a hnawh ta a.
Lal Ahaza thiltih dang zawng zawng chu Juda lalte chanchin ziakna bu-ah a chuang.
Ahaza chu a thi a, Davida khawpuia lal thlânah an phûm a, a fapa Hezekia chu a lo lal ta a.
Ahaza chu Juda lal kum sâwm leh pahnih a nih kumin Ela fapa Hosea chu Israel lal a lo ni a, Samaria khuaah kum kua a lal a.
hmuha thil sual a ti a, a hmaa Israel lalte ang êm erawh chu a ni lo.
Asuria lal Salmanesera chuan a rawn bei a, Hosea chu a lo inpe a, kum tin chhiah a chawi ta a.

Kum khat chu Hosea chuan Aigupta lal Soa hnênah palai a tîr a, ṭanpuiah a sâwm a; kum tin chhiah Asuria hnêna a pêk kha a pe duh ta lo va. Salmaneseran chu chu a hriatin Hosea chu a man a, tân inah a khung ta a.
Salmanesera chuan Israel ram chu a rûn ta a, Samaria khua chu a hual a. An hual kum thumna,

Hosea kum kua a lal kumah Samaria khua chu Asuria lal chuan a la ta a; Israel-te chu salah a man a, Asuria ramah a hruai a. Ṭhenkhat chu Hala khuaah te a awmtîr a, ṭhenkhat chu Gozan bial Habor lui kamah te, Media ram khuaah te a awmtîr a.
Israel-ten an Pathian,
hnam dang, an hmaa a hnawh chhuahte awm dân kha an la a, Israel lalten thil ṭha lo tak an chîn chhuahte chu an chîng ve ta zêl a ni.
An Pathian remtih loh zâwng Israel-te chuan an ti a; an khaw tê ber leh lian berah pawh hnam dang pathian biakna hmunsâng an siam zêl a;
mual tinah mai, thingbuk ṭha deuh hlim apiangah lung milem leh pathiannu Aseri lem thing an phun thliah thluah a.
Ram ata
thupêk, milem biak loh tûr a tih chu an awih duh lo.
Mahse, an awih duh tlat lo, an pute angin luhlul an chhuah a, an Pathian,
A thuruatte chu an hnâwl a, an pate nêna a thuthlung chu an bawhchhia a, a zilhna pakhat mah an bengkhawn duh lo. An ho êm a, milem ho tak takte an be mai mai a,
, an Pathian thupêk zawng zawng an hnâwl a, dârin bâwngno lem pahnih an chhûng a, chibai an bûk a. Pathiannu Aseri limte an siam a, arsite chibai an bûk a, Baal rawng an bâwl a.
An fanu an fapate chu hnam dang pathian hnêna hâlral thilhlanah an hlân a, ramhuaizâwl leh mitthi thlûk thiamte an râwn a.
Israel mite chungah
Juda-ho pawh chuan an Pathian,
chuan Israel zawng zawngte chu a hnâwl ta a, a hrem a, hmêlma râwng pui pui kutah a pe a, a hmuh phâk loh tûrah a tîr bo ta a ni.
Jeroboama hnung chu an zui a, thil sual a tih ang apiang chu an ti ve ta a.
A chhiahhlawh zâwlneite hmanga a sawi ang khân a hmuh phâk loh tûrah a hnawt bo ta nge nge a ni. Tichuan, Israel mite chu Asuria ramah tûn thlengin salah an la tang a ni.

Asuria lal chuan Babulon te, Kutha te, Iva te, Hamath te leh Sefarvaim khuaa awm te chu a hruai a, Israel sala hruai tâkte aiah Samaria ramah chuan a awmtîr a; chûnga khuate chu an luah a, an chêng ta a.
An lo awm tirh chuan
Asuria lal chu, Samaria ram khuaa a mi dahte chuan chu ram pathian dân chu an hre lo va; chuvângin, chu pathian chuan seh tûrin sakeibakneite a tîr a ni tih an hrilh a.
Lal chuan, “Sala kan man puithiam pakhat kha chhuah ula, an ram pathian dân zirtîra, an zînga awm ve tûrin kîrtîr teh u,” a ti a.
Tichuan, Israel puithiam pakhat Samaria khua aṭanga sala an man chu a kal a, Bethel-ah a lo awm a; chuta ṭang chuan mite chu
Samaria rama awm tate chuan anmahni milem an siam ta zêl a. Israel-hovin Pathian biakna hmun tûr an siamah chuan an dah a, pâwl hrang hrang khân mahni awmna khuaah milem an siam ṭheuh zêl a.
Babulon aṭanga lo kalte chuan Sukot-benot lim an siam a, Kutha mite chuan Nergala lim an siam a, Hamath-ho chuan Asima lim,
Iva mite chuan Nibhaza lim, leh Tartaka lim te, Sefarvaim-ho te chuan an pathian Andramelek leh Anamelek lim hmaah an fanu leh an fapate hâlral thilhlan atân an hlân.
Hêng mite hian
chu an bia a, an lo kalna ram tih dân angin anmahni pathiante chu an be tho va ni.
Vawiin thlengin an tih dân hlui chu an la chîng a ni.
Israel mite nên
Zo tak leh thei taka Aigupta ram aṭanga lachhuaktu che u thu hi awih rawh u, chibai min bûk ang a, thilhlante ka hmaah in hlân tûr a ni.
In tâna ka ziak, dânte leh thupêkte hi in zâwm fo tûr a ni, pathian dangte thu in awih tûr a ni lo.
Thuthlung ka siamsak che u hi in theihnghilh tûr a ni hek lo.
Kei in
Amaherawhchu, chûng mite chuan an bengkhawn lo, an tih ṭhin chu an ti zêl mai a ni.
Hêng mite hian
Ela fapa Hosea chu Israel lal kum thum a nih kumin Ahaza fapa Hezekia chu
kum sawmhnih leh pangaa upa a nihin Juda lal a ni ṭan a, Jerusalem-ah kum sawmhnih leh pakua a lal a. A nu chu Zekaria fanu Abijai a ni.
A pu Davida angin

Hnam dang pathian biakna hmunsângte a tichhia a, lungphunte a tibung a, pathiannu Aseri lim thing phunte chu a kit a. Mosia dâr rûl siam Nehustan an tih chu a chhu chhia a. Chumi hun thleng chuan Israel-ten dâr rûl lem tân rimtui an hâl ṭhîn.
Hezekia chuan
chu a vuan tlat a, a thu a hnial ngai lo. Mosia hnêna Pathian thupêk kha ngun takin a zâwm ṭhîn.
Chuvângin,
Filistia mite a sawisa ṭhîn, an awmna apiang a rûn a; khaw tê ber pawh, khaw lian ber pawh Gaza leh a chhehvêl ramte pawh a hrût ṭhîn.
Hezekia kum li a lal kum chuan Hosea chu Israel lal kum sarih a ni hman tawh a, Asuria lal Salmanesera chuan Israel ram a rawn rûn a; Samaria khua chu a hual a.
An hual kum thum kum, Hezekia lal kum ruk kum chuan an la ta a, chu chu Hosea lal kum kuana a ni.
Asuria lal chuan Israel-te chu salah a man a, Asuria ramah a hruai a, a ṭhen erawh chu Gozan bial Habor lui kamah te, Media khuaah te a awmtîr a.
Israel-ten an Pathian
Hezekia kum sâwm leh pali a lal kumin Asuria lal Senakeriba chuan Judai rama kulh nei khuate chu a bei a, a la ta hlawm a.

Lakis khuaa Senakeriba awm chu Hezekia chuan, “Thil ka lo tidik lo a ni; min kîrsan la, i phût ang ang ka pe ang che,” tiin thu a thawn a. Asuria lal chuan tangkarua kg. sîngkhat leh rangkachak kg. sângkhat a lo phût a.
Tempul leh lal sum bâwma tangka awm zawng zawng chu a thawn a,
Tempul kawngkhâra rangkachak belte chu a khawk a, amah ngeiin kawngka biang a tuamna rangkachak pawh chu a khawk a, Senakeriba chu a thawn a.

Asuria lal chuan Lakis aṭangin Jerusalem-a Hezekia chu bei tûrin sipai tam tak a tîr a, a sipai hotu lian lian pathum-Tartana te, Rab-Saria te leh Rab-Sakea te chuan an ho va. Jerusalem an han thlen chuan dîl chhakta zâwk aṭanga tuikawng kam, puansutu hmun panna kawngah chuan an awm a.
Lal chu an au va, lal in enkawltu Hilkia fapa Eliakima te, lehkhaziaktu Sibna te, Asafa fapa, thil chhinchhiahtu Joa te chu an lo chhuak a.
Rab-Sakea chuan an hnênah, “Hezekia hi han hrilh rawh u, lal ropui Asuria lal chuan heti hian a ti: ‘Tu nge maw rinchhan i neiha, heti taka i inchhutngên le!
Hmui themthiam ringawtin sipai chakna leh indo thiamna i ngam thei dâwn em ni? Asuria lal laka i hel vei hi tu nge rawn pui dâwn che?
Aigupta-in a rawn pui ang che maw? Luang tiang hawl ang lek a ni asin, a tliak ang a, i kut a chhun mai ang. Aigupta lal Farawa chu amah rinchhantute tân chutiang lek chu a ni asin.
“In Pathian
Tichuan, ka pu, Asuria lal nên inremsiam mai rawh u; a chuang tûr mihring i hmuh zawh dâwn phei chuan sakawr sânghnih ka pe nghâl mai ang che.
Asuria sipai hotu neu ber pawh in tluk si lo va, sakawr-tawlailîr te, sakawr chungchuang te Aigupta chuan a rawn thawn tehlul ang che maw?
In ram ka rawn bei a, ka rawn la hi
Eliakima te, Sebna te leh Joa te chuan, “Suria ṭawngin thu sawi rawh, kan hre thei e; Juda ṭawng chu hmang suh, kulh banga ṭhute hian an ngaithla ṭhup a ni,” an ti a.

Ani chuan, “Asuria lal hian nangni leh in lal Hezekia hnênah chauh thu sawi tûrin mi tîr em ni? Ni suh e; mipui, tûna kulh banga ṭhu, nangmahni ang bawka mahni zun leh êk eia in tûrte hnênah pawh thu ka sawi a nih hi,” a ti a.
Tin, Rab-Sakea chu a ding a, Juda ṭawngin a au va, “Lal ropui Asuria thu hi ngaithla teh u:
‘Hezekia chuan bum che u suh se, ka lakah a hum thei chuang lo vang che u,’ lal chuan a ti e.

Hezekia thu ngaichâng duh suh u, Asuria lal chuan, ‘Inremsiam ang u, lo chhuak ula, ka lo kal leh hma chu mahni grep rah in ei ang a, mahni theipui rah in tlân ang a, mahni tuizêm tui in in ṭheuh dâwn nia,’ a ti a.

Lal chuan in ram anga ram ṭhaah, grep huan ṭha tak tak, uain tamna ramah a la awmtîr ang che u a, chhangphut tûr buh ṭhat duhna ram, oliv kûng te, a hriak te, khawizu tamna ramah chuan a awmtîr ang che u. A thu in awih chuan nungdamin in chhuak ang, in thi lo vang. ‘
Hnam dang pathiante zingah Asuria lal laka chhanhim thei an awm em ni?
Hamath leh Arpad pathiante kha khaw nge an awm tâk? Sefarvaim pathian te, Hena leh Iva pathiante kha khaw nge an awm tâk? Samaria khua chhan thei an awm em ni?
Hêng ram zawng zawng pathiante hian engtikah khân nge an ram chu an chhan ngai?
Lalin, “Tu man chhâng suh u,” a tih avângin an ngawi ṭhuap a, kam khat mahin an chhâng lo.
Lal chhûngkaw enkawltu Hilkia fapa Eliakima te, ziaktu Sebna te, thil chhinchhiahtu Asafa fapa Joa te chuan an puan an pawtthlêr a, an lo kal a, Rab-Sakea thu chu Hezekia an hrilh a.
Lal Hezekia chuan chûng thu chu a hriatin a puan a pawtthlêr a, saiip puan a sin a,
Lal chhûngkaw enkawltu Eliakima te, ziaktu Sebna te leh puithiam zînga upate chu saiip puan sinin zâwlnei Isaia hnênah a tîr a.
“Lal Hezekia chuan heti hian a ti: ‘Vawiin hian kan tân manganna ni a lo thleng ta; min hmuhsit a, min diriam tâk êm hi! Nau hrin hun tawh a nu chau lutuk tawh si ang mai kan nih hi.
Pathian nung sâwt tûra Asuria lal mi tirh, Rab-Sakea thu sawi kha,
Lal Hezekia mi tirhte chu Isaia hnên an va thleng a,
Isaia chuan an hnênah, “
Ngai teh, a rilru ka tizâm ang a, thuthang ka hriattîr ang; a ramah a kîr ang a, a ram ngeiah khandaihin an sât hlum ang,’ tiin in pu hnênah sawi rawh u,” a ti a.
Rab-Sakea chu a ṭîn a, Lakis aṭangin Asuria lal chu a insawn a, Libna khua a bei tih a hriatin chu lam chu a pan a, a va hmu a.
Ethiopia lal Tirhaka chanchin Asuria lal chu an hrilh a; amah bei tûrin a lo thawk tih a hriatin Hezekia hnênah zualko a tîr a, lehkha a thawn a.
Judai ram lal Hezekia hnênah, “I rinchhan in Pathian chuan, ‘Asuria lal kutah Jerusalem chu a pe lo vang,’ tiin bum che u suh se.
Asuria lalten an ram luah dang zawng zawnga an thiltih, an ram an tihchhiat vek dânte i hria a. Nang tehlul hi i him bîk dâwn em ni?
‘Ka paten an tihchhiat hnam Gozan te, Haran te, Rezep te leh Telasar-a awm Edom-ho te kha an pathianten an chhan thei em ni?
Khawiah nge Hamath lal te, Arpad lal te, Sefarvaim-a khaw awm lal te, Hena lal te, Iva lal te kha an awm tâk?’ va ti rawh u,” a ti a.
Zualko lehkha rawn ken chu Hezekia chuan a hmuhin a han chhiar a,
Hezekia chu
Aw
Aw
An pathiante chu meiah an rawhsak a, chu chu Pathian an ni lo rêng a, mihring kuta siam thing leh lung mai mai an ni a, chhe ngei tûr phei zawng an ni.
Aw
Amoza fapa Isaia chuan Hezekia hnênah mi a tîr a: “A hnêna i ṭawngṭaina chungchâng leh Asuria lal Senakeriba chungchânga
Israel-te Pathian,
‘Zion fanuin a hmusit che a,
a nuihzat che.
Jerusalem fanuin I tlânchhia chu lu a thinkhum che.
Tu nge i nuihzata, i sâwt le?
Tu lakah nge i râwl i rin?
Tu lakah nge i hawi chapo hle le?
Israel Mi Thianghlima lakah a ni.
I chhiahhlawhte hmangin
‘Tawlailîr tam tak nên tlâng sâng sângah ka lâwn a,
Lebanon tlâng kil tin ka fang;
Sidar thing sâng ka kit a,
Fâr thing ṭha ṭha ka kit asin.
A tlâng sâng lai ngaw rilte pawh ka fang vek a.
Tuite ka chhun chhuak a, ka in bawk a,
Aigupta luite ka kephahin ka dai kang vek a ni,’ i ti vei a.
Hmân aṭanga tih ka tum tawh a ni,
I hre na nge?
Tûna thil lo thleng hi hmâna ka rêl daih tawh a ni.
Kulh nei khuate i tihchhiata,
A chhûnga chêng an zâmzia te leh thlabâr taka an mualpho te,
Phûl leh muala hlobet,
In chung zâwla hnim ṭiak tîr te,
Thli lum chhêm vuai tâk te,
Ka rêl lâwk vek a ni.
Ka chunga i ânhla te,
I ṭhut, i luh leh chhuahte ka hria asin.
Ka chungah hian i âng vei a,
I chapozia ka beng a lo thleng ta,
I hnârah chuan hnâr kawl ka vuah ang a,
Lakam ka barh ang che a,
I lo kalna lamah ka hnûk kîr leh ang che,” tiin.

Lal Hezekia hnênah, “Hei hi i tân chhinchhiahna a ni ang. Kuminah buh hli in ring ang a, nakkumah pawh chumi hli chu in ring leh ang. A kum thumnaah chuan thlai chîng ula, a rah in seng dâwn nia. Grep phun ula, a rah in ei bawk ang,
Judai rama la dam chhunte chu theikûng, thûk taka zung thlâk, rah tup ang hi an la ni ang.
Jerusalem aṭangin dam chhuak tûr an awm a, Zion tlângah thi bâng an awm ngei dâwn a ni.
Chuvângin, Asuria lal chungchâng chu
A lo kalna kawngah ngei a haw leh ang, khuaah a lo lût tawp lo vang.’
He khua hi keimah avâng leh ka chhiahhlawh Davida avângin ka vêng ang a, ka hum dâwn a ni,” a ti a.
Chumi zân chuan
Asuria lal Senakeriba chu a ṭîn a, a haw a, Ninevi khuaah a awm ta a.
Nisroka tempula a pathian biaa a kûn lai chu a fa Andrameleka leh Sarezera te chuan khandaihin an sât hlum a, Ararat ramah an tlân ta a. A fapa Esarhadona chu a lo lal ta a.
Chûng lai chuan lal Hezekia chu thih ngamin a na a. Amoza fapa Isaian a rawn tlawh a, a hnênah, “
Hezekia chuan bang lam a hawi a, a ṭawngṭai a,
“Aw
Isaia chu a haw a, lal in tual chu a pelh hmain
a tîr kîr a, “‘Kei
Kum sâwm leh pangain i dam chhûng hun ka pawtsei bawk ang. Asuria lal lakah nang leh he khua hi keimah avâng leh ka chhiahhlawh Davida avângin ka humhim dâwn a ni, a ti,’ va ti rawh,” a ti a.
Isaia chuan, “Theipui rah hmin hlâwm han la teh u,” a ti a. Theipui rah hlâwm chu a khawihliah chuan an belsak a, a lo dam ta a.
Lal Hezekia chuan, “
Isaian, “
Hezekia chuan, “Rahka sâwm kaltîr chu a awl em mai, rahka sâwm kîr rawh se,” a ti a.
Isaia chu a ṭawngṭai a, lal Ahaza rahka siama hlim chu
Chumi lai chuan Babulon lal Baladana fapa Merodak-baladana chuan Hezekia chu a dam leh tih a hriatin thilpêk leh lehkha a rawn thawn a.

Hezekia chuan anni chu a lo lâwm hle a, a sum dahna in te a entîr a, a tangkarua leh a rangkachak te, a mosola leh a thil rimtui te, a râlthuam dahkhâwmna in leh a ram chhûng hmun hrang hranga a ro dahte chu entîr loh rêng rêng a nei lo.
Zâwlnei Isaia chu Hezekia hnênah a lo kal a, “Hêng mite hi khawi aṭanga lo kal nge an niha, eng nge an rawn sawi?” a ti a.
Hezekia chuan, “Ram hla tak, Babulon aṭanga lo kal an nih hi,” a ti a.
Isaia chuan, “Lal ina thil eng eng nge an hmuh?” a ti a.
Lal chuan, “Engkim an hmu vek, thil dahnaa kan dah entîr loh rêng ka nei lo,” a ti a.
Lal hnênah Isaia chuan, “
‘Ngai teh, i ina thil awm zawng zawng, i paten vawiin thlenga an dah khâwmte nên, Babulon-a an lâk vek hun a lo thleng lawk dâwn, eng mah hnutchhiah an nei lo vang,’
Nangma hrin ngei, i fapate chu an man ang a, an til an rehsak ang a, Babulon lal rawng an bâwl ang,” a ti a.
Lal Hezekia chuan a dam chhûng chu muang takin an awm ang a, an him dâwn tihna niin a ngai a, “
Lal Hezekia thil tih dang zawng zawng, a huaizia te, tui khuapin tui kawng a kera khuaa tui a lâk luh thu te, Juda lalte chanchin ziakna bu-ah a chuang vek a ni.
Hezekia chu a thi a, a fapa Manasea chu a lo lal ta a.
Kum sâwm leh pahnih a nihin Manasea chu Juda lalah a ṭang ṭan a, Jerusalem-ah kum sawmnga leh panga a lal a. A nu chu Hefzibi a ni.
A mite hmaa
A pa Hezekia tihchhiat, hnam dang pathian biakna hmunsângte chu a din ṭha leh a, Baal tân maichâm a siam a, Israel lal Ahaba ang khân Aseri limte a phun a, vâna arsite pawh a bia a.
‘Jerusalem khua hi min biakna hmun tûr chu a ni,’ tiin
Tempul chhûng pindan pahnihah chuan vâna arsi rual tân te maichâm a dah thluah a.
A fapa pakhat chu hâlral thilhlanah a hlân a. Aien te, ṭhumvâwrte a chîng a, ramhuaizâwl leh mitthi thlûk thiamte a ruai ṭhîn.
Davida leh a fapa Solomona hnênah
‘Israel mite chuan ka thupêk zawng zawng an awiha, ka dân, Mosia hrilh kha an zawm vek chuan an thlahte hi ram ka pêk ata chu ka hnawt chhuak lo vang,’ a ti bawk a.
Judai rama mite chuan
“Manasea chuan thil tenawm tak tak, he rama an awm hmaa awm Kanan mite tih aia tenawm zâwk a ti ṭhîn, a milem siam chawpin Juda-te chu a hruai sual a ni.
Tichuan, Kei,
Samaria khua leh Israel lal Ahaba leh a thlahte ka sawisa ang khân Jerusalem pawh ka sawisa ang. Thlêng hrûk fai an khup ang hian Jerusalem pawh a chhûnga awmte chu ka hru fai ang.
Ka mi, la thi bângte pawh chu ka hnâwl ang a, an hmêlmate kutah ka pe ang a, chûng chuan an duh duhin an rawk ang a, an sawisa ang.

An thlahtute Aigupta ram aṭanga an lo chhuah aṭang tawh khân tûn thlengin, ‘hei chu thil sual a ni’ ka tih chu an ti ṭhîn a, min tihthinur avângin chutiang chuan ka mite chu ka sawisa dâwn a ni,” a ti a.
Manasea chuan pawi khawih lo a that tam khawp a, Jerusalem khaw laiah thisen a luang zuih ṭhîn; Juda mipuite chu milem biak a chîntîr a,
Manasea thil tih dang, thil sual a tihte chu Juda lalte chanchin ziakna bu-ah a chuang.
Manasea chu a thi a, lal huan, lal Uzia huanah an phûm a, a fapa Amona chu a lo lal ta a.
Amona chu kum sawmhnih leh pahniha upa a nihin Juda lalah a ṭang ṭan a, Jerusalem-ah kum hnih a lal a. A nu chu Jotba khaw mi Haruza fanu Mesulemeti a ni.
A pa Manasea angin
A pa tih dân a la a, a pa biak ṭhîn milemte kha a be ve zêl a.
An thlahtute Pathian,
A hote zînga miin an phiar ru a, lal in chhûngah an that a.
Juda-ho chuan Amona fapa Josia chu lalah an siam a.
Amona thil tih dangte chu Juda lalte chanchin ziakna bu-ah a chuang.
Amona chu Uzia huana thlânah chuan an phûm a, a fapa Josia chu a lo lal ta a.
Josia chu kum riat a nihin Juda lal a ni ṭan a, Jerusalemah kum sawmthum leh pakhat a lal a. A nu chu Bozkat khaw mi Adaia fanu Jedidi a ni.
Josia chuan
Kum sâwm leh pariat a lal kumin Josia chuan ziaktu Safana, Azalia fapa, Mesulama tupa chu
“Puithiam lalber Hilkia hnênah kal la, Tempul kawngkhâra mipui thawhlâwm puithiamhovin an dawn kha eng zât nge tling tawh va zâwt teh.
Tempul siam ṭha tûra mi ruatte kutah pe sela, anni chuan,
mistiri te, in satu te leh lung chher mi te pe rawh se; Tempul siam ṭhatna tûr thing te, lung te lei teh se.
Hêng kan mi ruatte hi mi rinawm tak tak an ni, en zuipui an ngai lo vang,” a ti a.
Puithiam lalber Hilkia chuan ziaktu Safana hnênah, “Tempulah dân bu ka chhar e, hei,” a ti a, a pe a. Safana chuan a han chhiar a,
Lal hnênah a lo kîr leh a, “I chhiahhlawhte chuan in chhûnga tangka an hmuhte chu an phawrh a,
Lal hnênah chuan, “Puithiam Hilkia chuan hei lehkhabu hi mi lo pe asin,” a ti a, lal hriat tûr chuan Safana chuan a chhiar ta a.
Lalin Dân lehkhabua thu chu a han hriat chuan a puan a pawtthlêr a.
Puithiam Hilkia te, Safana fapa Ahikama te, Mikaia fapa Akbora te, ziaktu Safana te, lal in enkawltu Asaia te hnênah lal chuan,
“Kal ta ula, mipui leh Judai ram mi zawng zawng tân he Dân bu chhara zirtîrna chungchâng hi

Puithiam Hilkia te, Ahikama te, Akbora te, Safana te, Asaia te chu zâwlneinu, Mika fapa Saluma nupui Huldaii hnênah an kal a. A pasal Saluma hi Tikva fapa a ni, lal thawmhnaw enkawltu a ni a, Harhasa tupa a ni, Jerusalem vêng thara awm an ni.
An hnênah chuan, “Israel-te Pathian,
Juda lalin a chhiar lehkhabua thu chuang ang khân Jerusalem leh a chhûnga chêngte chu ka sawisa dâwn.
Min hawisan a, pathian dang hnênah thilhlan an hlân a, an thiltihte chuan min tithinur a ni. Jerusalem chungah ka thinur a alh ang a, a mit mai mai lo vang,’ a ti.
râwn tûra rawn tîrtu che u lal hnênah chuan sawi rawh u, Israel-te Pathian,
Jerusalem leh a chhûnga chêngte ka sawisak dân tûr i hriatin pawi i ti a,
I thih hma chuan Jerusalem chu ka tichhe lo vang; nang zawng thlamuang takin i thi ang,’ a ti e,” a ti a. Chu thu chu lal hnênah an rawn thlen leh a.
Lal chuan Judai ram leh Jerusalem-a upate chu a ko khâwm a.
Judai ram leh Jerusalem-a awm puithiam leh zâwlnei te, mipui, mi rethei leh hausate nên, an za chuan tempulah an lo kal a, Tempula an chhar Thuthlung bu chu an hriatah lal chuan a chhiar a.
Dinna tûra an siamah chuan lal chu a ding a,
Lal chuan puithiam lalber Hilkia te, a dawttu puithiamte leh kawngkhâr vêngtute chu

Judai khawpuiah te, Jerusalem kiang vêla hnam dang pathian biakna hmunsânga thil hlântu atâna Juda lalten puithiam an lo dah, Baal hnênah te, ni leh thla hnênah te, arsi leh vâna thil awm hnênah te thil hlân ṭhîntu zawng zawng chu a bân a.
Tempul chhûnga pathiannu Aseri lim an phunte chu a la chhuak a, Jerusalem daiah Kidron ruamah chuan a hâl a, a vâp chu a râwt sawm a, vântlâng thlânmualah chuan a theh darh a.
Tempula nawhchizuarho awmna, Aseri biakna tûr, nu hovin puan an tahna hmun chu a ṭhiat bawk a.

Judai ram khawpui hrang hranga Geba leh Beer-seba inkâra awm puithiamte chu a hruai khâwm a, hnam dang pathian hnêna thil an hlanna ṭhin hmunsângte chu a tihbawlhhlawhsak a. Khawpui luhna kawngkhâr vei lam, khawpui awptu Josua siam kawngkhâr bula maichâm, kêlhuai lim an biaknate chu a ṭhiat a.
Chûnga puithiama ṭang ṭhînte chu Tempula rawng an bâwl an phal lo, an puithiamte puala dah chhang dawidim telh loh erawh chu an ei ve thei.
Moleka hnênah hâlral thilhlana pêk atân an fanu te, an fapa te an hlan tawh loh nân Hinom ruama Tofet chu a sawisa nek a.

Juda lalten ni hnêna hlan tûr sakawr an pêkte chu Tempul tual kawngka bul, sawrkâr milian tak Nathan-meleka chênna in aṭanga hnai têah an dah ṭhîn, chûng chu a dah bo va, ni pathian an hnuh ṭhinna tawlailîrte chu a hâl a.
Lal inahte leh Ahaza in chung chhâwng zâwla an maichâm te, Tempul pindan pahnihna Manasean maichâm a siam belhte nên chuan a ṭhiat a, a chhu chhe vek a, Kidron ruamah a paih a.

Jerusalem khawchhak lam Oliv tlâng chhim lama Sidon pathian tenawm Astarte lim te, Moab pathian tenawm Khemosa te, Amon-ho pathian ngeiawm tak Milkoma lim an biakna tûr hmunsâng, Israel lal Solomona siamte kha a tibawlhhlawh zo vek a.
Josia chuan lungphunte chu a chhu sawm a, pathiannu Aseri lim, an thingtum phunte chu a kit a; chûng awmna hmunah chuan mihring ruh a dah phung a.
Israel hruai khawlotu Nebata fapa Jeroboaman Bethel khuaa pathian biakna tûra maichâm a siamte pawh Josia chuan a ṭhiat a, a lungte chu a tikeh a, a chhu dip vek a. Aseri limte pawh chu a hâl a.

Josia chu a han hawi vêl a, mualah chuan thlân a hmu a, a phawrh a, mihring ruhte chu maichâmah chuan a hâl a, a tibawrhbâng ta a. Chutiang a nih tûr thu chu tûn hma, kût an hman ṭuma lal Jeroboaman maichâma thil a hlan laia zâwlneiin a hrilh lâwk kha. Josian a han en vêl chuan chu thu lo hrilh lâwktu
zâwlnei thlân chu a hmu a. “Tu thlân nge?” a ti a. Bethel khaw mite chuan, “Judai ram aṭanga lo kal zâwlnei, hêng i thil tih tâk lo sawi lâwktu thlân a ni,” an ti a.
Josia chuan, “Khawih ve suh u, a ruhte chu awm mai mai teh se,” a ti a. Tichuan, tu man a ruhte chu an khawih lo, Samaria khua aṭanga lo kal zâwlnei ruh pawh an khawih lo.
Israel ram khaw tinah Israel lalhovin hnam dang pathian biakna hmunsâng an lo siamte chu a tichhia a, chûng lalte chuan
Chûnga rawngbâwltu puithiamte chu a that a, maichâmah chuan mihring ruhte a hâl a, Jerusalem-ah a lo kîr leh ta a.
Thuthlung bu-a ziak angin an Pathian,
Hemi ṭuma mi ang rêngin Israel lal pawh, Juda lal pawh, Kalhlên kût hmang ropui, rorêltuten ro an rêl lai ata tu mah an la awm lo.
Chutiangin Josia lal kum sâwm leh pariat kum chuan Jerusalem-ah Kalhlên kût an hmang ta a ni.

Puithiam lalber Hilkian Tempula Dân bu a chhara chuang Dânte chu an zawm theih nân Josia chuan Jerusalem khua leh Judai ram ata chu aienthiam te, mitthi thlûk chîngte a hnawt chhuak a, chhûngkaw pathian an biak te, milem te leh hnam dangin pathian an biak te pawh chu a paihtîr vek a.
Rilru leh tihtakzetin theihtâwp chhuaha
Lal Manasea thiltihte avâng khân Juda-ho chungah

“Israel-te chunga ka tih ang kha Juda-ho chungah pawh ka ti ve ang, Juda-ho chu ka hmuh phâk loh tûrah ka hnawt chhuak ang. Ka hmun thlan, Jerusalem chu ka hnâwl ang a, min biak ṭhinna tûra ka ruat Tempul chu ka chhuahsan bawk ang,” a ti a ni.
Josia thil tih dangte chu Juda lalte chanchin ziakna bu-ah a chuang.
Josia lal lai hian Aigupta lal Nekoa chuan a sipaite Eufretis luiah Asuria lal ṭanpui tûrin a hruai a. Lal Josia hian lo dan a tum a. Megido-a an inbeihnaah a thi ta a.
A hote chuan a ruang chu tawlailîrah an dah a, an hâwn a, lal thlânah an phûm ta a. Juda-ho chuan Josia fapa Jehoahaza lalah an thlang a, hriak an thih a.
Jehoahaza chu kum sawmhnih leh pathum a nihin Juda lal a lo ni a, Jerusalem-ah thla thum a lal a. A nu chu Libna khaw mi Jeremia fanu Hamutali a ni.
A pute ang bawkin
Aigupta lal Nekoan Hamath bial Ribla hmunah salah a man a, a lal a tâwp ta a. Aigupta lal chuan Juda-te chu tangkarua kg. sângnga leh rangkachak kg. sawmnga a chawitîr a.
Lal Nekoa chuan Josia fapa pakhat Eliakima chu a pa aiawh tûrin lalah a dah a, a hming a thlâksak a, Jehoiakima a vuah a. Jehoahaza chu Aigupta ramah a hruai a, a thi ta a.
Lal Jehoiakima chuan Aigupta lalin chhiah a phût pe tûrin mipui hnênah, an hausak leh hausak loh athuin a khawn ve thung a.
Jehoiakima chu kum sawmhnih leh panga a nihin Juda lal a lo ni a; Jerusalem-ah kum sâwm leh pakhat a lal a. A nu chu Ruma khaw mi Pedaia fanu Zebidi a ni.
A pute ang bawkin Jehoiakima chuan
Jehoiakima a lal lai hian Babulon lal Nebukadnezara chuan Judai ram a rûn a, a hnuaiah Jehoiakima chu kum thum chhûng a lal a, a hel ta a.
chuan Babulon sipai rual te, Moab te, Amon sipai rual te chu Jehoiakima beia, Judai ram tichhe tûrin a tîr a. Hetianga a tih tûr thu hi
Lal Manasea thil sual tih te, pawi khawih lo a thah ṭeuh avângte khân hmuh phâk lohva Juda-ho a hnawh chhuah daih theih nân chûng thil chu
Jehoiakima thil tih dang zawng zawngte chu Juda lalte chanchin ziakna bu-ah a chuang.
Jehoiakima chu a thi a, a fapa Jehoiakina chu a lo lal ta a.
Eufretis lui leh Aigupta hmâr lam ramri inkâr zawng zawng hi Babulon lal thuhnuaia a awm tâk avângin, Aigupta lal leh a sipaite chu an lo thawk chhuak leh tawh lo.
Jehoiakina chu kum sâwm leh pariat a nihin Juda lal a lo ni a, Jerusalem-ah thla thum a lal a. A nu chu Jerusalem mi Elnathana fanu Nehusti a ni.
A pa ang bawkin Jehoiakina chuan
A lal lai hian lal Nebukadnezara sipaite chuan Jerusalem an rawn hual a.
An hual lai chuan lal Nebukadnezara chu Jerusalem-ah a lo kal ve a.
A nu te, a fa te, a sipai te leh lal ina milian te nên Jehoiakina chu Babulon lal kutah a inpe a. Nebukadnezara chuan a lal kum riat kum chuan Jehoiakina chu salah a man a.
Tempul leh lal ina sum awm zawng zawng nên Babulon khuaah a hâwn a,

Lal Nebukadnezara chuan Jerusalem khaw mi, lal chhûngkua zawng zawng, milian zawng zawng, mi sîngkhat salah a hruai a. Mi themthiam rual, thîrdêngte pawh a hruai vek a, Judai ramah chuan mi mâwl tê tê chauh a hnutchhiah a.
Nebukadnezara chuan Jehoiakina chu a nu te, a nupui te, a milian te leh Judai rama milian deuh deuh te nên Babulon-ah salah a hruai a.

Nebukadnezara chuan sipaia ṭang tlâk zawng zawng chu Babulon-ah a hruai vek a ni; mi sângsarih leh mi themthiam rual, thîrdêng te nên sângkhat zet nên a hruai a ni. Chûng chu sipaia ṭang tlâk vek an ni.
Nebukadnezara chuan Jehoiakina pa nau Matania chu Juda lalah a dah a, a hming a thlâksak a, Zedekia a sa a.
Zedekia chu Kum sawmhnih leh pakhat a nihin Juda lal a lo ni a, Jerusalem-ah kum sâwm leh pakhat a lal a. A nu chu Libna khaw mi Jeremia fanu Hamutali a ni.
Lal Jehoiakina angin
chu Jerusalem leh Judai ram mite chungah a thinur êm a, a hmuh phâk lohvah a hnawt chhuak ta a ni.

Zedekia chu Babulon lal lakah a hel a. Tichuan, Zedekia kum kua a lal kum, thla sâwmna, ni sâwm niin Nebukadnezara chu a sipaite nên an lo kal a, Jerusalem chu an rawn bei a, khaw daiah chuan bûk an khuar a, bang an theu hual a.
Zedekia lal kum sâwm leh pakhatna thlengin an hual a.
Chumi kum, a thla lina, ni kua ni chuan khuaah ṭâm a nasa ta hle a, mite chuan ei tûr an nei ta lo va.

Khaw kulh chu an tiâwng ta a. Babulon-ho chuan an hual tlat nâ a, a chhûnga sipai zawng zawng chu lal hovin zânah an chhuak ru vek a. Lal huan bulah an kal a, kulh bang pahnih inkâr kawngkhârah an chhuak a, Jordan lui lamah an tlân a.
Babulon sipaite chuan lal Zedekia chu an ûm a, Jeriko bul phaiah an man a, a sipaite chuan an tlânsan ta vek a.
Zedekia chu Ribla khuaa Nebukadnezara hnênah an hruai a, a chungah ro a lo rêl nghâl a.
A hmuh lai ngeiin a fate chu Nebukadnezara chuan a thahsak a, Zedekia mitmu pawh a kherchhuahsak bawk a; kawl a buntîr a, Babulon-ah a hruai ta a.
Babulon lal Nebukadnezara lal kum sâwm leh pakuana thla nga, ni sarih ni chuan Nebukadnezara vêngtu pâwl hotu Nebuzaradana chu Jerusalem khuaah a lût a.
Tempul chu a hâl a, lal inte leh Jerusalem-a milianho zawng zawng inte pawh a hâl a.
A sipaite chuan khaw kulh bang chu an ṭhiat a.
Nebuzaradana chuan khawpuia mi la awmte chu Babulon-ah a hruai a, mi themthiam, Babulon-a la kal ve lote pawh salah a hruai.
Mi berh tê tê chauh grep huante leh lote thlo atân Judai ramah chuan a hnutchhiah a ni.
Kaldai-ho chuan Tempul dâr ban te, tawlailîrte leh dâr tuizêm te chu an chhuchhia a, a dâr tlangin Babulon-ah an hâwn a.
Maichâma vutlawh leh vut dahna te, khâwnvâr chhitna hmanrua te, thilhlan thisen lo dawhna no te, rimtui hâlna bûr te, Tempul rawngbâwlnaa thil hman dâr chi rêng rêng chu an la vek a.
Rangkachak leh tangkaruaa thil siam rêng rêng chu, berhbu tê tak tê tê, meilawh chenin an la a.
Solomonan Tempul atân dâra a siam ban te, tawlailîr te, tuizêm te chu bûk hleih theih loh khawpa rit a ni.
Ban pahnihte chu an inang chiah a, tawng sâwm leh pariata sâng an ni ve ve bawk.
Sipai hotu ber Nebuzaradana chuan puithiam lalber Seraia te, a dawttu puithiam Zefania te leh Tempula hotu lian pathumte pawh Babulon-ah a hruai a.
Khuaa hotu la awm te, sipai hotu dawttu sipai lam chanchin vawng ṭhatu te leh mi dang, mi pawimawh, mi sawmruk te chu
Nebuzaradana chuan Hamath bial Libna khua, Nebukadnezara awmna khuaah chuan a hruai a.
Lal chuan a vua a, a lo tihlum hlawm a. Chutiang chuan an ram aṭangin sala hruai an ni ta a.
Babulon lal Nebukadnezara chuan Ahikama fapa Gedalia, Safana tupa chu Judai ram awptuah a ruat a, Babulon-a hruai ve lohte kha a kutah a dah a.

Juda sipai leh an hotu Babulon lal hnêna inpe ve duh loten an hriatin Mizpa khuaa Gedalia hnênah an kal a; chûng sipaite chu Nethania fapa Ismaela te, Karea fapa Johanana te, Netofa khaw mi Tanhumeta fapa Seraia te, Maaka khaw mi Jazania te, an mite nên an ni.
Gedalia chuan an hnênah leh an mite hnênah chuan, “Kaldai sawrkâr hnathawkho hi hlau suh u. Ramah hian awm ve mai ula, Babulon lal hnuaiah kûn ula in tân a ṭha ang,” a ti a.

Chumi kum, a thla sarihnaah Nethania fapa Ismaela, Elisama tupa, lal thlah zînga mi chu mi sâwm nên Mizpa khuaah a kal a, Gedalia chu a bei a, a that ta mai a. A bula awm Israel leh Babulon mite pawh chu a that bawk a.
Israel mi zawng zawng, rethei tak takte leh sipai hotu ni ṭhînte chu Babulon-ho an hlauh avângin Aigupta ramah an kal ta a.

Evil-merodaka, Babulon lal a nih kumin, Judai lal Jehoiakina chu a khawngaih a, tân in ata a chhuah a, Jehoiakina chu kum sawmthum leh pasarihna, thla sâwm leh pahnihna, ni sawmhnih leh pasarih a tân hnu chuan a chhuak ta a.
A be ṭha hle a, lalṭhutthlêng chu a tânpui lal dang lalṭhutthlêng aiin a tihsânsak a.
A tân in kawrte chu a hlîp a, a dam chhûng chuan lal bulah chaw a kîl ve ta a.
A dam chhûng chu a mamawh tûr ni tin bithliah neiin an pe ṭhîn a.
Adama thlahte, a chhuan indawt zêlin: Setha, Enosa,
Kenana, Mahalalela, Jareda,
Enoka, Methusela, Lameka leh Nova,
Nova, chuan fapa pathum Sema te, Hama te, Jafeta te a nei.
Jafeta fate: Gomera, Magoga, Madaia, Javana, Tubala, Meseka, Tirasa,
Gomera hi Askenaz-ho te, Difat-ho te, Togarma te thlahtu a ni.
Javana hi Elisa-ho te, Tarsis-ho te, Kitim-ho te, Rode-ho te thlahtu a ni.
Hama hi Kusa-ho te, Mizraim-ho te, Puta-ho te, Kanan-ho te thlahtu a ni.
Hama fa Kusa hi Seba-ho te, Havil-ho te, Sabta-ho te, Raama-ho te, Sabteka-ho te thlahtu a ni.
Raama hi Seba-ho leh Dedan-ho thlahtu a ni.
Kusa hian fapa, khawvêla hnehtu ropui hmasa ber Nimroda a nei.
Mizraima hi Aigupta mi Lud-ho te, Ana-ho te, Lehab-ho te, Naftu-ho te,
Pathros-ho te, Kaslu-ho te thlahtu a ni. Filistia-ho leh Kaftor-ho hi Kaslau thlahte an ni.
Kanana fapa upa ber Sidona leh Heta hi Sidon-ho leh Het-ho thlahtu an ni.
Kanana hi Jebus-ho te, Amor-ho te, Girgas-ho te,
Hiv-ho te, Arka-ho te, Sin-ho te,
Arvad-ho te, Zemar-ho te, Hamat-ho te thlahtu a ni bawk.
Sema thlahte chu: Elam-ho te, Asur-ho te, Arpaksad-ho te, Lud-ho te, Aram-ho te, Uzi-ho te, Hul-ho te, Gether-ho te, Mesek-ho te hi an ni.
Arpaksada chuan fapa Sela a nei a, Sela chuan Ebera,
Ebera chuan fa pahnih a nei a, pakhat chu a dam laia mihringte an inṭhen darh avângin a hmingah Pelega an sa a, pakhat zâwk chu Joktana a ni.
Joktana hi hêngho thlahtu hi a ni: Almodad te, Selef te, Hazarmavet te, Jera te,
Hadoram te, Uzal te, Dikla te,
Ebal te, Abimael te, Seba te,
Ofir te, Havil te, Jobab te.
Sema thlah chhâwng zêl Abrama thlengin hetiang hi a ni: Arpaksada, Sela,
Ebera, Pelega, Reua,
Seruga, Nahora, Tera,
Abrama, Abrahama tih hming pu ta kha.
Ani chuan fapa Isaka leh Ismaela a nei a.
Ismaelan fapa sâwm leh pahnih a nei a, a upa ber chu Nebaiota a ni. A fate hi hêngho thlahtute hi an ni: Nebaiot-ho te, Kedar-ho te, Adbeel-ho te, Mibsam-ho te,
Misama-ho te, Duma-ho te, Masa-ho te, Hadad-ho te, Tema-ho te,
Jetur-ho te, Nafis-ho te, Kedem-ho te.
Abrahama hmei Keturi hian fapa paruk a nei: Zimrana te, Joksana te, Medana te, Midiana te, Isbaka te, Sua te. Joksana chuan fapa Seba leh Dedana a nei a.
Midiana hian fapa Efa te, Efera te, Hanoka te, Abida te, Elda te a nei a, chûng chu Keturi thlahte chu an ni.
Abrahama fa Isaka chuan fa pahnih Esauva leh Jakoba a nei a.
Esauva fate chu: Elifaza te, Reuela te, Jeusa te, Jalama te, Kora te an ni.
Elifaza hi Teman-ho te, Omar-ho te, Zefi-ho te, Gatam-ho te, Kenaz-ho te, Timna-ho te, Amalek-ho te thlahtu a ni.
Reuela hi Nahat-ho te, Zera-ho te, Sama-ho te, Miza-ho te thlahtu a ni.
Edom rama lo awm hmasate chu Seira fate thlah an ni. Seira fate chu: Lotana te, Sobala te, Zibeona te, Ana te, Disona te Ezera te, Disana te.
Lotana hi Hori-ho leh Homam-ho thlahtu a ni, a farnu chu Timnai a ni.
Sobala chu Alian te, Manahat te, Ebal te, Sefi te leh Onam-ho thlahtu a ni. Zibeonan fa pahnih Aia leh Ana a nei a.
Ana chuan fapa Disona a nei a, Disona chu hêngho thlahtu hi a ni: Hamran, Esban, Ithran, Keran-hote hi.
Ezera chu Bilhan-ho te, Zavanho te, Jaakan-ho te thlahtu a ni. Disana chu Uz-ho te leh Aran-ho te thlahtu a ni.
Israel rama lal an awm hmain hêngte hi Edom rama lal awm tawhte chu an ni: Beora fapa Bela chu Edom ram lalah a ṭang a, a khawpui chu Dinhaba a ni.
Bela a thih hnu chuan Bozra khaw mi Zera fapa Jobaban a ai a awh a.
Jobaba thih hnuah Teman-ho ram mi Husaman a ai a awh a.
Husama a thih chuan Bedada fapa Hadada chuan a ai a awh a, ani hi Moab rama Midian-ho hnehtu kha a ni, a khawpui chu Avit a ni.
Hadada a thih chuan Masreka mi Samlaa chu a aiawhin a lal a.
Samlaa a thih chuan Rehobot khaw awmna, ‘luipui’ an tih aṭanga lo kal Saula chu a aiawhin a lal a.
Saula a thih chuan Akbora fapa Baal-hanan a ai a awh a.
Baal-hanana a thih chuan Hadadan a ai a awh a, a khawpui hming chu Pai a ni. A nupui chu Mehetabeli a ni a, Matreda fanu a ni, a pu chu Mezahaba a ni.
Hadada chu a thi a. Edom-ho chi hrang hrang hetiang hi an awm: Timna te, Alva te, Jethet te,
Oholibama te, Ela te, Pinon te,
Kenaz te, Teman te, Mibzar te,
Magdiel te, Iram te.
Jakoban fapa Reubena te, Simeona te, Levia te, Juda te, Isakara te, Zebuluna te,
Dana te, Josefa te, Benjamina te, Naftalia te, Gada te, Asera te a nei a.
Juda hian fapa panga a nei: Kanan hmeichhia Batsuaii lakah fa pathum Era te, Onama te, Sela te a nei a. A fapa upa ber Era hi a sual êm avângin
A monu Tamari lakah fa pahnih Pereza leh Zera a nei leh bawk.
Pereza hian fapa Hezrona leh Hamula a nei a.
Zera hian fapa panga: Zimria te, Ethana te, Hemana te, Kalkola te, Dara te a nei a.
Zera thlah zînga mi Karmia fapa Akana chuan Pathian tâna serh hran tlat tawh a lâk avângin Israel-hoten an tuar phah a nih kha.
Ethana hian fapa Azaria a nei a.
Hezrona hian fa pathum Jerameela te, Rama te, Kelubaia te a nei a.
Rama hian fapa Aminadaba a nei a, ani hian Juda hnam zînga mi ropui tak, fapa Nasona a nei a.
Nasona hian fapa Salmona a nei a, ani chuan Boaza a nei a.
Boaza fapa chu Obeda a ni, Jesaia pa chu.
Jesaia hian fapa pasarih a nei: an upat dân indawtin: Eliaba, Abinadaba, Simea,
Nethanela, Radaia,
Ozema, Davida.
An farnute chu Zeruii leh Abigaili an ni. Zeruii hian fapa pathum Abisaia te, Joaba te, Asahela te a nei.
Abigaili hian fapa Amasa a nei a, a pasal chu Ismaela thlah Jethera a ni.
Hezrona fapa Kaleba chuan Azubi nupuiah a nei a, fanu Jerioti a nei a, fapa pathum Jesera te, Sobaba te, Ardona te a hrinsak a.
Azubi thih hnuah Kaleba chuan Efrati nupuiah a nei a, fapa Hura an nei a.
Hura chuan fapa Uria a nei a; ani chuan fapa Bezalela a nei a.
Kum sawmruk a nihin Hezrona chuan Makira fanu, Gileada farnu, nupuiah a nei a, fapa Seguba a nei a.
Seguba chuan Jaira a nei a, chu mi chu Gilead rama khaw sawmhnih leh pathum chunga lal a ni.
Gesur-ho leh Aram-ho chuan chûng lai ram khaw sawmruk chu an la a, Jaira leh Kenat te khua leh an khawperte pawh an la tel a. Chûng khuaa chêngte chu Gileada pa Makira thlahte vek an ni.
Hezrona chu a thi a, a fapa Kaleba chuan a pa nupui thihsan Efrati chu nupuiah a nei a, fapa Asura a nei a, ani hi Tekoa khaw zuan hmasatu a ni.
Hezrona fapa upa ber Jerameela chuan fapa panga a nei; a upa ber chu Rama a ni, a dang chu Buna te, Orena te, Ozema te, Ahija te an ni.
Rama hian fapa pathum, Maaza te, Jamina te, Ekera te a nei a.
Jerameela hian nupui dang, Atari a nei a, fapa Onama a nei a.
Onama hian fapa pahnih, Samaia leh Jada a nei a. Samaia pawh hian fapa pahnih, Nadaba leh Abisura a nei a.
Abisura hian nupuiah Abihaili a nei a, fapa pahnih, Abana leh Molida a nei a.
Abisura u Nadaba pawh hian fapa pahnih, Seleda leh Apaima a nei a, Seleda chu fa nei lovin a thi a,
Apaima chuan fapa Isia a nei a, Isia chuan Sesana, Sesana chuan fapa Ahlaia a nei a.
Samaia nau Jada chuan fapa pahnih, Jethera leh Jonathana a nei a. Jethera chu fa nei lovin a thi a.
Jonathana chuan fapa pahnih, Peleta leh Zaza a nei a. Hêngho hi Jerameela thlahte chu an ni.
Sesana hian fapa a nei lo, fanu chauh a nei. Chhiahhlawh, Aigupta mi Jarha a nei a,
ani hi a fanu a neihtîr a, fapa Ataia an nei a.
Ataia hian fapa Nathana a nei a, ani chuan fapa Zabada a nei a.
Zabada hian fapa Eflala a nei a, ani chuan fapa Obeda a nei a.
Obeda chuan fapa Jehua a nei a, Jehua chuan fapa Azaria a nei a.
Azaria chuan fapa Haleza a nei a, ani chuan fapa Eleasa a nei a.
Eleasa chuan fapa Sismaia a nei a, ani hian fapa Saluma a nei a.
Saluma hian fapa Jekamia a nei a, ani hian fapa Elisama a nei a.
Jerameela u, Kaleba fapa upa ber chu Mesa a ni, Zifa pa a ni a. Zifa chuan fapa Maresa a nei a, ani chuan fapa Hebrona a nei a.
Hebrona chuan fapa pali - Kora te, Tapua te, Rekema te, Sema te a nei a.
Sema chu Rahama pa a ni, Rahama chuan fapa Jorkeama a nei a, Sema u Rekema chuan fapa Samaia a nei a,
ani chuan fapa Maona a nei a, Maona chuan fapa Betzura a nei a.
Kaleba chuan hmei, Efaii a nei a, ani nên chuan fa pathum Harana te, Moza te, Gazeza te an nei a. Harana pawh hian fapa Gazeza bawk a nei.
Mi pakhat Jadaia chuan fapa paruk, Regema te, Jothama te, Gesana te, Peleta te, Efaa te, Saafa te a nei a.
Kaleba chuan hmei dang Maaki a nei a; fapa pahnih, Sebera leh Tirhana a neihsak a.
Nakin deuhvah fa pahnih, Saafa leh Seva a neihsak leh a. Saafa hi Madmana khaw dintu a ni a, Seva hi Makbena leh Gibea khaw zuan hmasatu a ni. Kaleba hian fanu Aksaii a nei bawk.
Hêngho pawh hi Kaleba thlahte an ni: Kaleba leh a nupui Efrati fapa upa ber chu Hura a ni. Hura fapa Sobala chu Kiriat-jearim khaw dintu a ni.
A fapa, an milai Salma chu Bethlehem khaw dintu a ni, a fa tlum Harefa chu Beth-gadar khaw dintu a ni.
Kiriat-jearim dintu Sobala chu Haroe leh Menuhot-a awm zâtve thlahtu a ni.
Kiriat-jearim-a awmho Ithra-ho te, Put-ho te, Sumat-ho te, Misra-ho te hi a thlahte an ni bawk. Zera leh Estaol khuaa awmte pawh hêng chi pêngte hi an ni.
Bethlehem khaw dintu Salma chu Netofat te, Atrot-beth-Joab khuaa awmte thlahtu a ni. Manahat-a awm zâtve dâwn lai, Zor-ho thlahtu pawh a ni.
Lehkha ziak mi, Jabes khuaa awm Tirat-ho te, Simeat-ho te, Sukat-ho te, Ken-ho te nên chi khat an ni. Rekab-ho nên an inneih pawlh.
An upat dân indawtin hêng hi Davida fa, Hebrona a awm laia piangte chu an ni: Amnona, a nu chu Jezreel mi Ahinoami a ni; Daniela, a nu chu Karmel mi Abigaili a ni.
Absaloma, a nu chu Gesur lal Talmaia fanu Maaki a ni; Adonija, a nu chu Hagiti a ni;
Sefatia, a nu chu Abitali a ni; Ithreama, a nu chu Egli a ni.
Hebron khuaa kum sarih leh a chanve a lal chhûngin Davida chuan fapa paruk a nei hman a. Jerusalem-ah kum sawmthum leh pathum a lal a,
fa pawh tam tak a nei.
Amiela fanu Bathsebi lakah fapa pali, Simea te, Sobaba te, Nathana te, Solomona te a nei a.
Fapa dang pakua, hêngte hi a nei bawk: Ibhara, Elisua, Elifeleta,
Noga, Nefega, Jafia,
Elisama, Eliada, Elifeleta;
hêng bâkah hian a hmeiho lakah fapa a nei nual bawk. Fanu Tamari pawh a nei bawk.
Lal Solomona thlah zêlte chu a chhuan indawtin hêngte hi an ni: Rehoboama, Abija, Asa, Jehosafata,
Jehorama, Ahazia, Joasa,
Amazia, Uzia, Jothama,
Ahaja, Hezekia, Manasea,
Amona, Josia,
Josia hian fapa pali, Johanana te, Jehoiakima te, Zedekia te, Saluma te a nei a.
Jehoiakima hian fapa pahnih Jehoiakina leh Zedekia a nei a.
Babulon sala hruai lal Jehoiakina khân fapa pasarih, Sealtiela te,
Malkirama te, Pedaia te, Senazara te, Jekamia te, Hosama te, Nedabia te a nei a.
Pedaia hian fapa pahnih, Zerubabela leh Simeia a nei a. Zerubabela hian fapa pahnih Mesulama leh Hanania a nei a, fanu Selomithi a nei bawk.
Fapa dang panga Hasuba te, Ohela te, Berekia te, Hasadia te, Jusab-heseda te a nei bawk.
Hanania hian fapa pahnih Pelatia leh Jesaia a nei a; Jesaia hian fapa Refaia a nei a, chu mi chuan fapa Arnana a nei a; Arnana hian fapa Obadia a nei a, ani hian fapa Sekania a nei a.
Sekania hian fapa pakhat Semaia a nei a, tu panga - Hatusa te, Igala te, Baria te, Nearia te, Safa te a nei a.
Nearia hian fapa pathum, Elioenaia te, Hizkia te, Azrikama te a nei a.
Elioenaia hian fapa pasarih, Hodavia te, Eleasiba te, Pelaia te, Akuba te, Johanana te, Delaia te, Anania te a nei a.
Hêng hi Juda thlah ṭhenkhatte an ni: Pereza te, Hezrona te, Karmia te, Hura te, Sobala te.
Sobala chuan fapa Reaia a nei a, ani chuan fapa Jahata a nei a. Jahata hian fapa Ahumaia leh Lahada, Zora khuaa awmte thlahtute chu a nei a.

Kaleba leh Efrati fa hmasa chu Hura a ni, Bethlehem khaw dintu chu. Hura chuan fapa pathum Etama te, Penuela te, Ezera te a nei a. Etama chuan fapa pathum Jezreela te, Isma te, Idbasa te a nei a, fanu pakhat Hazelelponi a nei bawk.
Penuela hi Gedor khaw dintu a ni a, Ezera hi Husa khaw dintu a ni.
Tekoa khaw dintu Asuran nupui pahnih - Heli leh Naari a nei a,
Naari nên fapa pali - Ahuzama te, Hefera te, Temenia te, Hahastaria te an nei a.
Heli nên fapa pathum - Zereta te, Izara te, Ethnana te an nei a.
Haruma fapa Aharhela thlahte neitu Koza chuan fapa Anuba leh Zobeba a nei bawk.
An chhûng zînga zahawm fâl mi pakhat Jabeza a awm a, a nuin, “Na ti taka ka hrin a ni,” tiin a hmingah Jabeza a sa a ni.

Israel-te Pathian hnênah Jabeza chu a ṭawngṭai a, “Aw Pathian, mal min sâwm la, ram zau tak min pe teh, nâ ka tuar loh nân thil ṭha lo lakah min vêng la, min awmpui reng ang che,” a ti a. Pathian chuan a dîl angin a tihsak a.
Suha unaupa Kaleba chuan fapa Mehira a nei a, Mehira chuan fapa Estona a nei a,
ani chuan fapa pathum - Bethrafa te, Pasea te, Tehina te a nei a, Tehina hi Nahas khaw dintu a ni. Hêngho thlahte hi Reka-ah an awm.
Kenaza chuan fapa pahnih - Othniela leh Seraia a nei a. Othniela pawhin fapa pahnih, Hathata leh Meonothaia a nei a.
Meonothaia hian fapa Ofra a nei a, Seraia hian fapa Joaba hi a nei a, Joaba hi ‘Themthiam Ruam’ an tiha awmte thlahtu a ni. Heta awmte hi mi themthiam tak tak hlîr an ni.
Jefunea fapa Kaleba chuan fapa pathum Irua te, Ela te, Naama te a nei a. Ela chuan fapa Kenaza a nei a.
Jehalelan fapa pali - Zifa te, Zifaia te, Tiria te, Asarela te a nei a.

Ezra chuan fa pali - Jethera te, Mereda te, Efera te, Jalona te a nei a. Mereda hian Aigupta lal fanu Bithiai nupuiah a nei a; fanu pakhat Miriami leh fapa pahnih - Samaia leh Isba an nei. Isba hi Estemo khaw dintu a ni.

Mereda chuan Juda hnam nupui a nei bawk a, fapa pathum - Jereda te, Hebera te, Jekuthiela te an nei a. Jereda hi Gedor khaw dintu a ni, Hebera hi Soko khaw dintu a ni; Jekuthiela hi Zano khaw dintu a ni.
Hodia chuan Nahama farnu nupuiah a nei a; an fate chu Keila khuaa Garm-ho leh Estemoa khuaa awm Maaka-ho thlahtute an ni.
Simona chuan fapa pali Amnona te, Rina te, Ben-hanana te, Tilona te a nei a. Isia hian fapa Zoheta leh Ben-zoheta a nei a.
Juda fapa Sela thlahte chu hêngte hi an ni: Era, Leka khaw dintu; Laada, Maresa khaw dintu; a thlahte chu Beth Asbea khuaa awmte hi an ni, la dek mi an ni.
Jokima, Kozeba khuaa awmte nên hian; Joasa leh Sarafa; anni hian Moab nula nupuiah an nei a. Bethlehem khuaah an awm ta a (an chanchin chhuina hi hmânlaia mi a ni).
Lal mi rawih, bêl vaw mi an ni, Netaim leh Gedera khuaah an awm.
Simeonan fapa panga - Nemuela te, Jamina te, Jariba te, Zera te, Saula te a nei a.
Saula hian fapa Saluma a nei a, ani chuan fapa Mibsama a nei a, Mibsama hian fapa Misma a nei a.
Misma hian fapa Hamuela a nei a, ani chuan fapa Zakura a nei a, Zakura chuan fapa Simeia a nei a.
Simeia chuan fapa sâwm leh paruk leh fanu paruk a nei a, a laichîn dangte erawh chuan fa an nei tam ve lo; Simeona thlahte chu Juda thlahte angin an hung ve lo.
Davida hun thleng kha chuan Simeona thlahte hi Beer-seba-ah te, Molada-ah te, Hazar-sual-ah te,
Bilha-ah te, Ezem-ah te, Tolad-ah te,
Bethuel-ah te, Horma-ah te, Ziklag-ah te,
Beth-markabot-ah te, Hazar-susim-ah te, Beth-biri-ah te, Saaraim khuaah te an awm ṭhîn.
Etam-ah te, Ain-ah te, Rimon-ah te, Token-ah te, Asan khuaah te leh
an chhehvêl khuaah te, Baalat khaw chhimthlang thlengin an awm bawk. An chhûngkaw chanchin leh an awm ṭhinna ziakna bu-ah chuan an hnam hruaitute chu hêngte hi an ni:
Mesobaba te, Jamleka te, Amazia fapa Josa te,
Joela te, Jehua te (Jehua hi Josibia fa a ni, chu mi pa chu Asiela fapa Seraia a ni).
Elioenaia te, Jaakoba te, Jesohaia te, Asaia te, Adiela te, Jesimiela te, Benaia te, Ziza te.
Ziza hi Sifia fa a ni; chu mi chu Alona fa a ni. Alona hi Jedaia fa a ni, chu mi pa chu Semaia fa Simria a ni.
Hêng chhûngkuate hi an pung chak hle a.
Khawthlang lamah Gerar thlengin an inzâr darh a, chu khaw awmna ruam khawchhak lamahte an berâmte an zu tlattîr ṭhîn.
Ram awl zau, hnim ṭhatna hmun, ram reh muanawm tak an hmu ṭeuh a ni. Hêng laiah hian Ham-ho an awm ṭhîn.

Judai ram lal Hezekia hun lai khân khîngte khi Gerar-ah an kal a, chuta awmte puan in leh an bûkte chu an tihchhiatsak a. An berâm tlatna tûr hnim a ṭhat êm avângin chuta lo awmte chu an hnawt chhuak a, anmahni an awm hlen ta a ni.
Isia fa Pelatia te, Nearia te, Refaia te leh Uziela te hovin Simeona thlahte zînga mi zanga chu khawchhak lam Edom ramah an kal a.
Amalek-ho la awmte chu an that a, tûn thlengin an awm ta zêl a.

Jakoba fapa upa ber Reubena thlahte chu hêngte hi an ni. (Reubena hian a pa hmei a mutpui avângin fa u ber nihna lâksak a ni a, Israela fa Josefa fate hnêna pêk a ni a; chuvângin, fa tîr chhiarnaah a hming a tel ta lo va ni).
Juda thlahte hian an unaute an khûm a, an zîng aṭangin lal a lo chhuak na a, fa tîr nihna chu Josefa chan a ni.
Israela neih hmasak Reubena chuan fapa pali, Hanoka te, Palua te Hezrona te, Karmia te a nei a.
Joela thlahte chu a chhuan indawtin hêngte hi an ni: Semaia, Goga, Simeia,
Mika, Reaia, Baala,
Beera; Beera hi Reubena thlahte zînga hotu ber a ni. Asuria Lal Tilgat-pilnesera a man a, salah a hâwn a;
an chhûngkaw chanchin ziaknaah Reubena thlah chi hrang hruaitute hming hêng chauh hi a chuang: Jeiela, Zekaria,
Bela hi Azaza fa a ni, a pu chu Sema, Joel chi a ni. Joel chite hi Aroer khuaah an awm. Hmâr lam ram Nebo leh Baal-meon thlengin an chan a ni.
Gilead ramah hian berâm leh kêl an ngah hle a; chuvâng chuan, khawchhak lam thlalêr ram, Eufretis lui thlengin an luah a ni.
Lal Saula hun lai khân Reuben-ho hian Hagar-ho an bei a, an that a, Gilead ram chhak lama an ram chu an neihsak ta a.
Reuben-ho dawt Basan ramah Gada thlahte hi an awm, khawchhak lamah Saleka thlengin an inzâr a.
Joela thlahte hi an tam ber a, Sefama thlahten an dawt a. Janaia leh Sefata thlahte hi Basan rama chi hlâwm dang awm vete chu an ni.
Gad hnam zîngah hêng chi sarihte pawh hi chhiar tel an ni: Mikael, Mesulam, Seba, Jorai, Jakan, Zia, Eber.
Hêngho hi Huria fapa Abihaila thlah an ni. Huria pa chu Jaroa a ni, chu mi pa chu Gileada a ni a, a pa chu Mikaela a ni. Mikaela pa chu, Jesisaia a ni, chu mi pa chu Jahdoa a ni, a pu chu Buza a ni.
Hêng chite zînga hruaitu ber chu Abdiela fapa Ahia a ni, chu mi pa chu Gunia a ni.
Gilead leh Basan rama khuaahte an awm a, Saron ram phûlah te an awm darh bawk.
Juda lal Jothama leh Israel lal Jeroboama te hun laiin hêng inthlahchhâwng chanchin hi an chhui chhuak a ni.
Reuben-ho te, Gad-ho te leh khawchhak lama awm Manase hnam zâtve te chuan phaw te, khandaih te leh thal hman dân thiam sipai sîngli leh sângli leh zasarih leh sawmruk an nei a.
Hagar hnam Jetur te, Nafis te, Nodab te nên an indo va.
Pathian an ring a, ṭanpui an dîl a, Pathianin an ṭawngṭaina chu a chhâng a, Hagar-ho chu, an thurualpuite nên an hneh a.
An hmêlmate sanghâwngsei sîngnga, berâm nuaihnih leh sîngnga, sabengtung sanghnih leh mi nuaikhat an man a.
Pathian hminga indo an ni a, mi tam tak an that a ni. Sala an tân hma chu chûngho ramah chuan an awm ta a.
Khawchhak lama Manasea thlah awmte chu Basan ramah leh a hmâr lam ramah Baal-hermon-ah te, Senir-ah te, Hermon tlâng thlengin an awm a, mi an pung chak hle.
An zînga chi hrang hrang hruaitute chu Efera te, Isia te, Eliela te, Azriela te, Jeremia te, Hodavia te, Jadiela te an ni. Sipai huai tak tak an ni a, an chite zînga hotu challang tak vek an ni.
Mite chuan an pate Pathian chu an hawisan a; chûng rama lo awm, Pathianin a hnawh chhuahte pathian chu an be ta a.

Chuvângin, Pathianin Asuria lal Pula, Tilgatpilnesera an tih bawk chu, an ram a rawn rûntîr a, Reuben thlah te, Gad thlah te leh khawchhak lama awm Manase thlah te chu a kawi chhuak a, Hala-ah te, Habor-ah te, Hore-ah te leh Gozan lui kamah te chuan a awm hlentîr ta a.
Levia chuan fa pathum - Gersona te, Kohata te, Meraria te a nei a.
Kohata hian fa pali - Amrama te, Izara te, Hebrona te, Uziela te a nei a.
Amrama chuan fapa pahnih - Arona leh Mosia a nei a, fanu Miriami a nei bawk. Arona hian fa pali - Nadaba te, Abihua te, Eleazara te, Ithamara te a nei a.
Eleazara thlahte chu a chhuan indawtin hêngte hi an ni: Finehasa, Abisua,
Bukia, Uzia,
Zerahia, Meraiota,
Amariah, Ahituba,
Zadoka, Ahimaaza,
Azaria, Johanana,
Azaria (Jerusalem Tempul, Solomona saka rawngbâwltu kha),
Amaria, Ahituba,
Zadoka, Saluma,
Hilkia, Azaria,
Seraia, Jehozadaka.
Jehozadaka hi lal Nebukadnezaran salah Judai ram leh Jerusalem-a mi dangte zîngah a hruai ve a,
Levia chuan fa pathum - Gersona te, Kohata te, Meraria te a nei a.
Chûng chuan fapa an nei ṭheuh va. Gersona chuan Libna leh Simeia a nei a.
Kohata chuan Amrama te, Izara te, Hebrona te, Uziela te a nei a.
Meraria hian Mahlia leh Musia a nei a.
Gersona thlahte, a chhuan indawtin hêngte hi an ni: Libnia, Jahata, Zima,
Joa, Idoa, Zera, Jeatheraia.
Kohata thlahte, a chhuan indawtin hêngte hi an ni: Aminadaba, Kora, Asira,
Elkana, Ebiasafa, Asira,
Tahata, Uriela, Uzia, Saula.
Elkana chuan fapa Amasaia leh Ahimota a nei a.
Ahimota thlah, a chhuan indawtin hêngte hi an ni: Elkana, Zofaia, Nahata,
Eliaba, Jerohama, Elkana.
Samuela fapa upa zâwk chu Joela a ni a, a naupang zâwk chu Abija a ni.
Meraria thlah, a chhuan indawtin hêngte hi an ni: Mahlia, Libnia, Simeia, Uza,
Simea, Hagia, Asaia.
Jerusalem khuaa Thuthlung bâwm an lâk luh hnu chuan lal Davidan hêng mite hi Pathian biak huna zaipâwl huaihawt tûrin a ruat.
Lal Solomonan Tempul a sak hnu chuan hêng mite hi pâwla insiamin Inbiakna bûka hla sa tûrin an inkalchhâwk ṭhîn.
Chûng mite inthlah chhâwn dân chu hetiang hi a ni:
Kohata thlahte: Zaipâwl khat hotu chu Joela fapa Hemana a ni. Hemana thlahtute chu an chhuan indawtin hêngte hi an ni: Joela, Samuela,
Elkana, Jerohama, Eliela, Toa,
Zufa, Elkana, Mahata, Amasaia,
Elkana, Joela, Azaria, Zefania,
Tahata, Asira, Ebiasafa, Kora,
Izara, Kohata, Levia, Jakoba.
Asafa chu zaipâwl dang hotu a ni. Asafa thlahtute chu an chhuan indawtin hêngte hi an ni: Berekia, Simea,
Mikaela, Baaseia, Malkija,
Ethnia, Zera, Adaia
Ethana, Zima, Simeia,
Jahata, Gersona, Levia.
Meraria thlah Ethana chu zaipâwl dang hotu a ni. Ethana thlahtute chu an chhuan indawtin hêngte hi an ni: Kisia, Abdia, Maluka,
Hasabia, Amazia, Hilkia,
Amzia, Bania, Semera,
Mahlia, Musia, Meraria, Levia.
An chipui, Levia chi dangte chu, Pathian biakna hmuna tih tûr hrang hrang ti tûrin hna an ruatsak bawk a.

Arona leh a thlahte hi maichâma rimtui hâl a, hâlral thilhlan hlântu an ni. Hmun Thianghlima Pathian biak hi an hova tih tûr a ni. Pathianin a mite sual a ngaihdam nân, thilhlan pawh anni hian an hlân tûr a ni. Pathian chhiahhlawh Mosia sawi ang chiah zêlin chûng chu an ti ṭhîn.
Arona thlahte chu a chhuan indawtin hêngte hi an ni: Eleazara, Finehasa, Abisua,
Bukia, Uzia, Zerahia,
Meraiota, Amaria, Ahituba,
Zadoka, Ahimaaza.
Arona thlah Kohat-ho awmna ram chu hei hi a ni: Levia chite awmna tûra an ruatsak hmasaah an awm a ni.
Judai ramah chuan Hebron-ah an awmtîr a, a vêl ran tlatna pawh an chan a ni.
He khaw huam chhûnga khawperte leh lo ramte chu Jefunea fapa Kaleba chan a ni.
Arona thlahte awmna tûra an ruat chu hêng hi a ni: Hebron, inhumhimna khua a ni nghâl bawk; Libna, Jatir, Estamoa,
Hilen, Debir
Asan, Beth-semes khaw dai, ran tlatnate nên.
Benjamin-ho bialah hêng khuate leh an dai ran tlatnate hi an behtîr a: Geba, Alemet, Anathot. An chhûngkua zawng zawng awmna tûra an ruat chu khaw sâwm leh pathum a ni.
Khawthlang lam Manasea thlahte bialah Kohata thlah mi dangte awmna tûr ṭhumvâwrin a chhûng chhûngin khaw sâwm an ruatsak a.
Gersona thlahte, a chhûng chhûnga an awmna tûr, Isakara-ho ramah te, Aser-ho ramah te, Naftali-ho ramah te leh khawchhak lama Manasea thlahte awmna Basan ramah te khaw sâwm leh pathum an ruatsak a.
Chutiang bawkin Reuben-ho te, Gad-ho te leh Zebulun-ho awmna ramah khaw sâwm leh pahnih Meraria thlahte, a chhûng chhûnga an awmna tûr an ruatsak a.
Chutiang bawkin Israel mite chuan Levia chite awmna tûr khua, a dai vêl ran tlatna tûrte nên an ruatsak a
(Juda-ho te, Simeon-ho te, Benjamin-ho te ram chhûng khua an ruatsak pawh kha ṭhum vâwra tih a ni).
Kohata thlah chhûng ṭhenkhat chu Efraim-ho awmna ramah khaw ṭhenkhat leh a dai vêl ran tlatnate an awmna atân an ruatsak a.
Efraim tlângrama awm inhumhimna khua Sekem te, Gezer te,
Jokmeam te, Beth-horon te,
Aijalon te leh Gath-rimon te hi.
Khawthlang lam Manase-ho ramah pawh Aner leh Bileam khuate chu a dai vêl ran tlatnate nên an chanah an ruatsak bawk.
Gersona thlahte awm nân hêng khuate hi, a dai vêl ran tlatna nên an ruat bawk: Khawchhak lam Manase-ho awmna Basan bialah Golan leh Astarot khuate hi.
Isakar-ho awmnaah: Kedes khua te, Daberat khua te,
Ramot khua te, Anem khua te hi.
Aser-ho awmnaah: Masal khua te, Abdon khua te,
Hukok khua te, Rehob khua te hi.
Naftali-ho awmnaah: Galili-a Kedes khua te, Hamon khua te, Kiriathaim khua te hi.
Meraria thlah dangte chu, hêng khua leh a dai vêl ran tlatnate hi an ruatsak a: Zebulun-ho awmna Rimon leh Tabor khua te.
Jordan chhak lam Jeriko zâwn Reuben-ho awmnaah: Tlâng zâwla Bezer khua te, Jahza khua te,
Kedemot khua te, Mefaat khua te hi.
Gad-ho awmnaah: Gilead biala Mahanaim khua te,
Hesbon khua te, Jazer khua te hi.
Isakara khân fapa pali - Tola te, Pua te, Jasuba te, Simrona te a nei a.

Tola hian fapa paruk, Uzia te, Refaia te, Jeriela te, Jamaia te, Ibsama te, Semuela te a nei a. Chûng chu Tola thlahte chhûngkaw hotu an ni a, mi huaisen hmingthang tak tak an ni; Davida hun laiin an thlahte chu mi sînghnih leh sânghnih leh zaruk an ni.
Uzia hian fapa pakhat Izrahia a nei a, Izrahia leh a fa pali Mikaela te, Obadia te, Juda te, Isahia te hi chhûngkaw hotu an ni ṭheuh va.
Nupui an ngah a, fate pawh an nei tam a, indo mi sîngthum leh sângruk an awm.
Isakara thlah chhûngkaw zîngah sipaia ṭang thei mi sîngriat leh sângsarih hming ziak a ni.
Benjaminan fapa pathum - Bela te, Bekera te, Jediaela te a nei a.

Bela hian fa panga - Ezbona te, Uzia te, Uziela te, Jerimota te, Iria te a nei a, thlah khat zîngah hotu an ni ṭheuh, an thlahte chu mi sînghnih leh sânghnih leh sawmthum leh pali sipaia chhawr theih an awm.
Bekera hian fapa pakua, Zemira te, Joasa te, Eliezara te, Elioenaia te, Omria te, Jeremota te, Abija te, Anathota te, Alemeta te a nei a.
Thlah tin chhiarnaah sipaia ṭang tlâk mi sînghnih leh zahnih hming ziak a ni.
Jediaelan fapa pakhat, Bilhana a nei a. Bilhana hian fapa pasarih, Jeusa te, Benjamina te, Ehuda te, Kenaana te, Zethana te, Tarsisa te, Ahisahara te a nei a.
Thlah khat lu ṭheuh an ni a, huaisenah an hming a thang. An thlahte zîngah sipai ṭang tlâk mi sîngkhat leh sângsarih leh zahnih an awm.
Supim leh Hupim-ho pawh hêng chi zînga chhiar tel hi an ni. Husima chu mi dang thlah a ni.
Naftali hian fapa pali - Jaziela te, Gunia te, Jezera te, Saluma te, a nei a (Bilhaii thlahte an ni).
A nupui Aram mi nên Manasean fa pahnih Asriela leh Makira a nei a. Makira hi Gileada pa a ni.
Makira hian Hupima leh Supima tân nupui a zawnsak a. A farnu chu Maaki a ni. Makira fa pahnihna chu Zelofehada a ni, ani hian fa hmeichhia chauh a nei a.
Makira nupui Maaki hian fapa pahnih - Peresa leh Seresa a nei a. Peresa hian fapa pahnih - Ulama leh Rekema a nei a.
Ulama hian fa pakhat Bedana a nei a. Hêngho hi Gileada thlahte chu an ni. Gileada pa chu Makira a ni a, a pu chu Manasea a ni.
Gileada farnu Hamoleketi chuan fapa pathum - Isoda te, Abiezera te, Malaa te a nei a
(Semida chuan fapa pali - Ahiana te, Sekema te, Likhia te, Aniama te a nei).
Efraima thlahte chu a chhuan indawtin hêngte hi an ni: Suthela, Bereda, Tahata, Eleada, Tahata,
Zabada, Suthela, Efraima hian fapa Ezera leh Eliada a nei bawk a; mahse, Gath khaw mite berâm an ru lai an lo that a.
An pa Efraima chuan a sûn a, a unaute chuan an rawn lênpui a, an thlamuan a.
A nupui chu a pâwl leh a, nau a pai a, fapa a hring a, an chunga buaina a thlen avângin a hmingah Beria an sa a.
Efraima chuan fanu Seeri a nei bawk; Beth-horon chuanchung leh chuanhnuai khua leh Uzen-seer khuate hi a siam a ni.
Efraima hian fapa dang Refaa a nei bawk a, chu mi thlahte chu a chhuan indawtin hêngte hi an ni: Resefa, Tela, Tahana,
Ladana, Amihuda, Elisama,
Nuna, Josua.

An ram lâk, an awm tâkna ram chuan Bethel leh a chhehvêl khua aṭangin chhak lamah Naaran khua a thleng a, thlang lamah Gezer leh a chhehvêl khua a thleng bawk. Sekem leh Aia khua, an chhehvêl khua te nên a huam bawk.
Hêng khawpui Beth-sean te, Taanak te, Megido te, Dor te leh an chhehvêl khuate hi Manasea thlahte thuhnuaiah an awm, khîng hmunahte khian Jakoba fa Josefa thlahte chu an awm a ni.
Hei hi Aser thlah chhuina a ni. Fapa pali - Imna te, Isva te, Isvia te Beria te a nei a; fanu Seri a nei bawk.
Beria hian fapa Hebera leh Malkiela a nei a. Malkiela hian Birzait khua hi a din a ni.
Hebera hian fapa pathum - Jafleta te, Somera te, Hothama te a nei a, fanu Suai a nei bawk.
Jafleta hian fapa pathum - Pasaka te, Bimhala te, Asvata te a nei.
A nau Somera pawh hian fapa pathum - Roga te, Jehuba te, Arama te a nei bawk.
An tlum ber Hothama hian fapa pali - Zofa te, Imna te, Selesa te, Amala te a nei.
Zofa thlahte chu a chhuan indawtin hêngte hi an ni: Sua, Harnefera, Suala, Beria, Imra,
Bezera, Hoda, Sama, Silsa, Ithrana, Beera.
Jethera thlahte chu Jefunea te, Pispa te, Ara te an ni.
Ula thlahte chu Ara te, Haniela te, Rizia te an ni.
Khîng khi Asera thlahte chu an ni. A chi hrang hotute chu indonaa hmingthang, hruaitu fel tak tak an ni. Asera thlahte zîngah sipaia ṭang tlâk mi sînghnih leh sângruk an awm.
Benjaminan fapa panga a nei a, an upat dân indawtin, hêngte hi a nei: Bela, Asbela, Ahara,
Noha, Rafa.
Bela chuan fapa hêngte hi a nei: Adara, Gera, Abihuda,
Abisua, Naamana, Ahoa,
Gera, Sefufana, Hurama.
Ehuda thlahte chu Naamana te, Ahija te, Gera te hi an ni. Geba khuaa chi hrang hrang awmte hotu an ni; salah Manahat-ah an hruai a,
chutah chuan an awm ta a, Uza leh Ahihuda pa Gera hovin an chhuak a ni.
Saharaima chuan a nupui pahnih Husimi leh Baari chu a ṭhen a; chumi hnu chuan Moab ramah a awm a.
Nupuiah Hodesi a nei a, fapa pasarih - Jobaba te, Zibia te, Mesa te, Malkama te,
Jeuza te, Sakia te, Mirma te a nei a. A fate chu an chi hruaitute an ni hlawm.
Husimi nên khân fapa pahnih Abituba leh Elpaala an nei.
Elpaala hian fapa pathum - Ebera te, Misama te, Semeda te a nei a. Semeda hian Ono leh Lod hi an chhehvêl khuate nên a din a.
Beria leh Sema hi Aijalon khuaa awm tate chi hrang hrang hotute an ni, Gath khuaa awm ṭhînte chu an ûm chhuak a.
Beria thlahte chu hêng hi an ni: Ahioa te, Sasaka te, Jeremota te,
Zebadia te, Arada te, Edera te,
Mikael te, Ispa te, Joha te.
Elpaala thlahte chu: Zebadia te, Mesulam te, Hizkia te, Hebera te,
Ismerai te, Izlia te, Jobaba te an ni.
Simeia thlahte chu: Jakim te, Zikri te, Zabdi te,
Elienai te, Zilethai te, Eliel te,
Adaia te, Beraia te, Simrata te an ni.
Sasaka thlahte chu: Ispan te, Eber te, Eliel te,
Abdon te, Zikri te, Hanan te,
Hanania te, Elam te, Anthothiza te,
Ifdeia te, Penuela te an ni.
Jerohama thlahte chu: Samseraia te, Seharia te, Athalia te,
Jaaresia te, Eliza te, Zikria te an ni.
Chûng chu hêng hnam thlahtu bulte chu an ni, an thlahte hi Jerusalem khuaah an awm.
Jeielan Gibeon khua hi a din a, a awm ta a. A nupui chu Maaki a ni.
A fa upa ber chu Abdona a ni, a fa dangte chu Zura te, Kisa te, Baala te, Nera te, Nadaba te,
Gedora te, Ahioa te, Zekera te, Miklota te an ni.
Miklota hi Simea pa a ni. Hêngho thlahte hi an chipuite bul, Jerusalem-ah an awm.
Nera hian fapa Kisa a nei a, Kisa hian fapa lal Saula a nei a. Saula hian fapa pali - Jonathana te, Malkisua te, Abinadaba te, Esbaala te a nei a.
Mika pa Merib-baala chu Jonathana fa a ni.
Mika hian fapa pali - Pithona te, Meleka te, Tarea te, Ahaza te a nei a.
Ahaza chuan fapa Jehoada a nei a, ani chuan fapa pathum - Alemeta te, Azmaveta te, Zimria te a nei a. Zimria chuan fapa Moza a nei a.
