Tangkarua leh rangkachaka thil siam te, puan te, râlthuam te, mosola te, sakawr te, sakawr puakphur chi te an rawn pe zut zut a, kum tin hetianga rawn ti hi an awm zêl a ni.

Lal Solomona chuan sakawr vulhna hmun sângli a nei a, chûngah chuan a sakawr tawlailîr leh a sakawrte chu a dah a, indo sakawr pawh sîngkhat leh sânghnih a nei a, a ṭhen chu Jerusalem-ah a kawl a, a dang chu khaw hrang hrangah a dah a.
Eufretis luipui leh Filistia ram inkâr, Aigupta lui thleng ram chhûnga lal ber a ni a,
Solomona lal laiin Jerusalem khuaah chuan tangkarua chu lungtê ang lek a ni a, sidar thing lah tlâng bulṭhut khawthlang phaia theipui thing ang maiin a tam a ni.
Solomona chuan Aigupta ram leh hmun hrang hrang aṭangin sakawr a tawlh ṭhîn.

A bul aṭanga a tâwp thlengin Solomona chanchin hi zâwlnei Nathana lehkhabu-ah te, Silo mi Ahiza thu sawi ziakna bu-ah te, Nebata fapa Israel lal Jeroboama chungchânga zâwlnei Idoa inlârna ziakna bu-ah te a chuang.
Solomona chu Jerusalem-ah Israel zawng zawng chungah kum sawmli a lal a,
a thi a, Davida khawpuiah an phûm a, a fapa Rehoboama chu a lo lal ta a.
Rehoboama chu Sekem khuaah a kal a, chutah chuan lala siam tûrin Israel-ho, hmâr lama awmte chu, an lo pung khâwm a.
Nebata fapa Jeroboama, Solomona hlauva tlân bo chu, Solomona thih hnu chuan a lo hâwng leh a.
Hmâr lama Israel-te chuan an va pun a, Rehoboama hnênah chuan an kal ho ta a, a hnênah,
“I pa khân min chhawr nasa a, kan phur a tirit êm êm a; nangin min chhawr nêpin kan phur min tihzânsak deuh la, i khua leh tuiah kan awm ang e,” an ti a.
An hnênah chuan, “Ni thum hnuah lo kal leh ang che u,” a ti a, mite chu an chhuak ta a.
Lal Rehoboama chuan a pa Solomona dam laia a bula awm ṭhîn upate chu a râwn a, “Hêng mite hi engtin nge chhâng ila min tih?” a ti a.
Anni chuan, “Hêng mite chungah hian ngilnei la, ṭha takin bia ang che, I mi an ni kumkhua ang,” tiin an chhâng a.
Upaho thurâwn chu a ngaithla duh lo va, tlangvâl, ama rualpui, a kawm ṭhînte chu a râwn a,
“ ‘I pa khân kan phur a tirit êm êm mai, min tihzânsak rawh,’ rawn titute hi engtin nge ka lo chhân ang?” a ti a.
A rualpui tlangvâlte chuan, “Hêngho, ‘i pain kan phur a tirit êm a, min tihzânsak rawh,’ titute hi heti hian chhâng mai rawh, ‘Ka kutzungtê pawh hi ka pa kâwng ai chuan a khauh ang;
ka pain in phur a tirit hle a nih chuan kei chuan ka belhchhah ang; vuakna hruia a hrem ṭhinnaah che u kei chuan khawmualkaikuang ka ruai ang,’ ti ang che,” an ti a.
Ni thum hnuah chuan Jeroboama leh Israel-te chu Rehoboama hnênah, a sawi ang khân an lo kal a.
Lal chuan upaho thurâwn kha zâwm duh lovin mite chu ram takin a bia a.

Tlangvâlho thurâwn ang khân Rehoboama chuan mite hnênah, “Ka pa chuan in phur a tirit hle maw? Kei chuan ka belhchhah ang. Vuakna hruiin a hrem ṭhîn che u a, kei chuan khawmualkaikuangin ka hrem ang che u,” a ti a.
Lal chuan mipui thu chu a ngaihthlâksak duh ta lo va, Silo mi zâwlnei Ahija hnêna Nebata fapa Jeroboama chungchâng Pathianin a sawi kha
Israel mite chuan lalin an thu a ngaihsak duh lo tih an hriatin lal chu an chhâng a:
“Davida ramah chan eng nge kan neih ve le?
Jesaia thlahte zîngah chanvo eng nge kan neih?
Davida thlahte chu an awm awmin awm rawh se,” an ti a.
Israel mi zawng zawng chu in lamah an haw ta a.
Judai rama awm Israel mite chungah chauh chuan Rehoboama chu a lal ta a.

Lal Rehoboama chuan Hadorama, hnathawka phût luih pâwl hotu chu Israel-ho ko tûrin a tîr a, anni chuan lungin an lo dêng hlum a. Chumi avâng chuan Rehoboama chu a tawlailîrah a chuang sawk sawk a, Jerusalem-ah a tlân ta a.
Chuta chin chu Israel mite chu Davida thlahte lakah tûn thlengin an hel ta a ni.
Lal Rehoboaman Jerusalem a thlen chuan Benjamin mi leh Juda sipai ṭha ṭha nuaikhat leh sîngriat a khâwm a, hmâr lama awm Israel-te chu a thuhnuaia dah leh tûrin beih a tum a ni.
Mahse, Pathian mi, Semaia hnênah
Lal Rehoboama te, Juda leh Benjamin mite hnênah chuan heti hian a hrilhtîr a:
“In unau Israel-te chu bei suh u, haw rawh u. An thil tih chu ka thu-a ti an ni,” tiin.
Rehoboama chu Jerusalem-ah a awm a, Judai ram leh Benjamin-ho ram chhûnga hêng khuate hi kulhin a hung a:
Bethlehem te, Etam te, Tekoa te,
Beth-zur te, Soko te, Adulam te,
Gath te, Maresa te, Zif te,
Adoraim te, Lakis te, Azeka te,
Zora te, Aijalon te, Hebron te.
Hêng khaw kulhte hi rinawm takin a siam a, khaw tin tân hotu a ruat a, khaw tinah buh te, oliv hriak te, uain te a chhêk bawk a.
Fei te, phaw te a dah bawk a; chutiang chuan Judai ram leh Benjamin ram mite chu a thuhnuaiah a dah thei a ni.
Israel-ho rama bial tina awm puithiamte leh Levia chite chuan chhim lam an pan a, Judai ramah an lût a.
Levia chite chuan an ran tlatna leh an ram chante chu an kalsan a, Judai ramah te, Jerusalem-ah te an lo kal a. Jeroboama leh a aiawhtute khân
Jeroboama khân hnam dang pathian biakna hmunsânga rawngbâwl tûr, bâwngpa lem a siam chawpte leh ramhuai biakna hmuna thawk tûr ama puithiam a ruat a ni.
Israel hnam zînga
Hemi avâng hian Judai ram chu Solomona fapa Rehoboama lamah chuan an ṭang a, lal Davida leh Solomona lal lai ang mai khân an khawsa a ni.
Rehoboama chuan Davida fa, Jeremota fanu Mahalati nupuiah a nei a, a nu chu Eliaba fanu, Jesaia tunu Abihaili a ni.
Fapa pathum - Jeusa te, Semaria te, Zahana te an nei a.
Nakin deuhvah chuan Absaloma fanu Maaki a nei leh a, fapa pali - Abija te, Ataia te, Ziza te, Selomita te an nei a.
Rehoboama hian nupui sâwm leh pariat leh hmei sawmruk a nei a, fapa sawmhnih leh pariat leh fanu sawmruk a nei a. A nupui leh a hmei zawng zawng zîngah Maaki hi a duh ber a.
Abija hi a fa zawng zawng zîngah a duat ber a, a aiawha lal atân a thlang a ni.
Rehoboaman a fate chhawr dân a thiam hle, Judai leh Benjamin ram chhûng khawpui kulh nei zawng zawngah hotu-ah a dah darh a. An lakah a thilphal hle a, nupuite pawh a neihsak thluah hlawm a.
Rehoboama chuan a lo lal ngheh tâk veleh a mite nên
Rehoboama kum nga a lal kum chuan
sakawr-tawlailîr sângkhat leh zahnih, sakawr chungchuang mi sîngruk leh sipai chhiar sên loh, Lub te, Suki te leh Sudan sipai rual te nên Jerusalem chu a rawn bei a.
Judai ram khaw kulh neite chu a la tawh a, Jerusalem pawh a lo thleng a.
Lal Rehoboama leh Judai ram hruaitu, Sisaka hlauva Jerusalem-a lo tlânte hnênah chuan zâwlnei Semaia chu a kal a, an hnênah, “Hei hi
Lal leh hotute chuan, “Thil sual kan ti a ni,
An thiltih chu a hriatin
Sisaka chuan khua chu a la ang a, lei lal rawngbâwl leh ka rawngbâwl inan lohzia an hria ang,” tiin.
Sisaka chuan Jerusalem chu a rawn bei a, a Tempul leh lal ina thil hlu awmte chu a la vek a. Lal Solomonan rangkachak phaw a siamte nên, engkim a la vek a.
Chûng aiah chuan Rehoboama chuan dâr phawte a siam a, lal in kawngkhâr vêngtute kutah a hlân a.
Lal chu Tempula a kal apiangin vêngtute chuan phawte chu an keng a, an zui a; vênbûkah an dah kîr leh ṭhîn.
hnêna tlâwm taka a intukluh tâk avângin,

Rehoboama chu Jerusalem-ah a lal a, a intinghet ta hle. Lal a nihin kum sawmli leh pakhat a ni a, Jerusalem-ah kum sâwm leh pasarih ro a rêl a. Israel ram zawng zawngah chu khua chu amah chibai bûkna hmun atân
duhzâwng a ngaihtuah lo va, thil sual a ti a.
A bul aṭanga a tâwp thlengin Rehoboama thiltih leh a chhûngte chanchin chu ‘Zâwlnei Semaia chanchin’ ziakna lehkhabu-ah a chuang. Rehoboama leh Jeroboama chu an indo reng a ni.
Rehoboama chu a thi a, Davida khawpuiah an phûm a, a fapa Abija chu a lo lal ta a.
Israel lal Jeroboama kum sâwm leh pariat a lal kumin Abija chu Judai ram lal a ni ṭan a,
Jerusalem-ah kum thum a lal a, a nu chu Gibea khaw mi Uriela fanu Mikaii a ni.
Abija leh Jeroboama chu an indo ta a.
Abija chu sipai huai thlan ṭhalh nuai li nên a thawk a, Jeroboama chuan sipai huai ṭhalh bawk nuai riat nên a rawn bei a,
Efraim tlângram Zemaraim tlângchhîpah Abija chu a ding a, Jeroboama leh Israel-te chu a au va, “Ka thu hi lo ngaithla teh u,
, Israel-te Pathian chuan, Davida leh a thlahte hnênah Israel mite chunga lal nihna chu thu thlung meuhvin a pe tawh a ni tih in hre na nge?
Davida fapa, Solomona chhiahhlawh Nebata fapa Jeroboama chu a pu lakah a hel ta mai a, mi lawilo pui puiin an ṭawiawm a.
Solomona fapa Rehoboama chu an pawisa lo va; ani lah a la naupangin chûngho ngam tûrin a rilru a la puitling si lo va.
Davida thlahte hnêna lal thuneihna

puithiamte leh Levia chite chu in hnawt chhuak a, hnam dang tih dân angin puithiam tûr in ruat chawp a. Bâwngpa rawn kai nazawng leh berâm pasarih emaw rawn khalh apiang chu, ‘kan puithiam’ in tih atân puithiamah in lo serh hrang duh zêl mai bawk si.
“Keini zawngin kan Pathian
Tûk tin leh tlai tin
Pathian chu min hruaitu a ni a, a puithiamte pawh inbeihna tawtawrâwt hâm tûrin an inpeih reng a ni. Aw Israel-te u, in thlahtute Pathian,
Chutih chhûng chuan Jeroboama chuan a sipai ṭhenkhat chu Juda sipaite ep tûrin a dah a, a ṭhen chu an hnung lama châng ru tûrin a kaltîr bawk a.
Juda-ho chuan an han thlîr vêl a, an hmêlmate chuan an lo hual vek tawh a,
Juda-te chu an au chiam a, Abija chuan hma a hruai a, an bei a, Pathian chuan Jeroboama leh Israel-te chu a hneh ta a.
Israel-te chu Juda-te hmaah chuan an tlânchhia a, Pathian chuan Juda-te chu a tichak ta zâwk a ni.
Abija leh a sipaite chuan Israel sipaite chu an titlâwm dêr mai a. Israel sipai ṭha ṭha nuainga zet chu an that a ni.
Juda-te chuan an thlahtute Pathian,
Abija chuan Jeroboama sipaite chu a ûm a, an khawpui ṭhenkhat Bethel te, Jesana te, Efron te chu an chhehvêl khuate nên a chhuhsak a.
Abija dam chhûngin Jeroboama chu a ding chhuak leh hman lo,
Abija erawh chu a chak tial tial a, nupui sâwm leh pali a nei a, fapa sawmhnih leh pahnih leh fanu sâwm leh paruk a nei a.
Abija chanchin dang, a thu sawi leh a thil tihte chu zâwlnei Idoa chanchin ziakna bu-ah a chuang.
Lal Abija chu a thi a, Davida khawpuia lal thlânah an phûm a. A fapa Asa chu a lo lal a. Asa lal kum sâwm chhûng chu râlmuang takin an awm a,
Asa chuan thil dik leh thil ṭha, a Pathian,
Hnam dang maichâmte leh an pathian biakna hmunsângte chu a tibo va, an lung milemte chu a tibung a, Aseri lim an phunte chu a kit a.
Judai ram mite chu an thlahtute Pathian,
Judai ram khaw tina hnam dang Pathian biakna hmunsângte leh an rimtui hâlna maichâmte chu a tibo va, a lal lai chuan râlmuang takin an awm a ni.
Judai ram mite hnênah, “Ti rawh u, kan khuate hi din ṭha ila, lung kulh siam hnan ila, râlvênbûk in sângte, kawngkhâr leh a kalhna te i siam ang u.
Lal Asa chuan phaw leh fei keng, Judai ram aṭangin sipai nuaithum leh Benjamin ram aṭangin indo thiam, awmphaw ha leh thal keng sipai nuaihnih leh sîngriat a nei a; mi huai indo thiam tak vek an ni.
Ethiopia mi Zera chuan sipai maktaduai khat leh sakawr-tawlailîr zathum hruaiin Judai ram a rawn rûn a, Maresa a lo thleng hial tawh a.
Lo do tûrin lal Asa chu a thawk chhuak a, Maresa bul, Zefata ruamah chuan an inep ta a.
Asa chu a Pathian,
Asa leh a hote chuan Gerar thleng rawkin an ûm a, Ethiopia mite chu an that hnem khawp a, lo ṭang tham pawh an awm tawh lo.
Gerar leh a chhehvêl khawpuia awmte chuan
Berâmpu bûkte pawh an hâl a, berâm tam tak an man a, sanghâwngsei te an man a, Jerusalem-ah an haw leh ta a.
Obeda fapa Azaria chungah Pathian Thlarau a lo thleng a.
Lal Asa hmu tûrin a kal a, a au va, “Lal Asa, nangni Judai leh Benjamin mite u, ka thu hi ngaithla teh u. A lama in ṭan chhûng chuan
Israel-te chu Pathian tak be lovin rei tak an awm a, zirtîrtu tûr puithiam an nei lo va, dân an hre hek lo.
Mahse, manganna an tawhin
Chûng lai chuan ram chu a buai a, a mumal loh êm avângin vâk chhuak ṭha ngam pawh an awm ngai lo.
Hnam khatin hnam dang an tirethei a, khaw khatin khaw dang an tirethei bawk a. Pathian chuan buaina leh manganna an chungah a thlentîr a ni.
Nangni erawh chuan zâm lovin ṭan la rawh u. In thil tih rah chu in hmu ngei ang,” a ti a.

Lal Asa chuan Obeda fapa zâwlnei Azaria thu a han hriat chuan a huai phah sawt a, Judai leh Benjamin rama milem awm zawng zawng chu a tibo vek a, a pain tlângram khua a lâk zawng zawnga mi pawh a tibo vek a. Tempul tuala
Asa lal kum sâwm leh panga kum, a thla thumnaah chuan Jerusalem-ah an pung khâwm a.
Chumi ni chuan an râllâk bâwng zasarih leh berâm sângsarih
An thlahtute Pathian,
‘Puitling pawh, naupang pawh, mipa pawh, hmeichhia pawh, Israel-te Pathian,
Aw ring taka auvin
Tihtakzeta thu an thlun tlân tâk avângin Judai ram mite chu an lâwm êm êm a.
Lal Asa chuan, a pi lalnu Maakin Aseri lim tenawm tak chu a phun avângin lalnu a nihna a hlihsak a. Aseri lim chu a kit a, a ek a, Kidron lui ruamah a hâl vek a.
Ram chhûnga hmunsâng, pathian dang an biakna zawng zawng chu Lal Asa chuan tibo vek lo mah se a dam chhûng chuan
A pa Abijan Pathian hnêna a thilpêk zawng zawng chu Asa chuan Tempulah a dah a; amah ngeiin rangkachak leh tangkarua a hlante pawh chu a dah tel a.
Asa chuan kum sawmthum leh panga ro a rêl chhûng chuan indona a awm leh ta lo.
Judai rama Asa kum sawmthum leh paruk a lal kumin Israel lal Baasa chuan Juda lal Asa ram aṭanga tu mah an lo chhuah loh nân leh tu mah an luh theih loh nân Rama-ah kulh a siam a.
Asa chuan Tempul sum bâwm ata tangkarua leh rangkachak a la chhuak a, Damaska khuaa awm Suria lal Ben-hadada hnênah a thawn a, a hnênah,

“Ka pa leh i pa an ṭangrual ang khân keini pawh i ṭangrual teh ang. En teh, tangkarua leh rangkachak ka rawn thawn a che, Israel lal Baasa nên in inṭhianna titâwp la, ka ram ata a sipaite hnuk kîr teh se,” a ti a.
Ben-hadada chuan Asa thu rawt chu ṭha a ti a, sipai hotu a ko va, Israel ram chu an rûn ta a; Ijon te, Dan te, Abel-maim te leh Naftali-ho biala kudâm awmna khua zawng zawng chu a la a.
Chûng thil chu lal Baasan a hriatin Rama khaw kulh a siam chu a chawlhsan ta a.
Rama kulh siamna tûr lung leh thingte chu la lutin Juda ram mi zawng zawng chu Asa chuan a pun a, Geba leh Mizpa kulh siam nân a hmang ta a.
Chutih lai chuan zâwlnei Hanania chu lal Asa hnênah a lo kal a, a hnênah, “
Ethiopia leh Libua mite khân sipai leh sakawr-tawlailîr tam tak leh sakawr chungchuang mi tam tak an nei a ni lâwm ni kha? Mahse,
chuan amah ring tlattute chu ṭanpui tûrin khawvêl pum puiah a mit a lên ruai ruai ṭhîn a ni. Tûn aṭang chuan do tûr i nei reng ang. Âtthlâk takin thil i ti a nih hi,” a ti a.
Zâwlnei chungah chuan Asa chu a thinur ta hle a, kawl a buntîr a, ripah a khung a, chuta chinah chuan mi dang chungah pawh râwng taka kut thlâk a chîng ta a.
Asa lal ṭan tirh aṭanga a tâwp thleng chanchin chu ‘Juda leh Israel lalte chanchin’ ziakna bu-ah a chuang.
Asa chu kum sawmthum leh pakua a lal hnuin a ke a pân a, a ke a lo bai ta a. Mahse,
Kum hnih hnu chuan a thi ta a.
Davida khawpuiah, a thlân atâna a kerah chuan an phûm ta a. Phûm hmain mosola te, tel rimtuite an hnawih a, amah sûn nân meipui an chhêm hluah hluah a.
Jehosafata chu a pa Asa hnuah a lo lal a, Israel-te do thei tûrin a intichak a.
Judai ram kulh awmna khuaahte sipai a dah a, Judai ram thingtlâng leh Efraim rama khawpui, a pa Asan a lo hneh tawh khuaahte pawh sipai hmunpui a dah bawk a.
A pain a lal tirh laia a tih ang khân Jehosafata pawhin a ti a, Baal a be duh lo va. Chuvângin,
A pate Pathian rawng a bâwl a, Pathian thupêk a zâwm a, Israel lalte angin a khawsa ve hek lo.
Tichuan,
rawngbâwl chu a châkzâwng a ni a, Judai rama an milem pathian biakna hmunsângte, Aseri limte chu a tibo vek a.
Kum thum a lal hnu chuan Ben-haila te, Obadia te, Zekaria te, Nethanela te, Mikaia te chu Judai ram khawpuiah zirtîrtuah a tîr chhuak a.

Levia chi mi pakua leh puithiam pahnih an kal ve a, Levia chite chu Semaia te, Nethania te, Zebadia te, Asahela te, Semiramota te, Jehonathana te, Adonija te, Tobija te, Tobadonija te an ni a, puithiamte chu Elisama leh Jehorama an ni.
dân lehkhabu chu kengin Judai ram khua chu an fang chhuak a, mite chu an zirtîr a.
An vêl ram zawng zawng chu Jehosafata do ngam lo tûrin
Filistia mi ṭhenkhat chuan chhiahah tangkarua leh thilpêk tam tak Jehosafata chu an rawn kensak a. Arab mi ṭhenkhat pawhin berâm sângsarih leh zasarih leh kêl sângsarih leh zasarih an rawn pe bawk a.
Tichuan, Jehosafata chu a lal tulh tulh a, Judai ram dung leh vângah kulhte a siam a, khawpuite a din a.
Chûngah chuan ei tûr a chhêk ṭeuh bawk a. Jerusalem khuaah a sipai hotu lian huaisen tak tak chu a dah a.
A chi chiin mahni chi hotu an nei a, Juda thlah sipai hotu ber chu Adna a ni, sipai nuaithum a ho va.
A dawttu chu Jehohanana a ni, sipai nuaihnih leh sing riat a ho va.
A pathumna chu Zikria fapa Amasia a ni, sipai nuaihnih a ho va (Amasa hi hetianga
Benjamin thlah sipai hotu ber chu, sipai chhuanawm tak Eliada a ni, sipai nuaihnih, âwmphaw leh thal keng a ho va.
A dawttu chu Jehozabada a ni, indo inpeih reng sipai nuaikhat leh sîngriat a ho va.
Judai rama kulh nei khuatea sipai a dah bâkah hêng hi Jerusalem-a a sipai awmte chu an ni.
Juda lal Jehosafata chuan a lo hausaka, a hmingthan tâk hle hnu chuan Israel lal Ahaba nên inkawp zai an rêl a, an fate an inneihtîr a.

Kum eng emaw zât hnuah Jehosafata chu Samaria khuaah Ahaba tlawh tûrin a chhuk a. Jehosafata leh a ṭhiante lawm nân Ahaba chuan berâm leh bâwng tam tak a talh a, ruai a ṭheh a. Gilead biala Ramot khua bei tûrin a sâwm a.
“Ramot khua chu bei tûrin i kal ve thei ang em?” a ti a. Jehosafata chuan, “I inpeih hun hunah kei leh ka sipaite chu kal kan inpeih e, kan pui ang che,” a ti a.
Ahaba chuan zâwlnei zali dâwn lai rual chu, “Ramot khua ka bei ang nge bei lo vang?” tiin a zâwt a. Anni chuan, “Bei rawh, Pathian chuan a awmpui ang che,” an ti a.

Ahaba chuan, “Mi pakhat, Imla fapa Mikaia chu a la awm a. Mahse, thil ṭha eng mah min hrilh lâwksak ngai lo va, ka haw hle a ni. Thil ṭha lo tak tak hrilh lâwk a chîng a,” a ti a. Jehosafata chuan, “Lal meuhvin chuti êma tih tûr emaw ni le?” a ti a.
Lal chuan hotu pakhat a ko va, Mikaia hruai tûrin a tîr a.
Lal pahnih chu Samaria khawpui kawngka pâwn hruihah, lalṭhutthlêng an chhawpah chuan an ṭhu a; zâwlnei rual chuan an kal hual a, thu an sawi bual bual a.
An zînga pakhat, Kenaana fapa Zedekia chuan thîr, seki lem a siam a, Ahaba hnênah, “Suria-ho chu hêng nên hian i bei ang a, i tudawl dêr ang,” a ti a.
Zâwlnei dangte pawh chuan chutiang bawk chuan an ti a. “Kal la, Ramot khua chu han bei rawh, i la ngei ang.
Mikaia hruaitu tûra an tirh chuan a hnênah, “Zâwlnei dang zawng zawngin a ṭha lamin lal hnênah thu an sawi a, nang pawhin chutiang chuan sawi ve mai ta che,” a ti a.

Lal Ahaba hma a va thlen chuan lal chuan, “Mikai, lal Jehosafata nên Ramot khua kan han bei ang nge bei lo vang?” a ti a.
Mikaia chuan, “Han bei teh rêng u, in hneh mawlh ang,
Ahaba chuan, “
Mikaia chuan, “Vêngtu nei lo berâm rual angin tlânga Israel-ho an darh ka hmu a ni. ‘Hêngho hian hruaitu an nei lo; mahni in lamah dam têin haw dial mai rawh se,’
Ahaba chuan Jehosafata hnênah, “Kha maw, ka tâna thil ṭha tûr eng mah a sawi ngai lo ka tih rêng kha. Thil ṭha lo lam hlîr a ni a sawi ṭhin,” a ti a.
Mikaia chuan, “
‘Tu nge Ahaba chu Ramot beia thi tûrin zu bum ang?’
Thlarau pakhat hi a lo kal a,
Thlarau chuan, ‘Ahaba zâwlneite chu dâwt ka zu sawitîr ang,’ a ti a.
Chutiang chuan a ni
Zâwlnei Zedekia chuan Mikaia chu a va pan a, a bêng a, “Engtik lai khân nge
Mikaia chuan a chhâng a, “Pindan chhûngrila i bihrûk hunah i hre mai ang,” a ti a.
Ahaba chuan hotu pakhat hnênah, “Mikaia kha man la, khaw awptu Amona hnênah hruai la, lal fapa Joasa pawh hmuhtîr ang che.
Dam taka ka lo kîr leh hma chu ripah khung sela, chhang leh tui chauh pe rawh se,” a ti a.
Mikaia chuan, “Dam taka i lo kîr leh hrim chuan
Lal Ahaba leh lal Jehosafata chu Gilead biala Ramot khua bei tûr chuan an kal ta a.
Ahaba chuan Jehosafata hnênah, “Kan inbeih hunah ka inchei danglam ang a, nang chu lal incheiin inchei zêl ang che,” a ti a. Lal Ahaba chu a inchei danglam a, an inbeihnaah chuan a tel ve ta a.
Suria lal chuan tawlailîr khalhtu hotu chu, “Israel lal chauh lo chu tu mah bei suh ang che,” a ti a.
Chûngho chuan Jehosafata an hmuh chuan Israel lal emaw an ti a, an rawn bei ta a. Jehosafata chu a au chiam a,
Tawlailîr khalh hotute chuan Israel lal a ni lo tih an hriat chuan an ûm duh ta lo va.
Suria sipai thal kâp mai mai hian lal Ahaba chu a râlthuam inkârah a kâp fuh palh a. A tawlailîr khalhtu hnênah chuan, “Hliam ka tuar e, lêt la, inbeihna hmun ata tlân chhuak rawh,” a ti a.
An inbeih mup mup chhûng chuan Ahaba chu a tawlailîrah chuan Suria mite lam hawiin a ṭhu a, ni a tlâk chuan a thi ta a.
Jerusalem-a a inah Jehosafata chu dam takin a haw a.
Zâwlnei pakhat, Hanana fapa, Jehua chuan lal chu a hmu a, a hnênah, “Mi sual ṭanpuia
Chuti chung pawhin ṭhat vena zawng i nei e; miin an biak Aseri lim zawng zawng i ti bo va, Pathian duhzâwng zawn i tum hi,” a ti a.
Jehosafata chu Jerusalem-ah a awm a, a taima hle a; chhim tâwp Beer-seba aṭanga hmâr lam Efraim tlâng tâwp thlengin a khuate chu an thlahtute
Judai rama kulh nei khuaah tawh phawt chuan rorêltute a dah a, hetiang hian a hrilh zêl a:
“Thu pawtchat mai mai suh ang che u, in hna hi mihring thu-a thawk in ni lo va,
chu ṭih ula, fîmkhur takin engkim ti ang che u,
Jerusalem khuaah chuan Levia chite, Puithiamte leh khaw hotu deuh ṭhenkhat chu rorêltu atân a ruat a;
Heti hian a ti a, “
Khawii khua aṭang pawhin in chipuiten mihring thah thu emaw, dân leh thupêk bawhchhiat thu emaw an rawn thlen chuan, an thu ngaihtuah chhûnga an awm dân tûr ngun takin hrilh ṭhîn ang che u; tichuan,

Sakhaw lam thilah chuan puithiam lalber Amaria thu a lalber ang a, khawtlâng thilah chuan Judai ram awptu thu a lal ber a ni. Levia chite hian hêng rorêltute thu hi an kengkawh tûr a ni. Huai takin hêng hi zâwm sela,
Nakin deuhvah chuan Moab leh Amon-ho chuan an kawppui Meun-ho nên Jehosafata ram chu rûn tûrin an lo thawk a.

Mi ṭhenkhat an lo kal a, Jehosafata hnênah, “Tuipui Thi râla, Edom ram aṭangin sipai tam takin an rawn bei dâwn a che, Hazazon-tamar khua pawh an la dêr tawh,” an ti a (Chu khua chu Engedi tih a ni bawk).

Judai ram khaw tin aṭangin
Chûngho leh Jerusalem-a mite chu Tempul tual siam tharah chuan an pung khâwm a, lal Jehosafata chu an hmaah a va ding a.
Ring takin a ṭawngṭai a, “Aw
He rama lo awm ṭhînte kha i mi Israel-te hmaah i hnawt chhuak a, i ṭhian, Abrahama thlahte neih kumkhua atân i pe a ni lâwm ni kha, aw kan Pathian?
He ramah hian an awm ta a, nangmah biakna tûr Hmun Thianghlim an sa a.

Min hrem nân indona te, hri te, ṭâm te, thil ṭha lo tinrêng te lo thleng mah se, nangmah biakna tûra i ruat he in kawtah hian kan ding ang a, kan mangannaah chuan kan au vang che a, nangin min ngaihthlâksakin min chhanhim ang,’ an ti a.

Min thlahtute Aigupta ram ata an lo chhuah pawh khân Amon-ho te, Moab-ho te, Edom-ho te kha rûn i phal lo va, an rama kal i phalsak lo va. Kan pute chuan an ram chu an kal hual a, an tichhe lo a nih kha.
Ngai teh, tûnah hian ro atâna ram min pêk ata min hnawh chhuah tumin an lo thawh tâk thung hi.
Aw kan Pathian, an chungah ro han rêl teh; min bei tûr sipaite hi an tam êm a, kan chêt theih tâk hlek lah hi. Tihngaihna rêng kan hre ta lo va, i hmaah kan rawn thlen ngawt mai a nih hi,” a ti a.
Judai ram mi zawng zawng chu an nupui fanaute nên Tempul kawtah chuan an ding a.
Chuta awm ve Levia chi mi pakhat, Zekaria fapa Jahaziela chungah
Jahaziela chuan, “Judai ram mi zawng zawng leh Jerusalem-a chêngte leh nang, Jehosafat,
Naktûkah Zif kalkhâna an lo chho chu lo bei ang che u. Phaizâwl thlen hmaa Jeruel bul, ram chhengchhe laiah lo châng ang che u.
In beih a ṭûl lo vang. In awmna tûrah chuan lo châng ringawt mai rawh u.
Lal Jehosafata chu a bawkkhup a, mipui pawh an kûn a;
Levia chi, Kohata leh Kora pâwlte chu an ding a, Israel-te Pathian
A tûkah chuan zîng takah an tho va, Tekoa khaw bul ram chhengchhe lam an pan a. Chutia an kal chhuah dâwn lai chuan Jehosafatan an hnênah, “Juda leh Jerusalem tlangvâlte u,
Lal chuan mite chu a berâwn a, Levia chi zaipâwlte chu hun serha an hâk tûr thawmhnawte inbela sipaiho hma hruai tûrin a ti a; ‘
Chutia Pathian faka hla an han sak lai chuan Juda-te bei tûra lo thawk Amon-ho te, Moab-ho te, Edom-ho te châng ru tûrin
Amon-ho leh Moab-ho chuan Edom-ho chu an bei a, an that phiar a; anmahni leh anmahni pawh chu intiboral tûrin an inbei ve leh ta chiam a.
Judai ram sipaiten thlalêr in sâng an va thlen chuan, an hmêlmate lam chu an han thlîr a. An za chuan leiah an tlu thal phung a, an lo thi vek mai a, pakhat mah tlân chhuak an awm lo va ni.

Jehosafata leh a hote chu râllâk sum la tûrin an kal a. Chûng zîngah chuan bâwng tam tak te, ei tûr te, thawmhnaw te leh thil hlu tak tak an hmu ṭeuh va. Râllâk sum lâk tûr a tam khawp a, ni thum chhûng ngawt an la khâwm a, an phurh sên loh khawp an la a ni.
A ni li ni chuan ‘Beraka’ ruamah an pung khâwm a, an tâna a thiltih zawng zawng avângin
chuan an hmêlmate a hnehsak tâk avâng chuan Jehosafata leh a hote chu hlim takin Jerusalem-ah an haw ta a.
Jerusalem an thlen dâwn chuan ṭingṭang te, perhkhuang te leh tawtawrâwt ri te nên Tempul an pan a.
Pathianin Israel-te chu an hmêlmate a dosak tih an chhehvêl hnamte chuan an lo hriatin Pathian chu an hlau ta a.
Jehosafata chu râlmuang takin a lal a,
Kum sawmthum leh panga a nihin Jehosafata chu Judai ramah a lo lal a, Jerusalem-ah kum sawmhnih leh panga a lal a. A nu chu Azubai, Silhia fanu a ni.
A pa Asa ang bawk khân
Amaherawhchu, hnam dang pathian biakna hmunsâng a tichhe vek lo va, mipuite pawhin an thlahtute Pathian biak an la uar tehchiam hek lo.
Jehosafata thil tih dang zawng zawng, a lal tirh aṭanga a thih thleng thu chu Hanania fapa ‘Jehua chanchin’ tih bu-ah ziak vek a ni. Israel lalte chanchin ziakna bu zîngah a tel.
Chumi hnuah chuan Judai ram lal Jehosafata leh Israel lal Ahazia, thil dik lo ti ṭhîntu chu ṭhianah an insiam a.
Ezion-geberah Tarsis khuaa kal tûr lawng rual an tuk a.
Maresa khaw mi, Dodavahua fapa Eliezara chuan Jehosafata hnênah, “Israel lal Ahazia te i thurualpui avângin
Jehosafata chu a thi a, Davida khawpuiah an phûm a, a fapa Jehorama chu a lo lal ta a.
Judai ram lal Jehosafata fapa Jehorama chuan nau paruk - Azaria te, Jehiela te, Zekaria te, Azaria te, Mikaela te, Sefatia te a nei a.

An pa chuan rangkachakte leh ro hlu tam tâwk tak a pe ṭheuh va, Judai ram khawpui kulh nei, an enkawl tûr a ruatsak vek bawk a. Jehorama chu a fapa upa ber a nih avângin Jehosafata chuan a aiah a laltîr a.
Jehorama chu a han lal ngheh chuan, a naute chu a thahtîr vek a. Israel zînga hotu ṭhenkhat pawh a thahtîr bawk a.
Kum sawmthum leh pahnih a nihin Jehorama chu a lal ṭan a, Jerusalem-ah kum riat a lal a.
Israel lal Ahaba leh lal dang sual tak tak angin a awm ve a, Ahaba fanu pawh nupuiah a nei a ni.
Mahse,
Jehorama lal laiin Juda-ho lakah Edom-ho chu an hel a, lal an nei hrang ta a.
Jehorama leh a hote chuan sakawr-tawlailîr nên Edom chu an va rûn a. Edom sipaite chuan an lo hual a; mahse, zân khaw thimah an pût ru thei hrâm a.
Chuta chin chu Edom chuan Juda-ho hnuaia awm lovin tûn thlengin lal hran an nei ta reng a ni. Jehorama chuan,
Judai ram tlângramah pathian dang biakna hmunsâng a siam thluah nghe nghe a. Judai ram leh Jerusalem mite chu
Zâwlnei Eliza chuan lehkha a thawn a, “I thlahtu Davida Pathian,

Israel lalte khawsak dân angin i khawsa zâwk hlauh va, Ahaban Israel mite pathian dang hnêna a uirepui ang khân nang pawhin Judai ram mi leh Jerusalem mite chu i uirepui a. Nang aia ṭha ṭha, i naute lah i that vek bawk a.
Hemi avâng hian
Nangmah ngei pawhin rîl natna benvawn na tak i tuar ang a, ni tin a zual tulh tulh ang,” tiin.
Filistia mi leh Arab mi ṭhenkhat, tuipui kama Ethiopia mi lo awmte bulah an awm a.
Judai ram chu an han rûn ta a. Lal inte chu an rawk a, lal nupuite leh a fapate chu salah an man vek a. A fa tlum Ahazia erawh chu an man ve lo.
Chumi hnu chuan
kum hnih dâwn lai chu a ni têlin a na tulh tulh a, a rîl a tla ta a, na tak tuarin lal chu a thi ta a. A pute thiha an tih angin a thih chuan a mite chuan amah sûn nân meipui an chhep ve lo.
Jehorama chu kum sawmthum leh pahnih a nihin a lal ṭan a, Jerusalem-ah kum riat a lal a, a thihin pawi an ti lo. Davida khawpuiah chuan an phûm a, lal thlânah erawh chuan an phûm lo.
Arab mi ṭhenkhatin Jehorama chu an rûn a, a fa tlum Ahazia tih loh a fapa dang zawng zawng chu an thahsak avângin Jerusalem mite chuan a pa aiawh tûrin Ahazia chu lalah an siam a.
Ahazia chu kum sawmhnih leh pahnih mi a nihin a lal ṭan a, Jerusalem-ah kum khat a lal a. A nu chu Athali, Israel lal Ahaba fanu, Omria tunu a ni.
Ani pawh a nu thurâwn ṭha lo tak a zawm ṭhîn avângin Ahaba chhûngte khawsak angin a khawsa ve ṭhîn a ni.
hmuha thil sual a ti ṭhîn. A pa thih hnu chuan Ahaba chhûngte zînga mi ṭhenkhat chu a thu lâkna ber an ni ta a, a chhiat phah ta nghe nghe a ni.
An thurâwn angin Suria lal Hazaela do tûrin Israel lal Ahaba fapa Jorama a thurualpui a, Gilead biala Ramot khua an beih a, an inbeihnaah lal Jorama chu an hliam a.

Ramoth-gilead-a Suria lal Hazaela a va beihnaa a hliam enkawl dam tûrin Jezreel-ah chuan a lo kîr a. Tichuan, Juda lal Jehorama fapa Ahazia chu Ahaba fapa Jorama dam lo tlawh tûrin Jezreel-ah a zu kal a.
Jorama a va tlawh chu Pathianin Ahazia chhiatna tûra a thil ruat a ni. An awm dun lai chuan mi pakhat Nimsia fapa Jehua a lo kal a; ani hi Ahaba chi timang tûra
Jehua chuan Ahaba thlahte chunga kut a thlâk lai chuan Jorama dam lo en tûr Ahazia ho - Juda hotute leh Ahazia laichînte chu Jehua chuan a hmu a, a that ve ta vek a.
Ahazia chu a han zawng a, Samaria khuaah a lo biru a, Jehua hnênah an hruai a, a lo that ta a. Theihtâwp chhuaha
Ahazia chhûng zînga mi lal tûr rêng an awm ta lo.
A nu Athali chuan Ahazia tualthih thu a hriat veleh Judai lal chhûngte zawng zawng a thahtîr a.

Ahazia khân farnu Jehosebi a nei a, puithiam Jehoiada chu pasalah a nei a. Ahazia fapa pakhat, Joasa chu, a rûkin a hum a, lal fa dang, tualthi mai tûrte zîng ata chu a la chhuak a, Tempula mutna pindan pakhatah a thukru a, a enkawl ta a. A thuhrûk tlat avângin Athali chuan a that ve lo.
Chutah chuan kum ruk a thukru a, Athali chu lalah a ṭang ta a.

A kum sarihnaah chuan puithiam Jehoiada leh sipai za hotu pangate chu an inrâwn ngam ta a. Chûng mite chu Jehorama fapa Azaria te, Jehohanana fapa Ismaela te, Obeda fapa Azaria te, Adaia fapa Maaseia te, Zikria fapa Elisafata te an ni.
Judai ram an fang kual a, Levia chite leh hnam hruaitute chu Jerusalem-ah an hruai khâwm a.
Tempulah chuan an kal khâwm a, Joasa, lal fapa nên chuan thu an intiam a. Jehoiada chuan an hnênah, “
Hetiang hian thil kan ti ang: Sabat nia lo kal ṭhîn puithiamte leh Levia chi hmun thuma ṭhena hmun khat chuan Tempul kawngkhârte an vêng ang a.
Hmun thuma ṭhena hmun khat chuan lal in an vêng ang a, a dang zawng zawng chu ‘Lungphûm’ kawngkhâr bulah an awm tûr a ni. Mipui chu Tempul tualah an lo kal khâwm tûr a ni.
Tempul chhûngah puithiam leh Levia chi, rawngbâwl lai tih loh chu, tu mah an lût tûr a ni lo. Anni chu serh hran an ni a, an lût thei ang; mi dang erawh chu
Levia chite chuan lal hi an din hual ang a, khandaih phawi sa kengin an vêng tûr a ni, lal kalna apiangah an zui zêl tûr a ni. Tempula luh tum tawh phawt chu thah tûr an ni,” a ti a.
Jehoiada chuan châwl tûrte chu a la chawlhtîr loh avângin, Sabat nia rawngbâwl tûrte leh châwl tûrte pawh chu an rawn hruai vek a,
Davidan Tempula a dah, fei leh phawte chu Jehoiada chuan sipai hotute hnênah a sem a.
Tempul kawtah khandaih phawi sa kengin mi a din kualtîr a, lal chu a vêntîr tlat a.
Jehoiada chuan Joasa chu a hruai chhuak a, lal tih tûr dân bu chu a pe a, lalah an siam ta a. Puithiam Jehoiada leh a hote chuan Joasa chu hriak an thih a, “Lal hi dam reng rawh se,” tiin an au va.
Athali chuan lal an chawimawi thâwm chu a han hriat chuan mipui punkhâwmna Tempul lam chu a pan a.

Lal thar chu lal dinna tûra an ruat Tempul chhûng luhna kiang ban bula a ding chu a han hmu a, sipai hotute leh tawtawrâwtpute chuan an din hual a. Mipui chu hlim takin an au dual dual a, tawtawrâwt an hâm a, Tempul zaipâwlte chuan an thil tum rîkte nên zai an hruai a. Chûng chu a han hmuhin mangangin a puan a pawtthlêr a, “Min phiarru a lo nih hi,” tiin a au va.
Jehoiada chuan Tempula thah a duh lo va, sipai hotute chu a ko va, “Vêngtu sipai kârah rawn hruai chhuak ula, chhan tum apiang chu lo that zêl ang che u,” a ti a.
Athali chu an man a, lal in lamah an hruai a, Sakawr kawngkhâr an tih bulah chuan an that ta a.
Baal an biakna hmunah chuan an za-in an kal a, an ṭhiat ta a. Maichâm chu an tichim a, milemte chu an chhu keh a, Baal puithiam Matana chu maichâm bulah an that a.
Jehoiada chuan puithiamte leh Levia chite chu Tempula an hna tûr a thawhtîr a, lal Davida remruat angin tih tûr an semsak a, Mosia dân bu-a ziak angin
Jehoiada chuan Tempul kawngkhârte pawh a vêntîr a, mi bawlhhlawh tu mah an luhtîr tûr a ni lo.
Sipai hotute, ram hruaitute leh mipuite chuan Jehoiada hovin kawng an zawh a. Lal chu Tempul aṭangin lal inah an hruai a, kawngkapuiah an luhpui a, lalṭhutthlêngah chuan lal chu a ṭhu ta a.
Mi zawng zawng chu an hlim hle a ni. Athali chu khandaiha an thah tâk avângin khuaah chuan buaina a reh ta a.
Joasa chu kum sarih a nihin Judai ramah a lal ṭan a, Jerusalem-ah kum sawmli a lal a, a nu chu Zibi, Beer-seba mi a ni,
Puithiam Jehoiada dam chhûng chuan Joasa chuan
Jehoiada chuan lal Joasa chu nupui pahnih a neihsak a, fanu leh fapa an hrinsak ṭeuh va.
Chûng hnuah chuan Joasa chuan Tempul chei ṭhat zai a rêl ta a.
Puithiam leh Levia chite chu Judai ram khawpuite a fantîr a, kum tina Tempul chei ṭhatna daih tûr thawhlâwm a khawntîr a. Hmanhmawh tûrin a ti a; mahse, Levia chite chu an vuaicha hle a.
Tichuan, Jehoiada chu a ko va, “Levia chite hian Judai ram leh Jerusalem mite hnên aṭangin ‘Biakbûk’ enkawlna tûr
Mi sualnu Athali zuitute kha Tempulah an lût lui a, thil thianghlim tam tak Baal biaknaa hmanah an la chhuak a ni.
Lal chuan Levia chite chu thawhlâwm bâwm siama, Tempul luhna kawngkhâr bula dah tûrin a ti a.
Jerusalem leh Judai ram zawng zawngah Pathian chhiahhlawh Mosian thlalêra mipui thawh tûr bi a ruat ang kha rawn keng zêl tûrin thu an than a.
Mipuite leh an hruaitute chuan lâwm takin thawh tûr bituk zât chu an rawn keng a, bâwm chu an thlâk khat ta hial a.

Levia chite chuan bâwm chu ni tin, a enkawltu tûra lalin a ruat hnênah chuan an rawn dah ṭhîn a; bâwm chu a khah veleh puithiam lalber Jehoiada aiawhtu leh lal mi ruat ziaktu chuan an lo la chhuak a, bâwm chu a dahnaah an dah kîr leh ṭhîn. Tangka tam tâwk tak an thawh khâwm ta a.
Lal leh Jehoiada chuan Tempul chei ṭhat hna enkawltute hnênah pawisa chu an pe chhuak ṭhîn a; annin lung chher mi te, thing dek thiam te, thîrdêng te Tempul chei ṭha tûr chuan an ruai a.
Ngawrh takin mistiri te chuan hna an thawk a, Tempul chu a tîra mi anga nghet khân an chei ṭha leh ta a.

Hna thawh tûr an tih zawh chuan rangkachak leh tangkarua an hman bâng chu lal Joasa leh puithiam lalber Jehoiada an pe a; anni chuan Tempula rawngbâwl nân leh hâlral thil hlanna atân bungbêl te, rimtui hâlna thlêng te, rangkachak leh tangkarua a siam bungbêl te siam nân an lo hmang a.
Jehoiada dam chhûng chu ni tin Tempulah chuan thilhlan an hlân ziah ṭhîn a.
Tarkûnin a dam a, kum za leh sawmthum a tlinin a thi ta a.
Israel mite zîngah Pathian tân leh Tempul tân thil a tih ṭhat êm avângin Davida khawpuia lal thlânah an phûm ve ta a.
Jehoiada a thih tâk hnu chuan Judai ram mipui hruaitute chuan an thu ngaithla zâwk tûrin lal chu an hmin ta a.
Mipui chuan an thlahtute Pathian,
chuan anni chu hruai kîr tûrin zâwlneite a tîr a; mahse, mite chuan an thu an lo ngaithla duh lo.
Puithiam lalber Jehoiada fapa Zekaria hnênah Pathian thlarau a lo thleng a, mipuiin an hmuh theihna tûrah chuan a ding a, ring takin a au va, “
Zekaria chu an er hle a, lal thupêkin Tempul tualah chuan lungin an dêng hlum ta a.
Lal chuan Zekaria pa Jehoiada kha a tân a ṭangkaizia kha a theihnghilh a, Zekaria chu a tihhlumtîr ta mai a ni. Zekaria thi tûr chuan, “I thil tih hi
Kum a lo thar chuan Suria sipaite chuan Judai ram leh Jerusalem an rawn rûn a, hotu tam tak an that a, râllâk sum tam tak Damaska khuaah an hâwn a.
Suria sipaite chu an tlêm hle nâ a, an aia tam daih Juda sipaite chu an hneh a ni. An thlahtute Pathian,

Joasa chuan hliam na tak a tuar a, hmêlmate chuan an kalsan ta a, a hote pahnih an inthurual a, puithiam lalber Jehoiada fapate a thah phuba chu an la a, khuma a mu chu an that a; lal thlânah ni lo, Davida khawpuiah an phûm ta a.
Inthuruala thattute kha Amon mi Simeata fapa Zabada leh Moab mi Simriti fapa Jehozabada te an ni.
Lalte lehkhabu hrilhfiahna bu-ah Joasa chanchin te, a chungchânga zâwlnei thu hril lâwk te, Tempul a chei ṭhat thu te a chuang. A fapa Amazia chu a lo lal ta a.
Kum sawmhnih leh panga a nihin Amazia chu a lal ṭan a, Jerusalem-ah kum sawmhnih leh pakua a lal a, a nu chu Jerusalem chhuak Jehoadini a ni.
duhzâwng a ti ṭhîn; mahse, hreh tak chungin a ni a tih ṭhin ni.
Lala a ṭhut ngheh veleh a pa thattute kha a that ve a.
An fate erawh chu a khawih lo, Mosia Dân bu-a

Lal Amazia chuan Juda mite leh Benjamin mite chu a chi chiin sipai pâwl hrang hrangah a siam a; sâng rual te, za rual te hotu tûr a ruat thliah bawk a. Mipa kum sawmhnih chin chung lam chu an tel vek a ni, an vaiin nuaithum an tling.
Hêngho bâkah hmâr lam Israel-ho, mi nuai khat, tangkarua kg. sângthum leh zali bûk laiin a ruai bawk a.
Nimahsela, lal hnênah chuan zâwlnei pakhat a lo kal a, “Israel sipaite hi hruai ve suh. Hêng Hmâr lam ram mite lamah hian
Indonaah i chak phah i inbeisei a ni ang e. Indonaa chak leh chak loh hi Pathian thu thu a ni asin; hmêlmaten an hneh phah zâwk ang che,” a rawn ti a.
Amazia chuan zâwlnei hnênah, “Tangka ka pêk tawh zozai kha engtin nge ni ta ang?” a ti a. Zâwlnei chuan, “
Amazia chuan a sipai rawih, Efraim ram aṭanga lo kalte chu a bân a, a hawtîr ta a; Juda-ho chunga thinrim engphiarin an haw ta a.
Amazia chuan huphurh lo deuhvin a sipaite chu Chi Ruamah a kalpui a. Edom sipaite nên chuan an inbei a, mi sîngkhat an that a.
Mi sîngkhat an man bawk a; Sela khaw khâm kovah chuan an hruai a, an nam thla a, an tlahlum ta vek a.
Amazian indonaa kal ve a phal loh sipai a tirh hâwnte khân Samaria leh Beth-horon inkâra Juda khawpuite chu an bei a, mi sângthum zet an that a, râllâk sum tam tak an la a.
Amazian Edom-ho a hneh a, a lo haw chuan, an milemte a rawn hâwn a, a dahna a siam a, chibai a bûk a, an hmaah rimtui a hâl ta a.
Hei vâng hian
Lal chuan, “Engtik lai khân nge lal thurâwntu atân ka ruat che le? Ngawi mai rawh, ka that mai tûr che a nia,” a ti a.
Zâwlnei chuan, “Ka thurâwn ngaithla lova hêng hi i tih avângin Pathianin tihboral che a tum tih ka hre ta,” a ti a, a ngawihsan ta a.
Judai lal Amazia leh a upate chuan Israel beih an rawt a, Jehua fapa, Jehoahaza fa Israel lal Jehoasa hnênah, “Pa leh pa, i han inbei teh ang,” tia cho tûrin mi a tîr a.

Jehoasa chuan hetiang hian a chhâng a, “ ‘Vawi khat chu Lebanon tlânga lenhlîng hian Lebanon sidar thing hnênah, ‘ka fapa nupuiah i fanu min pe rawh,’ a ti a. Ramsa veivâkin lenhlîng chu a pal thlu ta mai a.’
Amazia, Edom mite i zu hneh hi i chhuang a nih vei hi; inah tawm hle hle mai rawh. Nang leh i mite tâna pawi tûr thil chawkchhuak mah ta che,” a lo ti a.
Amazia chuan a thu chu a pawisa lo va, Edom mite pathian lem a biak avângin Pathianin Israel-ho kuta pêk a lo tum a ni.
Israel lal Jehoasa leh Juda lal Amazia chu inbei tûrin an thawkchhuak a; Judai ram Beth-semes khaw bulah an inbei ta a.
Juda sipaite chu an chak lo ta zâwk a, mahni in lam panin an tlânchhia a.

Israel lal Jehoasa chuan Juda lal Amazia, Joasa fapa, Ahazia tupa chu a man a, Jerusalem-ah a hruai a; khawpui kulh bang chu ‘Efraim kawngkhâr aṭanga bangkil kawngkhâr’ an tih thlengin kulh bang tawng zali chu a ṭhiat a.
Râllâk sumah Tempula rangkachak leh tangkaruate, Obed-edoma thlahten an vên ṭhin Tempul bungbêl leh lal ina sum dah ṭhatte chu a hâwn a, dahkhama hrên tûr mi a hruai hâwng bawk a.
Juda lal Amazia chu Israel lal Jehoasa ai chuan kum sâwm leh pangain a dam rei zâwk a.
A lal tirh aṭanga a lal tâwp thlenga Amazia thil tihte chu ‘Israel leh Juda lalte chanchin’ tih ziakna bu-ah a chuang.
laka a hel chinah kha chuan amah thah tum Jerusalem khaw mi an awm zeuh zeuh reng a ni. A tâwpah phei chuan Lakis khuaah a tlân a; mahse, a hmêlmate chuan an ûmzui a, an va that ta tho va.
A ruang chu sakawr an phurhtîr a, Davida khawpuiah lal thlânah an phûm ta a.
Judai ram mi zawng zawng chuan kum sâwm leh paruka upa Amazia fapa Uzia chu a pa aiawha lal tûrin an thlang a.
Amazia thih hnuin Uzia hian Elat khua hi a la lêt leh a, Judai ram a belhin a din ṭha a ni.
Uzia chu kum sâwm leh paruk a nihin a lal ṭan a, Jerusalem-ah kum sawmnga leh pahnih a lal a. A nu chu Jerusalem mi Jekoli a ni.
Amazia angin
Pathian thu lama kaihruaitu Zekaria dam chhûng chuan
Uzia chuan Filistia-ho chu a rûn a, Gath khaw kulh bang te, Jabne leh Asdod kulh bang te pawh a tichhia a; Askelon bulah leh Filistia ram hmun hrang hrangah kulh a siam a.
Pathian chuan Filistia mi te, Gurbaal-a awm Arab-ho te leh Meun-ho te chu a hnehpui a,
Amon-ho pawhin Uzia hnênah chhiah an chawi a; a lo ropui a, Aigupta ram thlengin a hming a thang ta a.
Jerusalem kulh bang chu a thuam thar bawk a; ‘Bangkil kawngkhâr’ an tihah te, ‘Ruam kawngkhâr’ an tihah te, kulh kawina lai kawngkhârah te in sâng a sa a.

Ram palailêngah te pawh kulh nei khua a din a; tui a lai chhuak thluah bawk a ni; khawthlang lam, tlang ṭhut phairuamah bâwng a vulh ṭeuh bawk a. Lo neih lamah a tui hle a, tlângramah pawh grepte a phuntîr a, phai ram ṭhate chu leiletah a neihtîr a.
Sipai tam tak, indo thei mai a nei reng a. An chanchin ziakna chu ziaktu Jeiela leh Maaseian, lal milian Hanania hovin an vawng a.
Hotu sânghnih leh zarukin a sipaite chu an ho va.
An hnuaiah chuan sipai chak tak, râl bei mai thei nuaithum leh sângsarih leh zanga a nei bawk a.
Uzia chuan a sipaite chu phaw te, fei te, thîrlukhum te, thîrkawr te, thal te, virvawma hman tûr lungte mûm te a pe bawk a.

Jerusalem-ah chuan a mi themthiamte siam thal kahna khâwl te, lung lian pui pui vawmna tûr khâwl te, in sângah te leh kulh kilah te a bun a. A hming pawh a thang thui ta hle a. Pathianin a ṭanpui avânga chuti taka ropui chu a ni.
Lal Uzia chu a ropui tâk hle hnu chuan a lo chapo ta deuh va, chu chu a chhiat phah ta a ni.A Pathian,
Puithiam chak leh huaisen tak tak sawmriatin
khap tumin an zui a, “Uzia,
Uzia chu Tempul chhûng rimtui hâlna dawhkân bulah chuan a ding a, rimtui hâlna bûr chu a keng a, puithiamho chungah chuan a thinur hle a; mahse, an hmaah ngei,
Azaria leh puithiamte chuan lal chal an en chuan an phâwk ta hru vek a, Tempul chhûng ata chu an hnawt chhuak ta a.
A natna avâng chuan lal Uzia chu a dam chhûng chuan a bawlhhlawh ta a, Tempula a luh thian tak loh avângin ama inah a awm ta reng a, a hna a thawk tawh lo, a fapa Jothaman ram a awp ta zâwk a.
A lal chhûnga Uzia thiltih zawng zawng chu zâwlnei Isaian a ziak a.
Uzia chu a thi a, lalho thlânmualah an phûm a, a pân vei avâng chuan lalho thlânah an dah duh lo. A fapa Jothama chu a lo lal ta a.
Jothama chu kum sawmhnih leh panga a nihin a lal ṭan a, Jerusalem-ah kum sâwm leh paruk a lal a. A nu chu Zadoka fanu Jerusaii a ni.
A pa ang bawkin
Tempul hmâr lam kawngka hi Jothama siam a ni, khaw kulh bang pawh a siam ṭha tam khawp mai; ‘Ofel’ an tih hmun phei chu a chei nasa hle a ni.
Judai ram chhûngah khuate a siam a, ngawah te kulh leh râlvênbûk te a siam thluah bawk a.
Amon lal nên an inbei a; a tudawl a, tangkarua kg. sângthum leh zali, huit quintal sîngkhat, barli quintal sîngkhat, kum thum chhûng kum tin chhiah a chawitîr a.
Jothama chuan
Jothama lal laia thil thleng chanchin - an indo thute leh a thiltih dangte chu, ‘Israel leh Juda lalte chanchin’ ziakna bu-ah a chuang vek a ni.
Jothama chu kum sawmhnih leh panga a nihin a lal ṭan a, Jerusalem-ah kum sâwm leh paruk a lal a.
A thi a, Davida khawpuiah an phûm a, a fapa Ahaza chu a lo lal ta a.
Ahaza chu kum sawmhnih a nihin a lal ṭan a, Jerusalem-ah kum sâwm leh paruk a lal a. A pu Davida tih dân ang zâwm duh lovin
Israel lalte tih dân a la a, Baal lim a chhûntîr a.
Hinom ruamah rimtui a hâl a, Israel mite hmaa
Tlânga hnam dang pathian biakna hmunsângah te, thingbuk ṭha deuh hlim hnuaiah te Ahaza chu a inthawi ṭhîn a, rimtuite a hâl ṭhîn.
Ahaza chuan thil sual a tih avângin Suria lal kutah
Israel lal Remalia fapa Peka pawhin Ahaza chu a bei a, a hneh a, Juda sipai huai ṭha ṭha mi nuaikhat leh sînghnih a that a. Judai ram mite chuan an thlahtute Pathian,
Israel sipai Efraim pasalṭha Zikria chuan Ahaza fapa Maaseia chu a that a, lal in enkawltu Azrikama a that bawk a; lal dawttu Elkana pawh a that a.
Juda-te chu an unaute an ni na a, Israel sipaite chuan hmeichhia leh naupang nuaihnih salah an man a. Samaria khuaah an khalh khâwm a, râllâk sum tam tak an hâwn bawk a.
Samaria khuaah chuan
Jerusalem leh Judai rama awm mipa pawh, hmeichhia pawh bawiha siam in tum leh zêl a nih hi. Nangni pawhin
Ka thu hi ngaithla teh u, hêng in sal mante hi in unau, in farnute an ni asin; chhuah vek rawh u, chutilo chu
Hmâr lam lalrama hotu lian, Jehohanana fapa Azaria te, Mesilemota fapa Berekia te, Saluma fapa Zehiskia te, Hadlaia fapa Amasa te pawhin sipaiho thiltih chu ṭha an ti lo va.
An hnênah, “In sal mante hetah han hruai suh u,
Tichuan, sipaite chuan an sal man leh râllâk sum an hawnte chu mipui leh an hotute kutah an hlân ta a.

Chûng hming sawi tâkte chu an râllâk sum aṭanga sal an mante hnêna thawmhnaw pe tûrin an ruat a. Silhfên te, pheikhawk bun tûr te an pe a; an hliam chulh tûr oliv hriak an sem bawk a. Mahni kea kal thei lo khawpa chaute chu sabengtung chungah an chuantîr a; an sal man zawng zawng chu Judai ram Jeriko, tûm khua an tihah chuan an hruai kîr leh ta vek a. Tin, Israel-ho chu Samaria lamah an haw ta a.
Chûng lai chuan lal Ahaza chuan amah ṭanpui tûrin Asuria lalte a ko va,
Edom-hovin Judai ram an rawn rûn a, an hneh a, mi tam tak an man a ni.

Filistia-ho lahin thlang lam tlâng ṭhut phai khua te leh Judai ram Negeb te an rawn bei bawk a. Anni phei chuan Beth-semes te, Aijalon te, Gederot te, Soko leh a chhehvêl khua te, Timna leh a chhehvêl khua te, Gimzo leh a chhehvêl khua te an la a, an luah ta tlat a.
Juda lal Ahaza chuan a mite ṭhatna tûr a ngaihtuah miah lo va,
Asuria lal Tiglat-Pilesera chuan Ahaza chu puih ahnêkin harsatna a siamsak ta zâwk a.
Ahaza chuan Tempula rangkachak te, lal ina mite leh mi hausa deuh ina mi te chu a la a, Asuria lal chu a pe a; mahse, a sâwt lo.
A mangan vânglai tak pawh chuan Ahaza chu

Amah hnehtu Suria-ho pathiante chu chibai a bûk ve ta mai a, ‘Suria pathiante hian Suria lal an ṭanpui a; chuvângin, an hnênah thilhlan hlân ila min pui ve ngei ang,’ a ti a ni. Chu chu a mite nên chuan chhiat zual phah sauhna a ni.
Chûng bâkah, Tempula hmanrua a la chhuak a, a tichhia a. Tempul chu a khâr a; Jerusalem khuaah maichâm a siam thliah thluah a;
Judai ram khawpuiah leh khuaahte chuan hnam dang pathian biakna hmunsâng, rimtui hâlna tûr a siam fer fur a. Hetiang hian a thlahtute Pathian,
A rorêl chhûng chanchin dangte chu a bul aṭanga a tâwp thlengin ‘Juda leh Israel lalte chanchin’ ziakna bu-ah a chuang.
Ahaza chu a thi a, lal thlânah ni lo, Jerusalem-ah an phûm a, a fapa Hezekia chu a lal ta a.
Hezekia chu kum sawmhnih leh panga a nihin Judai ramah a lal ṭan a, Jerusalem-ah kum sawmhnih leh pakua a lal a. A nu chu Zekaria fanu Abijai a ni.
A pu Davida angin
A lal tirh kum, thla hmasa berah Hezekia chuan Tempul kawngkhârte chu a hawng leh a, a chhiate chu a siam ṭhattîr a.
Tempul khawchhak lam tualah chuan puithiamte leh Levia chite chu a ko khâwm a,
an hnênah, “Nangni Levia chite u, inthian thianghlim ula, in pate Pathian,
Kan pate chu
Tempul kawngkhâr chu an kalh a, khâwnvâr an timit a, rimtui an hâl lo va, Hmun Thianghlimah Israel-te Pathian tân hâlral thilhlan an hlân hek lo.
Hei vâng hian
Kan pate chu khandaiha sah hlum an ni a, kan fanu kan fapa, kan nupuite nên salah an man kha.
Kan chunga a thinur hi a tihkian beiseiin Israel-te Pathian,
Ka fate u, awm mai mai teh suh u,

Chûng zîngah chuan Levia chi hêngte hi an tel: Kohata thlahte zînga mi Amasaia fapa Mahata leh Azaria fapa Joela. Meraria thlah zînga mi Abdia fapa Kisa leh Jahalelela fapa Azaria; Gersona thlahte zînga mi Zima fapa Joa leh Joa fapa Edena.
Elizafana thlah zînga mi Simria leh Jeuela; Asafa thlah zînga mi Zekaria leh Matania;
Hemana thlah zînga mi Jehuela leh Simeia; Jeduthuna thlah zînga mi Semaia leh Uziela.
Hêng mite hian an chipui Levia chite chu an pun khâwm a, an inthian thianghlim a; lal thupêk ang chuan Tempul chu an thian a.
Tempul chhûngah puithiamho chu an lût a, thil bawlhhlawh an hmuh rêng rêng chu

Thla khatna, ni hmasa berah Tempul chu an thian ṭan a, ni riat ni chuan Tempul pindan hmasa thlengin an thian zo va. Ni riat dang, ni sâwm leh paruk thlengin Tempul chhûng chu Pathian biakna tlâk tûrin an thian leh a, an tithianghlim ta a.

Levia chite chu lal Hezekia hnênah an kal a, “Tempul chhûng chu kan thian thianghlim ta. Hâlral thilhlan hâlna maichâm te, chhang serh dahna dawhkân te leh hmanrua zawng zawng pawh kan tithianghlim ta.
Ahazan
Lal Hezekia chuan Jerusalem-a hotu deuh deuh chu a ko khâwm rum rum a,
Bâwngpa pasarih, berâmchal pasarih, berâmno pasarih leh sual thawina thilhlanah kêlpa pasarih an rawn dah a; Arona thlah puithiamte chu
Bâwngte chu an talh a, an thisen chu maichâmah an theh a, berâmte pawh chu an talh a, an thisen chu maichâmah an theh bawk a.
Lal leh pungkhâwmho hmaah chuan sual thawina thilhlan atân kêlpate chu an rawn kai a, an lu-ah an kut an nghat a;

Puithiamte chuan an talh a, an thisen chu sual thawi nân an hlân a, Israel mi zawng zawng sual thawi nân an hlân a ni. Lal thu angin hâlral thilhlan leh sual thawina thilhlan chu Israel mi zawng zawng tân an hlân a ni.
Lal zâwlnei Gada leh zâwlnei Nathana hmanga Davida hnêna
Davida tum ṭhin ang thiltum chite an keng bawk a. Puithiamte pawh tawtawrâwt kengin an ding a,
Lal Hezekia chuan hâlral thilhlan chu hlân tawh tûrin a hrilh a; an han hlan chuan mipuiin
Chuta awm apiang chuan Pathian chibai an bûk a, hla an sa a, an thilhlan a kan zawh hma chu rimawi an tum zui zêl a.
Lal Hezekia leh mipuite chu an ṭhingṭhi a, Pathian chibai an bûk a.
Lal leh hotute chuan Davida leh zâwlnei Asafa hla phuah,
Hezekia chuan mipui hnênah, “

Pungkhâwmho chuan thilhlan te, lâwmthu sawina te an rawn hlân a, a duh apiangin hâlral thilhlan tûr te an rawn keng bawk a. Pungkhâwmhovin hâlral thilhlan tûr an rawn lâkte chu bâwngpa sawmsarih, berâmno zahnih leh berâm za a ni.
Bâwng zaruk leh berâm sângthum pawh thilhlan chi dangah an hlân a.

A talhtu tûr puithiam an indaih loh avângin an talh zawh hma chu Levia chiten an pui a. A tâwp lamah chuan puithiam tam zâwk pawh an inthian thianghlim hman a; Levia chite hi puithiamho ai chuan an lo invawng thianghlim thei zâwk a lo ni.

Mipui thilhlan hâl hi puithiam tih tûr a ni a. An ran talh mipui ei thaute pawh an hâl tûr a ni; hâlral thilhlan ruala uain an rawn hlante pawh puithiamin an bun chhuak tûr a ni. Tichuan, Tempul rawngbâwlna chu an ṭan leh ta a.
Lal Hezekia leh mipuite chu Pathianin hetianga ti leh thei mai tûra a ṭanpui avângin an hlim ta êm êm a.
Puithiam tam tak an inthian thianghlim hman lo va, mipui lah Jerusalem-ah an pung khâwm hman hek lo; chuvângin, Kalhlên Kût chu a hun takah an hmang thei ta lo va.
Lal Hezekia leh a hote leh Jerusalem mite chu an inrâwn khâwm a, Kalhlên Kût chu a thla hnihnaah hman an rêl ta a. Lal chuan Israel ram leh Judai ramah thu a thawn darh ta chiam a.
Efraim leh Manase-ho te phei chu Jerusalem Tempula lo kala,
Lal leh mipuite chuan an thil rawt chu tifuh an inti hle a.
Hmâr lam, Dan aṭanga chhim lam Beer-seba inkâra Israel mi zawng zawng chu Jerusalem-ah a tam thei ang ber lo kala, Kalhlên kût rawn hmang tûrin an sâwm a.
Lal leh a hote chuan Judai ram leh Israel ramah lamkal an tlântîr a, ngenna lehkha hetiang hi an thawn darh a:
“Israel mite u, Abrahama te, Isaka te, Jakoba te Pathian,
In pate leh in unau te, in thlahtute Pathian,
Anni angin luhlul suh u,
lam in lo hawi phawt chuan in hmêlmaten sala an man in lainate kha an lo khawngaih ang a, an rawn hâwntîr ngei ang.
An mi tirhte chu Efraim leh Manasea thlahte awmna ram khaw tinah an kal a, Zebulun ram pawh an thleng a; mahse, mite chuan an lo nuihsawh a.
Chuti chung pawh chuan Aser-ho te, Manase-ho te, Zebulun-ho te Jerusalem-a lo kal duh an awm nual a.
Judai ramah pawh Pathian chuan hna a thawk a, lal leh a hote thu angin lungrual taka Pathian duhzâwng tih an châk ta hle hlawm a.
Thla hnihnaah chuan chhang dawidim telh loh kût hmang tûrin Jerusalem khuaah chuan mi tam tak an lo kal khâwm a.
Jerusalem-a pathian dang biakna maichâm awm zawng zawng, rimtui an hâlna maichâmte nên an la a, Kidron luiah an paih a.
Ni sâwm leh pali ni chuan Kalhlên kûta thilhlan berâmno chu an talh a. Puithiam leh Levia chi te pawh kha, an zah êm êm avângin
Pathian mi Mosia Dân bu-a sawi ang khân an awmna tûr hmun ruatah an awm ṭhap a. Levia chite chuan thilhlan thisen chu puithiamho an pe a, anni chuan maichâmah an lo theh a.
Mi tam tak chu an bawlhhlawh avângin Kalhlên kût berâmno an talh a thiang lo va, Levia chite khân an talhsak a,
Efraim-ho te, Manase-ho te, Isakar-ho te, Zebulun-ho te zînga mi tam tak phei chu an inthen thianghlim loh avângin dân ang lovin Kalhlên kût chu an hmang a ni.
Lal Hezekia chu chûngho tân chuan a ṭawngṭai a, “Aw
chuan Hezekia ṭawngṭai chu a ngaithla a, mite chu a ngaidam a, engtin mah a khawih lo.
Hlim takin ni sarih chhûng chu Jerusalem-a lo kalte chuan chhang dawidim telh loh kût chu an hmang a, ni tin mai Levia chite leh puithiamte chuan awrâwl tâwp chhuahin
biaknaa an tumrîk neihte nên inkhâwm kaihhruai an thiam êm avâng chuan Levia chite chu lal Hezekia chuan a fak a.
An thlahtute Pathian,
Tin, mipui chuan ni sarih dang kût nawn an rawt a; tichuan, hlim takin ni sarih an kût leh ta a.

Lal Hezekia chuan bâwngpa sângkhat leh berâm sângsarih, mipui thilhlana ruai ṭheh nân a thawh a, an hotute chuan bâwngpa sângkhat leh berâm sîngkhat an thawh bawk a. Puithiam tam tak an lo inthian thianghlim tawh a.
Judai rama mi lo pung khâwm te, Levia chi te, puithiam te, Israel ram aṭanga lo kal te, Judai ram leh Israel rama hnam dang chêng lo kal vete nên an vaiin an hlim êm êm a.
Jerusalem khuaah chuan mi tin an lâwm a, Davida fapa Solomona thih hnuah chutiang khawpa hlimna a la awm lo.
Levia chite leh puithiamte chuan mipui tân malsâwmna an sawi a,

Kût an ṭiak chuan Israel mi zawng zawng chu Judai ram khaw tinah an kal darh a, an lungphun te, an pathiannu Aseri lim an phun te chu an nam tlu a, maichâmte leh hmunsâng, hnam dang pathian an biakna hmunte chu an tichim a. Judai ram bâkah Benjamin te, Efraim te leh Manase biala mi te pawh an tichhia a, mahni in lamah an haw leh ta hlawm a.

Lal Hezekia chuan puithiam te leh Levia chi te chu hna an insem thliah ṭhîn ang khân an thawh dân tûr a remfelsak leh a. An hna tûr chu hâlral thilhlan hlan te, remna thilhlan hlan te, Tempula Pathian biak hruai te, Tempul kawngkhâr bula
Hezekia chuan ama bâwng leh berâm rual aṭangin tûk tin zan tin hâlral thilhlan tûr te, sabat ni te, thla thar ni te leh kût huna hâlral thilhlan
Chutianga thu a pêk veleh Israel mite chuan an thilpêk chhangphut ṭha chi te, uain te, oliv hriak te, khawizu te leh an thil thar te leh an neih apiang an sâwma pakhat nên an rawn la a.
Judai ram khawpuia awm zawng zawng chuan an ran sâwma pakhat te, an Pathian,
A thla thumna aṭangin an rawn pe ṭan a, thla sarihna thlengin an rawn pêk chu a vûm thûr mai a ni.
Lal Hezekia leh hruaituten thilpêk tling khâwm tamzia an hmuh chuan
Lal chuan puithiamte leh Levia chite hnênah thilpêk tling khâwm chu an khawpkham leh kham loh a zâwt a.
Zadoka thlaha puithiam lalber Azaria chuan, “Miten an thilpêkte Tempula an rawn ken tâk hnu hi chuan ei tûr kan nei ta a, ei sên loh tam tak a bâng bawk a ni.
Lal thupêk angin Tempul ram chhûngah chuan kudâm an sa a.
An thilpêk leh sâwma pakhat chu a bothlau loh nân an dah ṭha a. A enkawl tûrin Levia chi Konania an ruat a, a nau Simeian a ṭanpui a.

An kaihhruaia thawk tûrin Levia chi Jehiela te, Azazia te, Nahata te, Asahela te, Jerimota te, Jozabada te, Eliela te, Ismakia te, Mahata te, Benaia te chu lal Hezekia leh puithiam lalber Azaria chuan an ruat a.
Imna fapa Korea, Tempul khawchhak lam kawngka vêngtu hotu chu

Khaw dang, puithiam awmnaah chuan hêng Levia chi Edena te, Miniamina te, Jesua te, Semaia te, Amaria te, Sekania te chuan ei tûr chu ṭha takin an sempui a, an Levia chipuite pawh, a pawimawh leh pawimawh lo deuh sawi lovin an sem thliah thliah ṭhîn.
Mipa, kum sawmthum chung lam, Tempula rawngbâwl theite chuan an dinhmun azirin an dawng a.
Puithiamho chu a chi chia inchhâwk tûr hna an sem a; Levia chi kum sawmhnih chung lamte erawh chu a pâwl pâwlin hna thawk tûrin an ruat ṭhîn a ni.
An hming chu an nupui te, an fate leh an awmpui nghette nên an ziak vek a, eng lai pawha an hna thawk tûrin koh mai theih an ni.
Arona thlahte awmna tûr, thingtlâng khua leh a chhehvêl ran tlatna ram ruata awm puithiamte hnêna ei leh bar tûr semtu tûr an ruat bawk a, Levia chi chhiarnaa hming chuangte pawh an pe ṭhîn.
Judai ram pumah lal Hezekia chuan a Pathian,
Tihtakzetin a Pathian rawng a bâwl a, Tempul a ngaihsaka, dânte a zawm êm avângin, kawng engkimah a hmuingîl a ni.
Hezekia chuan
Hezekia chuan Jerusalem pawh rawn beih zêl a tum tih a hriat chuan,
a hote nên an inrâwn tlâng a, Asuria-hovin Jerusalem an rawn hnaih hnua tui in tûr an neih loh nân khaw pâwn hnaia tuikhur zawng zawng chu hnawh zai an rêl a.
Hotute chuan mi tam tak an hruai a, tuikhur zawng zawng chu luang chhuak tûr awm lovin an hnawh ta vek a.

Lal chuan khaw kulh bang derdêp laite chu a thuam ṭha a, in sângte a sak belh a, Jerusalem khaw hlui Milo an tih, lei an chhûn khahna lai kulh bangte pawh chu a siam ṭha a. Fei leh phaw tam tak a siamtîr bawk a.
Khaw mite chu sipai hotuten an ho va, khawpui luhna kawngkhâr tualzâwl zau laiah chuan mite chu an rawn hruai khâwm a, a lo fuih a.
An hnênah chuan, “Huai takin awm ula, ṭan la sauh sauh rawh u: Asuria leh a sipai zozaite hi hlau suh ula, zâm hek suh u, an aia ropui kan zîngah a awm a ni;
ani zawng mihring chaknaah a innghat a, keini zawng
Senakeriba leh a sipaite Lakis khuaa an awm hnu chuan Hezekia leh Judai ram mi, Jerusalem-a awm zawng zawngte hnênah chuan palai a rawn tîr a,
“Asuria lal Senakeriba chuan heti hian a ti: ‘Eng nge maw in beiseia, Jerusalem hual in tuar dâwn le?
Hezekia hian tuihâl leh rilṭâma thi tûrin a bum che u elo maw?

In Pathian biakna hmunsângte leh maichâmte ṭhiatin Jerusalem leh Judai ram mite chu, ‘maichâm pakhatah Pathian chu chibai in bûk ang a, chutah chuan thil in hlân tûr a ni,’ titu kha he Hezekia hi a ni lâwm ni?
Kei leh ka pate chuan ram tina hnam tinrêng kan sawisak ṭhin dân kha in hria em? Chûngho pathiante chuan an mite chu kan kut aṭangin an chhan thei ngai em ni?
Ka pa chuan chûngho pathiante chu a titlâwm vek a, Pathian pawh hian a kut ata a chhan che uin in ring elo?

Chuvângin, Hezekia hian bum che u suh se, bual â che u hek suh sela, a thu ring suh u. Asuria lal laka a betute chhan theitu hnam pathian pakhat mah an awm lo. In Pathian pawh hian a va chhan rua lo che u êm!” a ti a.
Asuria sipai hotu chuan
Asuria lal chuan a lehkhaah chuan Israel-te Pathian,
Khaw lâk a awlsam zâwk beiseiin Jerusalem kulh bula awmte tihzâm a tum a, Hebrai ṭawngin thu a sawi a ni.
Jerusalem Pathian chu hnam dang pathian, mihring siam ang lekin a sawi a ni.
Lal Hezekia leh Amoza fapa zâwlnei Isaia chu an ṭawngṭai a, Pathian an au va.

chuan Vântirhkoh a rawn tîr a, Asuria sipaite leh an hotute chu an riahhmunah chuan a rawn tihlum a. Asuria lal chu mualpho takin an khaw lamah a haw ta a. Ni khat chu an pathian biak ina a awm laiin a fate zînga mi ngeiin khandaihin an sât hlum a.
Lal Hezekia leh Jerusalem mite chu chutiang chuan Asuria lal Senakeriba leh an hmêlmate kut ata
hnêna thilhlan hlân tûrin Jerusalem-ah mi tam tak an lo kal a. Hezekia hnênah pawh thilpêk an rawn pe zut zut a, hnam tinin Hezekia chu an ngaisâng hle a ni.
Hetih hun lai vêl hian Hezekia chu thih ngamin a na a. A ṭawngṭai a, a dam leh tûr thu chhinchhiahna
thiltihsak avâng chuan lâwm nachâng a hre lo va, a chapo avâng chuan Judai ram leh Jerusalem chuan an tuar ta a.
A tâwpah erawh zawng Hezekia leh Jerusalem mite chu an inchhîr a, an inngaitlâwm a, Hezekia dam chhûng chuan
Lal Hezekia chu a hausa ta hle a, tu pawhin an ngaisâng a, a rangkachak te, tangkarua te, lungmantam te, thil rimtui te, phaw te leh thil dang hlu tak tak te dahna tûr in te a sa a.
A buh te, uain te, oliv hriak te dahna tûr chhêk in a saktîr a; bâwng in te, berâm huangte a siam bawk a.
Hêng bâkah hian Pathianin berâm te, sum leh pai chi tinrêng a pe a, khua te a siam thluah a.
Hezekia hian Gihon tuiluanna chhakta zâwk chu a tiping a, tui kawng a siam a, Jerusalem khaw chhûng thlang lam pangah a luan luhtîr a ni. Hezekia chu a thil tih engkimah a hmuingîl zêl a.
A chunga thil mak thleng zâwt fiah tûrin Babulon lalin palai a rawn tirh lai kha chuan mi eng ang nge a nih fiah nân Pathianin a thlahfâl a nih kha.
Lal Hezekia thil tih dang te, a thil tih ṭhat te chu, Amoza fapa zâwlnei Isaia lehkhabu-ah leh Israel leh Judai lalte chanchin ziakna bu-ah a chuang.
Hezekia chu a thi a, lal thlânmual chuanchungah an phûm a. A thih chuan Judai ram leh Jerusalem-in an chawimawi nasa hle a. A fapa Manasea chu a lo lal ta a.
Kum sâwm leh pahnih a nihin Manasea chu Judai ramah a lal ṭan a, Jerusalem-ah kum sawmnga leh panga a lal a.
Israela thlahte hmaa
A pain a tihchhiat, hnam dang pathian biakna hmunsângte kha a siam ṭha leh a. Baal hnêna inthawina hlanna tûr maichâmte a siam a, pathiannu Aseri lim te a siam a, arsi te chibai a bûk a.
Kumkhuaa
Tempul pindan pahnihah chuan arsi biakna tûr maichâm te a siam a.
Hinom ruamah hâlral thilhlanah a fapa te a hlân a; aien te, kutze en te, arsi biak te a chîng a, mitthi thlûk thiam te, aisân chîng te a râwn ṭhîn a.
A milem chhûn chu tempulah a dah a, Pathianin Davida leh Solomona hnênah, “Israel hnam zawng zawng ram zîngah Jerusalem leh he in hi ka hming lamna hmun tûra ka thlan a ni.

Kumkhuaa ka thupêk zawng zawng an zawma, ka thuruatte leh ka dânte, ka chhiahhlawh Mosian a hrilhte kha an zawm chuan Israel-ho hi engtikah mah an pate hnêna ka pêk tawh ram aṭang hian ka hnawt chhuak lo vang,” a ti si a.
Manasea chuan Judai ram leh Jerusalem mite chu thil dik lo a tihtîr a, Israel-te hmaa a hnawh chhuah hnamte tih ṭhin aia sual nasa zâwk an ti ta a ni.
Manasea chu an man a, khaidiatin an hlîng a, a hnârah thîr kawm an vuah a, Babulon-ah an hruai ta a.
A mangan êm avâng chuan
Manasea ṭawngṭai chu a lo ngaihthlâksak ta a, a dîlna chu chhângin Jerusalem-ah a hâwntîr leh ta a. Manasea chuan

Chumi hnu chuan Davida khawpui, khawchhak lam panga kulh bang pâwn zâwk chu Manasea chuan a zawm sâng a, Gihon tui awmna ruam hmâr lam Sangha Kawngkhâr bul ‘Ofel’ an tih hmun thlengin a siam a. Judai rama kulh nei khaw tinah sipai pâwl khat, hotu pakhat nên a dah vek a.
Hnam dang pathian lem leh milim chhûn amahin Tempula a dahte chu a paih bo va. Tempul mual leh Jerusalem khuaa hnam dang pathian biakna maichâm awmte pawh chu a la a, khawpui ata a paih chhuak a.
biakna maichâm chu a siam ṭha a, remna thilhlan te, lâwmthu sawina thilhlan te a hlân a, Judai ram mi zawng zawng chu Israel-te Pathian,
Mipuite chu an inthawina hmun pangngaiah la inthawi reng mah se,
Manasea thil tih dang zawng zawng, Pathian hnêna a ṭawngṭaina te, Israel-te Pathian,

Lal Manasea ṭawngṭaina leh Pathian chhânna te, a sim hmaa thil sual a tih chanchin te, hnam dang pathian biakna hmunsâng te siama, Aseri lim siama, a milem chhûn a biak thu te, zâwlneiho chanchin ziakna bu-ah a chuang vek bawk a ni.
Manasea chu a thi a, lal inah an phûm a, a fapa Amona chu a lo lal ta a.
Amona chu kum sawmhnih leh pahnih a nihin Judai ramah a lal ṭan a, Jerusalem-ah kum hnih a lal a.
A pa Manasea ang bawkin
A pa ang khân a inngaitlâwm ve duh lo va,
A hoten an phiar a, a inah an that a,
Judai ram mite chuan Amona thattute chu an that ve a, a fapa Josia chu lalah an siam a.
Kum riat a nihin Josia chu Judai ramah a lal ṭan a, kum sawmthum leh pakhat Jerusalem-ah a lal a.
lawmzâwng a ti ṭhîn a, a thlahtu Davida awm dân angin a awm a. Pathian dânte chu uluk takin a zâwm a.

Josia chuan kum riat a lal kumin, la naupang hle mah se, a thlahtu Davida Pathian chu a be ve ṭan ta a; kum li hnuah phei chuan hnam dang pathian biakna hmunsâng te, Aseri lim te leh milim dang te chu a tichhe vek a.

A thuin a hote chuan Baal biakna maichâmte chu an chhu chhia a, a bula rimtui hâlna maichâmte pawh an tichhia a; Aseri limte leh milim dangte chu an chhu dip vek a, chûng betute thlânah chuan an phul a.
Hnam dang puithiamho ruhte chu an pathian biakna maichâmah chuan an hâl a. Tichuan, Judai ram leh Jerusalem-ah khua chu an thian thianghlim ta a.
Chutiang bawkin Manase leh Efraim te, Simeon leh hmâr lama Naftali ram thlengin an khawpuia mi leh an khaw ram tawh hnua mite chu a thian fai a.
Hmâr lam bial Israel chhûnga maichâmte leh Aseri limte a tichhia a, milimte chu a chhu dip a, rimtui an hâlna maichâmte pawh chu a tichhe vek a, Jerusalem-ah a haw leh ta a.

Hnam dang pathian biak a tihtâwpa, ram leh Tempul a tihthianghlim hnu kum sâwm leh pariat a lal kum chuan Josia chuan Tempul chhûng siam ṭha tûrin mi pathum, Azalia fapa Safana te, Jerusalem khaw awptu Maaseia te, Joahaza fapa hotu lal tak Joa te a tîr a.

Levia chi, kawngka vêngtuten Tempul sum tûr an khawn ṭhin kha puithiam lalber Hilkia hnênah an hlân zêl a. Efraim mi te, Manase mi te leh Israel hmâr lam ram mite hnên aṭang leh Judai ram te, Benjamin ram te leh Jerusalem mite hnên aṭangin an khawn ṭhîn a ni.
He tangka hi, he mite pathum kutah hian an pe a, anni chuan
mistirite leh in sa mite kutah lung leh thing lei nân te, thil lo tlabal tawh, Juda lalten an lo ngaihsak loh, bangrel te, khanchhuk te siam ṭhat nân an pe a.

Hnathawktute chuan uluk takin hna an thawk a, Levia chi, mi pali Meraria thlah Jahata leh Obadia te, Kohata thlah Zekaria leh Mesulama te chuan an ho va. Hêng Levia chite hi thil tum thiam tak vek an ni.
Levia chia mi ṭhenkhat chuan thil thiartute an vêng a, hna hrang hrang thawktu an ho va. Ṭhenkhatin senso lam an lo chhinchhiah fel a, ṭhenkhatin vên hna an thawk a.
Sum dahkhâwmna ata tangka an lâk chhuah chuan
Safana hnênah, “Hei Tempul chhûngah, Dân bu ka chhar e,” a ti a, a pe a.
Safana chuan lal hnênah a kalpui a, “I sawi ang zawng zawng chu kan ti zo ta.
Tempula kawl ṭhat tangka chu kan la a, hnathawktute leh a enkawltute hlawhah kan pe tawh a.
Hei Hilkia mi pêk, lehkhabu ka rawn keng e,” a ti a. Lal hriat tûr chuan a chhiar ta a.
Lalin Dân thu an chhiar a han ngaihthlâk chuan a puan a pawtthlêr a,
Hilkia te, Safana fapa Ahikama te, Mika fapa Abdona te, lehkha ziaktu Safana te, lal enkawltu Asaia te chu a ko va.
“He Dân bu chungchâng thu-ah hian ka tân te, Israel leh Judai rama la dam chhun tân te

Hilkia leh lal mi tirh dangte chu Tokhata fapa Saluma nupui zâwlnei Huldaii hnênah chuan an kal a, Tokhata hi Hasra fapa a ni, Saluma hi Tempula puithiam thawmhnaw enkawltu Jerusalem vêng thara awm a ni a, thil awm dân chu Huldaii an hrilh a.
Ani chuan an hnênah, “
chuan, ‘Lal hriata an chhiar chhuah lehkhabu ziala ânchhia zawng zawng kha Jerusalem leh a chhûnga chêngte chungah ka tlâktîr dâwn.
Min hnâwl a, pathian dang hnênah thilhlante an hlân a, an thiltih chuan min tithinur ta a ni. Jerusalem chungah ka thin a ur êm êm a, a dai mai lo vang.
Lal chungchâng erawh chu, kei,
i sim a, i inphahhniam ta a. Jerusalem leh a chhûnga mi ka hrem dâwn ka tih khân pawi tiin i puan i pawtthlêr a, i ṭap a.

Jerusalem chu i thih hnuah chauh a ni ka hrem dâwn ni, thlamuang takin ka thihtîr ang che a, he hmun leh a chhûnga awmte chunga ka rawn thlentîr tûr thil ṭha lo zawng zawngte chu i hmu lo vang,’ a ti,” a lo ti a. Chu thu keng chuan mite chu lal hnênah an lo kîr leh a.
Lal Josia chuan Judai ram leh Jerusalem-a upate chu a ko khâwm a.
Puithiamte leh Levia chite nên Tempulah an kal a, mi rethei leh mi hausate pawhin an zui a. Lal chuan Tempul chhûnga Thuthlung bu an chhar chu mipui hmaah chuan a chhiar chhuak a.

Lal dinna tûra ruat ban bulah chuan a ding a, LALPA hnênah thu a thlung a, a thu awiha, rilru taka tihtakzetin a dânte leh a thupêkte chu zawm a tiam a, lehkhabua thu chuang zawng zawng pawisak vek a tiam a ni.
Benjamin-ho leh Jerusalem-a awm tawh phawt chu thuthlung zâwm tûrin thu a tiamtîr a. An pute Pathian nêna thuthlung lo siam tawha tih tûr awmte chu Jerusalem mite chuan an ti a.
Lal Josia chuan Israel mite ram chhûnga milem tenawm tak tak chu a tichhe vek a, a dam chhûng chuan mite chu an thlahtute Pathian,
Lal Josia chuan
Puithiamho chu Tempula an thawh tûr hna a sem a, ṭha taka thawk tûrin a fuih a,
tâna serh hran, Dân zirtîrtu Levia chite pawh hetiang hian a hrilh a: “Davida fapa Solomona in sak chhûngah Thuthlung Bâwm hi dah rawh u, zâwn sawn chhên a ngai tawh lo. In Pathian,
A chi chi-in Tempula in awmna tûrah awm ula, in tih tûr lal Davida leh a fapa Solomonan an ruat ang kha ti ang che u.
Hna in insem hunah Israel chhûngkawho ṭanpuitu tûr Levia mite ruat ṭhîn ang che u.
Kalhlên Kût sa tûr berâm leh kêl in talh tûr a ni. Tûnah inthian thianghlim rawh u, an thilhlan tûrte hlanpui ula, Mosia hnêna
Kalhlên Kûta mipui hman atân Josia chuan ama ran rual zînga mi ngei berâm te, berâmno te leh keltê sîngthum, bâwngpa sângthum a thawh a.

A miliante pawh chuan mipui te, puithiam te leh Levia chi te ei tûr an thawh bawk a. Tempul hotu puithiam lalber Hilkia te, Zekaria te leh Jehiela te chuan berâmno leh keltê sanghnih leh zaruk leh bâwngpa zathum, kût chhûnga thilhlana an hlan tûrin puithiamte chu an pe a.
Levia chi hotu Konania te, Semaia te leh a unau Nethanela te, Hasabia te, Jeiela te, Jozabada te chuan berâmno leh keltê sângnga leh bâwngpa zanga, Levia chiten thilhlana an hman tûr an thawh bawk a.
Kalhlên Kût hmanna tûr engkim an tihfel hnu chuan lal thu angin puithiamte leh Levia chite chu an hmun ṭheuh tûrah an awm a.
Kêl leh berâm an talh zawh chuan Levia chite chuan a vun an lip a, puithiamten a thisen chu maichâmah an theh a.
Hâlral thilhlana hman tûr chu chhûng tin tân Mosia Dân bu-a ziak anga an hlan tûrin an sem a.
Levia chite chuan Dân angin Kalhlên kût sa chu an hem hmin a, sa thianghlim ṭhenkhat chu bêlah te, thîrbêlah te, bêlpuiah te an chhûm a, a sa chu mipui an sem a.
Chumi hnu chuan anmahni leh Arona thlah puithiamte ei tûr sa an siam leh a, puithiamho khân hâlral thilhlan leh an thilhlan thau hâlna mei chu an vil zânkhua si a.

Lal Davida thupêk angin Asafa te, Hemana te leh lal zâwlnei Jeduthuna te chuan thil tum mi Asafa thlahte chu an awmna hmun tûrah an awmtîr a. Tempul vêngtute tân pawh kal sawn a ngai lo, an ṭhian Levia chi, mi dangte khân Kalhlên Kût sa chu an lo buatsaihsak a ni.
Lal Josia thu ang chuan
Ni ruk chhûng, Kalhlên Kût leh chhang dawidim telh loh kût chu Israel mi zawng zawngin an hmang a.

Zâwlnei Samuela thih hnu kha chuan heti taka ropui hian Kalhlên Kût an hmang ngai lo. Lal Josia te, puithiam te, Levia chi te, Juda leh Israel rama awmte leh Jerusalem-a awmten Kalhlên Kût an hman ang hian an la hmang ngai lo.
Lal Josia kum sâwm leh pariat a lal kum khân an hmang a ni.
Lal Josian heti taka Tempul a chei hnu hian Aigupta lal Nekoa chuan Eufretis lui kamah, Karkhemis-ah, indo tûrin a sipaite a hruai a. Josia chuan lo dan a tum a.

Nekoa chuan, “Nang Juda lal, he thilah hian i lo inrawlhna tûr a awm lo. Nang bei tûr chein ka lo kal lo, ka hmêlma bei tûra lo kal ka ni. Pathian chuan hmanhmawh tûrin min ti a ni, ka lamṭang a ni a, mi lo dan tum teh suh, a tichhe palh ang che,” tiin palai a rawn tîr a.
Josia chuan lo beih chu a tum ta tlat a, Nekoa hmanga Pathian thu sawi chu a awih duh lo va, a inchei danglam a, Megido phaia an inbeihnaah chuan a kal ve ta a.
An inbeih lai chuan Aigupta sipai thal chuan Josia chu a fuh ta a. A tawlailîr khalhtu hnênah, “Min hliam na hle mai, indona hmun ata hi min chhuahpui rawh,” a ti a.
Ama tawlailîr ata chu an zâwn chhuak a, tawlailîr dang a hruaiah chuan an dah a; Jerusalem-ah an hâwn ta a. A thi a, lal thlânah an phûm a, Judai ram leh Jerusalem mite chuan an ui a, an sûn a.
Zâwlnei Jeremia chuan Josia sûnna hla a phuah a, Israel zîngah chuan hla sa mi, mipa leh hmeichhiaten lal sûn hlaah an sa ṭhîn. Sûnna hla ziak khâwmna bu-ah chu hla chu a chuang.
Josia thil tih zawng zawng,
a bul aṭanga a tâwp thleng chanchin chu Israel leh Juda lalte chanchin ziakna bu-ah a chuang vek a ni.
Judai ram mite chuan Josia fapa Jehoahaza chu lalah an thlang a, Jerusalem-ah hriak an thih a.
Jehoahaza chu kum sawmhnih leh pathum a nihin Judai ramah a lal ṭan a, thla thum a lal hman a.
Aigupta lal Nekoa chuan salah a man a, Judai ram chu, chhiah, tangkarua kg. sângthum leh zali leh rangkachak kg. sawmthum leh pali a chawitîr a.
Nekoa chuan Jehoahaza u Eliakima chu Judai ram lalah a dah a, a hmingah Jehoiakima a sak tharsak a, Jehoahaza chu Aigupta ramah a hruai a.
Jehoiakima chu kum sawmhnih leh panga a nihin Judai ramah a lal ṭan a. Jerusalem-ah kum sâwm leh pakhat a lal a.
Babulon lal Nebukadnezara chuan Judai ram a rûn a, Jehoiakima chu a man a, khaidiata phuar chungin Babulon-ah a hâwn a.
Nebukadnezara chuan Tempula thil hlu ṭhenkhat chu a hâwn bawk a, Babulon khuaa a inah a dah a.
Jehoiakima thil tih zawng zawng, thil tenawm tak tak a tih te leh thil sual a tihte chu Israel leh Juda lalte chanchin ziakna bu-ah a chuang vek a ni; a aiah a fapa Jehoiakina chu a lal ta a.
Jehoiakina chu kum sâwm leh pariat a nihin Judai ramah a lal ṭan a, Jerusalem-ah thla thum leh ni sâwm a lal hman a. Ani pawh

Nipui a thâwk dâwn lai vêl chuan lal Nebukadnezara a lo kal a, Babulon-ah salah a hruai a; Tempula thil hlu zawng zawng pawh a hâwn vek a. Nebukadnezara chuan Jehoiakina nau Zedekia chu Judai ram leh Jerusalem lalah a dah a.
Zedekia chu kum sâwm leh pariat a nihin Judai ramah a lal a. Jerusalem-ah kum sâwm leh pakhat chhûng a lal a.
lakah thil sual a ti a;
Zedekia chu Nebukadnezara lakah a hel ta mai a. Pathian hminga thu a tiamtîr, lalah a dah a ni si a. Luhlul a chhuah a, a sim duh lo va, Israel-te Pathian,
Juda upa te, puithiam te leh mipui te lah chuan an vêla hnam sualho tih dân an la a,
an thlahtute Pathian chuan Tempul leh a mite chu chhan a duh avângin mipui zilh tûrin zâwlneite a tîr fo va ni.
Mahse, Pathian tirhte chu an lo deusawh a, an thute lah engah mah an ngai hek lo. Zâwlneite chu an nuihzatbûr a, a tâwp a tâwpah chuan
Chuvângin,
Babulon lal chuan Tempul chu a rawk a, thil hlu dah khâwmte chu a la a, lal in leh milian ina thil awm zawng zawng chu Babulon-ah a hâwn vek a.
Tempul leh khuaa inte chu a hâl a, khawpui kulh bangte chu a ṭhiat a.
Thi bâng zawng zawng chu Babulon-ah a hruai haw a, Persia-ho an lo len thleng khân amah leh a hote bawihah an awm a.
Jeremia kâa
Persia rama lal Kura a lal ṭan tirh kumin,
“Hei hi Persia lal Kura thupêk a ni.
Persia lal Kura lal ṭan tirh kumin zâwlnei Jeremia kâa
“Persia lal Kura chuan heti hian a ti: Vân Pathian,
Nangni, a mi zawng zawngte hnênah Pathian chu awm rawh se. Judai ram Jerusalem khuaah chuan haw chho ula, Israel-te Pathian, Jerusalem khuaa in biak ṭhin
A mi, saltâng tu pawh ṭanpui ngai chu an ṭhenawmten tangka te, rangkachak te leh sabengtung tein ṭanpui rawh se; Jerusalem khuaa Pathian Tempula thilhlan tûr pawh pe rawh se,” tiin.
Juda leh Benjamin hnam hruaitu te, puithiam leh Levia chi te leh mi dang, Pathianin an rilru a tihphûrsak te chu, Jerusalem-a
An vêla awmte chuan tangkaraw bungbêl te, rangkachak te, thawmhnaw te, sabengtung te an pe a, chûng bâkah Tempul sak nâna an thawhlâwmte pawh an pe bawk a.
Nebukadnezaran
lal sum enkawltu Mithredata chu a lâk chhuahtîr a, an ziak chhuak a, Juda-ho zînga hotu ber Sesbazara a pe a,
chûngte chu: rangkachak maihûn sawmthum, tangkaraw maihûn sângkhat; chem sawmhnih leh pakua.
Rangkachak no sawmthum; tangkaraw no zali leh sâwm; bungbêl chi dang sângkhat.
A vaiin rangkachak leh tangkaruaa siam no leh thil dang chi hrang chu kg. sângnga leh zali a ni a; Sesbazara leh saltâng dangte chuan chûng chu Babulon aṭangin Jerusalem-ah an chhohpui a.
Saltâng tam tak chuan Babulon chu an chhuahsan a, Jerusalem-ah leh Judai ramah, mahni awm ṭhinna ṭheuhvah an haw a. Lal Nebukadnezaran a man aṭang khân Babulon-ah an chhûngin salah an awm a ni.
An zînga hruaitu deuh deuhte chu: Jerubabela te, Jesua te, Nehemia te, Seraia te, Reelaia te, Mordekaia te, Bilsana te, Mispara te, Bigvaia te, Rehuma te, Baasa te an ni.
Israel mi, chi hrang hrang lo kîr zât chu hetiang hi a ni:
Parosa chi mi sânghnih leh za leh sawmsarih leh pahnih;
Sefatia chi mi zathum leh sawmsarih leh pahnih;
Ara chi mi zasarih leh sawmsarih leh panga;
Pahat-Moab chi, Jesua leh Joaba thlah mi sânghnih leh zariat leh sâwm leh pahnih;
Elama chi mi sângkhat leh zahnih leh sawmnga leh pali;
Zatu chi mi zakua leh sawmli leh panga;
Zakai chi mi zasarih leh sawmruk;
Bania chi mi zaruk leh sawmli leh pahnih;
Bebai chi mi zaruk leh sawmhnih leh pathum;
Azgad chi mi sângkhat leh zahnih leh sawmhnih leh pahnih;
Adonikam chi mi zaruk leh sawmruk leh paruk;
Bigvai chi mi sânghnih leh sawmnga leh paruk;
Adin chi mi zali leh sawmnga leh pali;
Ater chi, Hezekia thlahte mi sawmkua leh pariat;
Bezai chi mi zathum leh sawmhnih leh pathum;
Jora chi mi za leh sâwm leh pahnih;
Hasum chi mi zahnih leh sawmhnih leh pathum;
Gibar chi mi sawmkua leh panga.
Bethlehem khaw chhuak mi za leh sawmhnih leh pathum;
Netofa khaw chhuak mi sawmnga leh paruk;
Anathot khaw chhuak mi za leh sawmhnih leh pariat;
Azmavet khaw chhuak mi sawmli leh pahnih;
Keriat-jearim te, Kafira te leh Beerot khaw chhuak mi zasarih leh sawmli leh pathum;
Rama leh Geba khaw chhuak mi zaruk leh sawmhnih leh pakhat;
Mikmas khaw chhuak mi za leh sawmhnih leh pahnih;
Bethel leh Ai khaw chhuak mi zahnih leh sawmhnih leh pathum;
Nebo khaw chhuak mi sawmnga leh pahnih;
Magbis khaw chhuak mi za leh sawmnga leh paruk;
Elam khaw dang chhuak mi sângkhat leh zahnih leh sawmnga leh pali;
Harim khaw chhuak mi zathum leh sawmhnih;
Lod te, Hadid te, Ono khua te mi zasarih leh sawmhnih leh panga;
Jeriko khaw chhuak mi zathum leh sawmli leh panga;
Sena khaw chhuak mi sângthum leh zaruk leh sawmthum.
Puithiamho, lo kîr vete chu heti hi an ni: Jesua chhûng, Jedaia thlah mi zakua leh sawmsarih leh pathum;
Imera thlah mi sangkhat leh sawmnga leh pahnih;
Pasura thlah mi sângkhat leh zahnih leh sawmli leh pasarih;
Harima thlah mi sângkhat leh sâwm leh pasarih.
Levia chi: Jesua leh Kadmiela fa, Hodavia thlah mi sawmsarih leh pali;
Asafa thlah, hla sa mi, za leh sawmhnih leh pariat;
Tempul pulis: Saluma thlah te, Atera thlah te, Talmona thlah te, Akuba thlah te, Hatita thlah te, Sobaia thlah te mi za leh sawmthum leh pakua.
Tempul enkawltu Netin-ho lo hâw vete chu: Ziha fa te, Hasufa fa te, Tabaota fa te,
Kerosa fa te, Siaha fa te, Padona fa te,
Lebana fa te, Hagaba fa te, Akuba fa te,
Hagaba fa te, Samlaia fa te, Hanana fa te,
Gidela fa te, Gahara fa te, Reaia fa te,
Rezina fa te, Nekoda fa te, Gazama fa te,
Uza fa te, Pasea fa te, Besaia fa te,
Asna fa te, Meunima fa te, Nefisima fa te,
Bakbuka fa te, Hakufa fa te, Harhura fa te,
Bazluta fa te, Mehida fa te, Harsaa fa te,
Barkosa fa te, Sisera fa te, Tema fa te,
Nezia fa te, Hatifa fa te.
Solomona chhiahhlawh thlah te: Sotaia fa te, Hasofereta fa te, Peruda fa te,
Jaala fa te, Darkona fa te, Gidela fa te,
Sefatia fa te, Hatila fa te, Pokeret-hazebaima fa te, Amia fa te;
Netin-ho leh Solomona chhiahhlawh thlahte chu mi zathum leh sawmkua leh pahnih an ni.
Telmela khua te, Tel-harsa khua te, Kerub khua te, Adam khua leh Imer khua te aṭanga chho vete chu heti hi an ni: Hêngho hian Israel thlah an nihna chiah, an chi leh kuang an chhui thei lo;
Delaia thlah te, Tobia thlah te, Nekoda thlahte mi zaruk leh sawmnga leh pahnih an ni.

Hêng puithiamho hian an thlahtu tak an chhui chhuak thei lo: Habaia fa te, Hakoza fa te, Barzilaia fa te. Puithiam Barzilai-ho thlahtu Barzilaia hian Gilead mi Barzilai hmeichhia nupuiah a nei a, a puzawn chhûng hming chu an pu zâwk ta a ni.
An thlahtu tak an chhui chhuah theih loh avângin puithiamah pawm an ni ta lo va.
Juda zînga hotu ber ramawptu chuan, “Puithiam, Urim leh Thumim kawltu a awm hma chu Pathian hnêna thilhlan hi ei ve suh u,” a ti a.
An zavai chuan mi sîngli leh sânghnih leh zathum leh sawmruk an ni.
An chhiahhlawh, mipa leh hmeichhia mi sângsarih leh zathum leh sawmthum leh pasarih; Hla sa mi mipa leh hmeichhia zahnih;
Sakawr zasarih leh sawmthum leh paruk, sakawr puakphur zahnih leh sawmli leh panga;
